     159             : /*******************************************************************************
     160             :  * Constants
     161             :  ******************************************************************************/
     162             : 
     163             : // If JS_STRUCTURED_CLONE_VERSION changes then we need to update our major
     164             : // schema version.
     165             : static_assert(JS_STRUCTURED_CLONE_VERSION == 8,
     166             :               "Need to update the major schema version.");
     167             : 
     168             : // Major schema version. Bump for almost everything.
     169             : const uint32_t kMajorSchemaVersion = 26;
     170             : 
     171             : // Minor schema version. Should almost always be 0 (maybe bump on release
     172             : // branches if we have to).
     173             : const uint32_t kMinorSchemaVersion = 0;
     174             : 
     175             : // The schema version we store in the SQLite database is a (signed) 32-bit
     176             : // integer. The major version is left-shifted 4 bits so the max value is
     177             : // 0xFFFFFFF. The minor version occupies the lower 4 bits and its max is 0xF.
     178             : static_assert(kMajorSchemaVersion <= 0xFFFFFFF,
     179             :               "Major version needs to fit in 28 bits.");
     180             : static_assert(kMinorSchemaVersion <= 0xF,
     181             :               "Minor version needs to fit in 4 bits.");
     182             : 
     183             : const int32_t kSQLiteSchemaVersion =
     184             :   int32_t((kMajorSchemaVersion << 4) + kMinorSchemaVersion);
     185             : 
     186             : const int32_t kStorageProgressGranularity = 1000;
     187             : 
     188             : // Changing the value here will override the page size of new databases only.
     189             : // A journal mode change and VACUUM are needed to change existing databases, so
     190             : // the best way to do that is to use the schema version upgrade mechanism.
     191             : const uint32_t kSQLitePageSizeOverride =
     192             : #ifdef IDB_MOBILE
     193             :   2048;
     194             : #else
     195             :   4096;
     196             : #endif
     197             : 
     198             : static_assert(kSQLitePageSizeOverride == /* mozStorage default */ 0 ||
     199             :               (kSQLitePageSizeOverride % 2 == 0 &&
     200             :                kSQLitePageSizeOverride >= 512  &&
     201             :                kSQLitePageSizeOverride <= 65536),
     202             :               "Must be 0 (disabled) or a power of 2 between 512 and 65536!");
     203             : 
     204             : // Set to -1 to use SQLite's default, 0 to disable, or some positive number to
     205             : // enforce a custom limit.
     206             : const int32_t kMaxWALPages = 5000; // 20MB on desktop, 10MB on mobile.
     207             : 
     208             : // Set to some multiple of the page size to grow the database in larger chunks.
     209             : const uint32_t kSQLiteGrowthIncrement = kSQLitePageSizeOverride * 2;
     210             : 
     211             : static_assert(kSQLiteGrowthIncrement >= 0 &&
     212             :               kSQLiteGrowthIncrement % kSQLitePageSizeOverride == 0 &&
     213             :               kSQLiteGrowthIncrement < uint32_t(INT32_MAX),
     214             :               "Must be 0 (disabled) or a positive multiple of the page size!");
     215             : 
     216             : // The maximum number of threads that can be used for database activity at a
     217             : // single time.
     218             : const uint32_t kMaxConnectionThreadCount = 20;
     219             : 
     220             : static_assert(kMaxConnectionThreadCount, "Must have at least one thread!");
     221             : 
     222             : // The maximum number of threads to keep when idle. Threads that become idle in
     223             : // excess of this number will be shut down immediately.
     224             : const uint32_t kMaxIdleConnectionThreadCount = 2;
     225             : 
     226             : static_assert(kMaxConnectionThreadCount >= kMaxIdleConnectionThreadCount,
     227             :               "Idle thread limit must be less than total thread limit!");
     228             : 
     229             : // The length of time that database connections will be held open after all
     230             : // transactions have completed before doing idle maintenance.
     231             : const uint32_t kConnectionIdleMaintenanceMS = 2 * 1000; // 2 seconds
     232             : 
     233             : // The length of time that database connections will be held open after all
     234             : // transactions and maintenance have completed.
     235             : const uint32_t kConnectionIdleCloseMS = 10 * 1000; // 10 seconds
     236             : 
     237             : // The length of time that idle threads will stay alive before being shut down.
     238             : const uint32_t kConnectionThreadIdleMS = 30 * 1000; // 30 seconds
     239             : 
     240             : #define SAVEPOINT_CLAUSE "SAVEPOINT sp;"
     241             : 
     242             : const uint32_t kFileCopyBufferSize = 32768;
     243             : 
     244             : #define JOURNAL_DIRECTORY_NAME "journals"
     245             : 
     246             : const char kFileManagerDirectoryNameSuffix[] = ".files";

     535             : 
     536             : /*******************************************************************************
     537             :  * SQLite functions
     538             :  ******************************************************************************/
     539             : 
     540             : int32_t
     541             : MakeSchemaVersion(uint32_t aMajorSchemaVersion,
     542             :                   uint32_t aMinorSchemaVersion)
     543             : {
     544             :   return int32_t((aMajorSchemaVersion << 4) + aMinorSchemaVersion);
     545             : }
     546             : 
     547             : uint32_t
     548           0 : HashName(const nsAString& aName)
     549             : {
     550             :   struct Helper
     551             :   {
     552             :     static uint32_t
     553             :     RotateBitsLeft32(uint32_t aValue, uint8_t aBits)
     554             :     {
     555             :       MOZ_ASSERT(aBits < 32);
     556           0 :       return (aValue << aBits) | (aValue >> (32 - aBits));
     557             :     }
     558             :   };
     559             : 
     560             :   static const uint32_t kGoldenRatioU32 = 0x9e3779b9u;
     561             : 
     562           0 :   const char16_t* str = aName.BeginReading();
     563           0 :   size_t length = aName.Length();
     564             : 
     565           0 :   uint32_t hash = 0;
     566           0 :   for (size_t i = 0; i < length; i++) {
     567           0 :     hash = kGoldenRatioU32 * (Helper::RotateBitsLeft32(hash, 5) ^ str[i]);
     568             :   }
     569             : 
     570           0 :   return hash;
     571             : }
     572             : 
     573             : nsresult
     574           0 : ClampResultCode(nsresult aResultCode)
     575             : {
     576           0 :   if (NS_SUCCEEDED(aResultCode) ||

     578             :     return aResultCode;

     601             : void
     602           0 : GetDatabaseFilename(const nsAString& aName,
     603             :                     nsAutoString& aDatabaseFilename)

     629             : uint32_t
     630           0 : CompressedByteCountForNumber(uint64_t aNumber)
     631             : {
     632             :   // All bytes have 7 bits available.
     633           0 :   uint32_t count = 1;
     634           0 :   while ((aNumber >>= 7)) {
     635           0 :     count++;
     636             :   }
     637             : 
     638           0 :   return count;
     639             : }
     640             : 
     641             : uint32_t
     642           0 : CompressedByteCountForIndexId(int64_t aIndexId)
     643             : {
     644             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aIndexId);
     645             :   MOZ_ASSERT(UINT64_MAX - uint64_t(aIndexId) >= uint64_t(aIndexId),
     646             :               "Overflow!");
     647             : 
     648           0 :   return CompressedByteCountForNumber(uint64_t(aIndexId * 2));
     649             : }

     651             : void
     652           0 : WriteCompressedNumber(uint64_t aNumber, uint8_t** aIterator)
     653             : {
     654             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aIterator);
     655             :   MOZ_ASSERT(*aIterator);
     656             : 
     657           0 :   uint8_t*& buffer = *aIterator;
     658             : 
     659             : #ifdef DEBUG
     660             :   const uint8_t* bufferStart = buffer;
     661             :   const uint64_t originalNumber = aNumber;
     662             : #endif
     663             : 
     664             :   while (true) {
     665           0 :     uint64_t shiftedNumber = aNumber >> 7;
     666           0 :     if (shiftedNumber) {
     667           0 :       *buffer++ = uint8_t(0x80 | (aNumber & 0x7f));
     668           0 :       aNumber = shiftedNumber;
     669             :     } else {
     670           0 :       *buffer++ = uint8_t(aNumber);
     671             :       break;
     672             :     }
     673             :   }
     674             : 
     675             :   MOZ_ASSERT(buffer > bufferStart);
     676             :   MOZ_ASSERT(uint32_t(buffer - bufferStart) ==
     677           0 :                CompressedByteCountForNumber(originalNumber));
     678           0 : }

     680             : uint64_t
     681           0 : ReadCompressedNumber(const uint8_t** aIterator, const uint8_t* aEnd)
     682             : {
     683             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aIterator);
     684             :   MOZ_ASSERT(*aIterator);
     685             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aEnd);
     686             :   MOZ_ASSERT(*aIterator < aEnd);
     687             : 
     688           0 :   const uint8_t*& buffer = *aIterator;
     689             : 
     690           0 :   uint8_t shiftCounter = 0;
     691           0 :   uint64_t result = 0;
     692             : 
     693             :   while (true) {
     694             :     MOZ_ASSERT(shiftCounter <= 56, "Shifted too many bits!");
     695             : 
     696           0 :     result += (uint64_t(*buffer & 0x7f) << shiftCounter);
     697           0 :     shiftCounter += 7;
     698             : 
     699           0 :     if (!(*buffer++ & 0x80)) {
     700             :       break;
     701             :     }
     702             : 
     703           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(buffer == aEnd)) {
     704             :       MOZ_ASSERT(false);
     705             :       break;
     706             :     }
     707             :   }
     708             : 
     709           0 :   return result;
     710             : }

     712             : void

     725             : void
     726           0 : ReadCompressedIndexId(const uint8_t** aIterator,

     742           0 :     *aUnique = false;

     752           0 : MakeCompressedIndexDataValues(
     753             :                              const FallibleTArray<IndexDataValue>& aIndexValues,
     754             :                              UniqueFreePtr<uint8_t>& aCompressedIndexDataValues,
     755             :                              uint32_t* aCompressedIndexDataValuesLength)
     756             : {
     757             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!NS_IsMainThread());

     765             : 
     766           0 :   const uint32_t arrayLength = aIndexValues.Length();
     767           0 :   if (!arrayLength) {
     768           0 :     *aCompressedIndexDataValuesLength = 0;
     769           0 :     return NS_OK;
     770             :   }

     773             :   uint32_t blobDataLength = 0;

     775           0 :   for (uint32_t arrayIndex = 0; arrayIndex < arrayLength; arrayIndex++) {
     776           0 :     const IndexDataValue& info = aIndexValues[arrayIndex];

     778           0 :     const nsCString& sortKeyBuffer = info.mSortKey.GetBuffer();
     779           0 :     const uint32_t keyBufferLength = keyBuffer.Length();
     780           0 :     const uint32_t sortKeyBufferLength = sortKeyBuffer.Length();
     781             : 
     782             :     MOZ_ASSERT(!keyBuffer.IsEmpty());

     784             :     // Don't let |infoLength| overflow.
     785           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(UINT32_MAX - keyBuffer.Length() <
     786             :                    CompressedByteCountForIndexId(info.mIndexId) +

     788             :                    CompressedByteCountForNumber(sortKeyBufferLength))) {
     789           0 :       IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();

     791             :     }
     792             : 
     793             :     const uint32_t infoLength =
     794             :       CompressedByteCountForIndexId(info.mIndexId) +
     795             :       CompressedByteCountForNumber(keyBufferLength) +
     796           0 :       CompressedByteCountForNumber(sortKeyBufferLength) +
     797             :       keyBufferLength +
     798           0 :       sortKeyBufferLength;
     799             : 
     800             :     // Don't let |blobDataLength| overflow.
     801           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(UINT32_MAX - infoLength < blobDataLength)) {
     802           0 :       IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();
     803           0 :       return NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_UNKNOWN_ERR;
     804             :     }
     805             : 
     806           0 :     blobDataLength += infoLength;
     807             :   }

     809             :   UniqueFreePtr<uint8_t> blobData(
     810           0 :     static_cast<uint8_t*>(malloc(blobDataLength)));
     811           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(!blobData)) {
     812           0 :     IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();

     814             :   }
     815             : 
     816           0 :   uint8_t* blobDataIter = blobData.get();
     817             : 
     818           0 :   for (uint32_t arrayIndex = 0; arrayIndex < arrayLength; arrayIndex++) {
     819           0 :     const IndexDataValue& info = aIndexValues[arrayIndex];
     820           0 :     const nsCString& keyBuffer = info.mKey.GetBuffer();

     823           0 :     const uint32_t sortKeyBufferLength = sortKeyBuffer.Length();
     824             : 
     825           0 :     WriteCompressedIndexId(info.mIndexId, info.mUnique, &blobDataIter);
     826           0 :     WriteCompressedNumber(keyBufferLength, &blobDataIter);

     828           0 :     memcpy(blobDataIter, keyBuffer.get(), keyBufferLength);
     829           0 :     blobDataIter += keyBufferLength;

     831           0 :     WriteCompressedNumber(sortKeyBufferLength, &blobDataIter);

     838             :

     846           0 : ReadCompressedIndexDataValuesFromBlob(const uint8_t* aBlobData,

     986             : nsresult
     987           0 : CreateFileTables(mozIStorageConnection* aConnection)
     988             : {
     989           0 :   AssertIsOnIOThread();
     990             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aConnection);
     991             : 
     992           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
     993             :                  "CreateFileTables",
     994             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
     995             : 
     996             :   // Table `file`
     997             :   nsresult rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
     998             :     "CREATE TABLE file ("
     999             :       "id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, "
    1000             :       "refcount INTEGER NOT NULL"
    1001             :     ");"
    1002           0 :   ));
    1003           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1004             :     return rv;
    1005             :   }
    1006             : 
    1007             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    1008             :     "CREATE TRIGGER object_data_insert_trigger "
    1009             :     "AFTER INSERT ON object_data "
    1010             :     "FOR EACH ROW "
    1011             :     "WHEN NEW.file_ids IS NOT NULL "
    1012             :     "BEGIN "
    1013             :       "SELECT update_refcount(NULL, NEW.file_ids); "
    1014             :     "END;"
    1015           0 :   ));
    1016           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1017             :     return rv;
    1018             :   }
    1019             : 
    1020             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    1021             :     "CREATE TRIGGER object_data_update_trigger "
    1022             :     "AFTER UPDATE OF file_ids ON object_data "
    1023             :     "FOR EACH ROW "
    1024             :     "WHEN OLD.file_ids IS NOT NULL OR NEW.file_ids IS NOT NULL "
    1025             :     "BEGIN "
    1026             :       "SELECT update_refcount(OLD.file_ids, NEW.file_ids); "
    1027             :     "END;"
    1028           0 :   ));
    1029           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1030             :     return rv;
    1031             :   }
    1032             : 
    1033             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    1034             :     "CREATE TRIGGER object_data_delete_trigger "
    1035             :     "AFTER DELETE ON object_data "
    1036             :     "FOR EACH ROW WHEN OLD.file_ids IS NOT NULL "
    1037             :     "BEGIN "
    1038             :       "SELECT update_refcount(OLD.file_ids, NULL); "
    1039             :     "END;"
    1040           0 :   ));
    1041           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1042             :     return rv;
    1043             :   }
    1044             : 
    1045             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    1046             :     "CREATE TRIGGER file_update_trigger "
    1047             :     "AFTER UPDATE ON file "
    1048             :     "FOR EACH ROW WHEN NEW.refcount = 0 "
    1049             :     "BEGIN "
    1050             :       "DELETE FROM file WHERE id = OLD.id; "
    1051             :     "END;"
    1052           0 :   ));
    1053           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1054           0 :     return rv;
    1055             :   }
    1056             :

    1059             : 
    1060             : nsresult
    1061           0 : CreateTables(mozIStorageConnection* aConnection)
    1062             : {
    1063           0 :   AssertIsOnIOThread();
    1064             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aConnection);
    1065             : 
    1066           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
    1067             :                  "CreateTables",
    1068             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
    1069             : 
    1070             :   // Table `database`
    1071             : 
    1072             :   // There are two reasons for having the origin column.
    1073             :   // First, we can ensure that we don't have collisions in the origin hash we
    1074             :   // use for the path because when we open the db we can make sure that the
    1075             :   // origins exactly match. Second, chrome code crawling through the idb
    1076             :   // directory can figure out the origin of every db without having to
    1077             :   // reverse-engineer our hash scheme.
    1078             :   nsresult rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    1079             :     "CREATE TABLE database"
    1080             :       "( name TEXT PRIMARY KEY"
    1081             :       ", origin TEXT NOT NULL"
    1082             :       ", version INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0"
    1083             :       ", last_vacuum_time INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0"
    1084             :       ", last_analyze_time INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0"
    1085             :       ", last_vacuum_size INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0"
    1086             :       ") WITHOUT ROWID;"
    1087           0 :   ));
    1088           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1089             :     return rv;
    1090             :   }
    1091             : 
    1092             :   // Table `object_store`
    1093             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    1094             :     "CREATE TABLE object_store"
    1095             :       "( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY"
    1096             :       ", auto_increment INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0"
    1097             :       ", name TEXT NOT NULL"
    1098             :       ", key_path TEXT"
    1099             :       ");"
    1100           0 :   ));
    1101           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {

    1209             : 
    1210             : nsresult
    1211           0 : UpgradeSchemaFrom4To5(mozIStorageConnection* aConnection)
    1212             : {
    1213           0 :   AssertIsOnIOThread();
    1214             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aConnection);
    1215             : 
    1216           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
    1217             :                  "UpgradeSchemaFrom4To5",
    1218             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
    1219             : 
    1220             :   nsresult rv;
    1221             : 
    1222             :   // All we changed is the type of the version column, so lets try to
    1223             :   // convert that to an integer, and if we fail, set it to 0.
    1224             :   nsCOMPtr<mozIStorageStatement> stmt;
    1225             :   rv = aConnection->CreateStatement(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    1226             :     "SELECT name, version, dataVersion "
    1227             :     "FROM database"
    1228           0 :   ), getter_AddRefs(stmt));
    1229           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1230             :     return rv;
    1231             :   }
    1232             : 
    1233             :   nsString name;
    1234             :   int32_t intVersion;
    1235             :   int64_t dataVersion;
    1236             : 
    1237             :   {
    1238           0 :     mozStorageStatementScoper scoper(stmt);
    1239             : 
    1240             :     bool hasResults;
    1241           0 :     rv = stmt->ExecuteStep(&hasResults);
    1242           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1243           0 :       return rv;
    1244             :     }
    1245           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(!hasResults)) {
    1246             :       return NS_ERROR_FAILURE;
    1247             :     }
    1248             : 
    1249             :     nsString version;
    1250           0 :     rv = stmt->GetString(1, version);
    1251           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1252             :       return rv;
    1253             :     }
    1254             : 
    1255           0 :     intVersion = version.ToInteger(&rv);
    1256           0 :     if (NS_FAILED(rv)) {
    1257           0 :       intVersion = 0;
    1258             :     }
    1259             : 
    1260           0 :     rv = stmt->GetString(0, name);
    1261           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1262             :       return rv;
    1263             :     }
    1264             : 
    1265           0 :     rv = stmt->GetInt64(2, &dataVersion);
    1266           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1267             :       return rv;
    1268           0 :     }
    1269             :   }
    1270             : 
    1271             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    1272             :     "DROP TABLE database"
    1273           0 :   ));
    1274           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1275             :     return rv;
    1276             :   }
    1277             : 
    1278             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    1279             :     "CREATE TABLE database ("
    1280             :       "name TEXT NOT NULL, "
    1281             :       "version INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, "
    1282             :       "dataVersion INTEGER NOT NULL"
    1283             :     ");"
    1284           0 :   ));
    1285           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1286             :     return rv;
    1287             :   }
    1288             : 
    1289             :   rv = aConnection->CreateStatement(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    1290             :     "INSERT INTO database (name, version, dataVersion) "
    1291             :     "VALUES (:name, :version, :dataVersion)"
    1292           0 :   ), getter_AddRefs(stmt));
    1293           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1294             :     return rv;
    1295             :   }
    1296             : 
    1297             :   {
    1298           0 :     mozStorageStatementScoper scoper(stmt);
    1299             : 
    1300           0 :     rv = stmt->BindStringByIndex(0, name);
    1301           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1302           0 :       return rv;
    1303             :     }
    1304             : 
    1305           0 :     rv = stmt->BindInt32ByIndex(1, intVersion);
    1306           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1307             :       return rv;
    1308             :     }
    1309             : 
    1310           0 :     rv = stmt->BindInt64ByIndex(2, dataVersion);
    1311           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1312             :       return rv;
    1313             :     }
    1314             : 
    1315           0 :     rv = stmt->Execute();
    1316           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1317             :       return rv;
    1318           0 :     }
    1319             :   }
    1320             : 
    1321           0 :   rv = aConnection->SetSchemaVersion(5);
    1322           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1323           0 :     return rv;
    1324             :   }
    1325             : 
    1326           0 :   return NS_OK;
    1327             : }
    1328             : 
    1329             : nsresult
    1330           0 : UpgradeSchemaFrom5To6(mozIStorageConnection* aConnection)
    1331             : {
    1332           0 :   AssertIsOnIOThread();
    1333             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aConnection);
    1334             : 
    1335           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
    1336             :                  "UpgradeSchemaFrom5To6",
    1337             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
    1338             : 
    1339             :   // First, drop all the indexes we're no longer going to use.
    1340             :   nsresult rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    1341             :     "DROP INDEX key_index;"
    1342           0 :   ));
    1343           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1344             :     return rv;
    1345             :   }
    1346             : 
    1347             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    1348             :     "DROP INDEX ai_key_index;"
    1349           0 :   ));
    1350           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1351             :     return rv;
    1352             :   }
    1353             : 
    1354             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    1355             :     "DROP INDEX value_index;"
    1356           0 :   ));
    1357           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1358             :     return rv;
    1359             :   }
    1360             :

    1362             :     "DROP INDEX ai_value_index;"
    1363           0 :   ));
    1364           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1365             :     return rv;
    1366             :   }
    1367             : 
    1368             :   // Now, reorder the columns of object_data to put the blob data last. We do
    1369             :   // this by copying into a temporary table, dropping the original, then copying
    1370             :   // back into a newly created table.
    1371             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    1372             :     "CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE temp_upgrade ("
    1373             :       "id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, "

    1376             :       "data "
    1377             :     ");"

    1387           0 :   ));

    1939           0 : class CompressDataBlobsFunction final
    1940             :   : public mozIStorageFunction
    1941             : {
    1942             : public:
    1943             :   NS_DECL_ISUPPORTS
    1944             : 
    1945             : private:
    1946             :   ~CompressDataBlobsFunction() = default;
    1947             : 
    1948             :   NS_IMETHOD
    1949           0 :   OnFunctionCall(mozIStorageValueArray* aArguments,
    1950             :                  nsIVariant** aResult) override
    1951             :   {
    1952             :     MOZ_ASSERT(aArguments);
    1953             :     MOZ_ASSERT(aResult);
    1954             : 
    1955           0 :     PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
    1956             :                    "CompressDataBlobsFunction::OnFunctionCall",
    1957             :                    js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
    1958             : 
    1959             :     uint32_t argc;
    1960           0 :     nsresult rv = aArguments->GetNumEntries(&argc);
    1961           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1962             :       return rv;
    1963             :     }
    1964             : 
    1965           0 :     if (argc != 1) {
    1966             :       NS_WARNING("Don't call me with the wrong number of arguments!");
    1967             :       return NS_ERROR_UNEXPECTED;
    1968             :     }
    1969             : 
    1970             :     int32_t type;
    1971           0 :     rv = aArguments->GetTypeOfIndex(0, &type);
    1972           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1973             :       return rv;
    1974             :     }
    1975             : 
    1976           0 :     if (type != mozIStorageStatement::VALUE_TYPE_BLOB) {
    1977             :       NS_WARNING("Don't call me with the wrong type of arguments!");
    1978             :       return NS_ERROR_UNEXPECTED;
    1979             :     }
    1980             : 
    1981             :     const uint8_t* uncompressed;
    1982             :     uint32_t uncompressedLength;
    1983           0 :     rv = aArguments->GetSharedBlob(0, &uncompressedLength, &uncompressed);
    1984           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    1985             :       return rv;
    1986             :     }
    1987             : 
    1988           0 :     size_t compressedLength = snappy::MaxCompressedLength(uncompressedLength);
    1989             :     UniqueFreePtr<uint8_t> compressed(
    1990           0 :       static_cast<uint8_t*>(malloc(compressedLength)));
    1991           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(!compressed)) {
    1992             :       return NS_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY;
    1993             :     }
    1994             : 
    1995             :     snappy::RawCompress(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(uncompressed),
    1996             :                         uncompressedLength,
    1997             :                         reinterpret_cast<char*>(compressed.get()),
    1998           0 :                         &compressedLength);
    1999             : 
    2000             :     std::pair<uint8_t *, int> data(compressed.release(),
    2001           0 :                                    int(compressedLength));
    2002             : 
    2003           0 :     nsCOMPtr<nsIVariant> result = new mozilla::storage::AdoptedBlobVariant(data);
    2004             : 
    2005             :     result.forget(aResult);
    2006           0 :     return NS_OK;
    2007             :   }
    2008             : };

    2010             : nsresult
    2011           0 : UpgradeSchemaFrom8To9_0(mozIStorageConnection* aConnection)
    2012             : {
    2013           0 :   AssertIsOnIOThread();
    2014             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aConnection);
    2015             : 
    2016           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
    2017             :                  "UpgradeSchemaFrom8To9_0",
    2018             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
    2019             : 
    2020             :   // We no longer use the dataVersion column.
    2021             :   nsresult rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    2022             :     "UPDATE database SET dataVersion = 0;"
    2023           0 :   ));
    2024           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    2025             :     return rv;
    2026             :   }
    2027             :

    2031             : 
    2032           0 :   rv = aConnection->CreateFunction(compressorName, 1, compressor);
    2033           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    2034             :     return rv;
    2035             :   }
    2036             : 
    2037             :   // Turn off foreign key constraints before we do anything here.
    2038             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    2039             :     "UPDATE object_data SET data = compress(data);"
    2040           0 :   ));

    2049             :     return rv;
    2050             :   }
    2051             :

    2609           0 :   AssertIsOnIOThread();
    2610             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aConnection);

    2612           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
    2613             :                  "UpgradeSchemaFrom12_0To13_0",
    2614             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
    2615             : 
    2616             :   nsresult rv;
    2617             : 
    2618             : #ifdef IDB_MOBILE
    2619             :   int32_t defaultPageSize;
    2620             :   rv = aConnection->GetDefaultPageSize(&defaultPageSize);
    2621             :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    2622             :     return rv;
    2623             :   }
    2624             : 
    2625             :   // Enable auto_vacuum mode and update the page size to the platform default.
    2626             :   nsAutoCString upgradeQuery("PRAGMA auto_vacuum = FULL; PRAGMA page_size = ");
    2627             :   upgradeQuery.AppendInt(defaultPageSize);
    2628             : 
    2629             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(upgradeQuery);
    2630             :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    2631             :     return rv;
    2632             :   }
    2633             : 
    2634             :   *aVacuumNeeded = true;
    2635             : #endif
    2636             : 
    2637           0 :   rv = aConnection->SetSchemaVersion(MakeSchemaVersion(13, 0));
    2638           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {

    2640             :   }
    2641             :

    2644             : 
    2645             : nsresult
    2646           0 : UpgradeSchemaFrom13_0To14_0(mozIStorageConnection* aConnection)
    2647             : {
    2648           0 :   AssertIsOnIOThread();
    2649             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aConnection);
    2650             : 
    2651             :   // The only change between 13 and 14 was a different structured
    2652             :   // clone format, but it's backwards-compatible.
    2653           0 :   nsresult rv = aConnection->SetSchemaVersion(MakeSchemaVersion(14, 0));
    2654           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    2655           0 :     return rv;
    2656             :   }
    2657             : 
    2658             :   return NS_OK;

    2754             : #ifdef DEBUG
    2755             :   {

    2763             :                valueType == mozIStorageValueArray::VALUE_TYPE_BLOB);

    2768             :     MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(aValues->GetTypeOfIndex(2, &valueType));

    2770             : 
    2771             :     MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(aValues->GetTypeOfIndex(3, &valueType));
    2772             :     MOZ_ASSERT(valueType == mozIStorageValueArray::VALUE_TYPE_BLOB);
    2773             :   }
    2774             : #endif
    2775             : 
    2776             :   // Read out the previous value. It may be NULL, in which case we'll just end
    2777             :   // up with an empty array.

    2779           0 :   nsresult rv = ReadCompressedIndexDataValues(aValues, 0, indexValues);

    2781             :     return rv;
    2782             :   }
    2783             : 
    2784             :   int64_t indexId;

    2787             :     return rv;
    2788             :   }

    2793             :     return rv;
    2794             :   }

    2796           0 :   Key value;

    2798           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    2799             :     return rv;
    2800             :   }
    2801             : 
    2802             :   // Update the array with the new addition.
    2803           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(!indexValues.SetCapacity(indexValues.Length() + 1,
    2804             :                                           fallible))) {
    2805           0 :     IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();
    2806           0 :     return NS_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY;
    2807             :   }
    2808             :

    2810             :     indexValues.InsertElementSorted(IndexDataValue(indexId, !!unique, value),

    2817             :                                      indexValuesBlob,

    2820             :     return rv;

    2834             : class UpgradeSchemaFrom17_0To18_0Helper::UpgradeKeyFunction final
    2835             :   : public mozIStorageFunction
    2836             : {
    2837             : public:
    2838             :   UpgradeKeyFunction()
    2839           0 :   { }
    2840             : 
    2841             :   static nsresult
    2842           0 :   CopyAndUpgradeKeyBuffer(const uint8_t* aSource,
    2843             :                           const uint8_t* aSourceEnd,
    2844             :                           uint8_t* aDestination)
    2845             :   {
    2846             :     return CopyAndUpgradeKeyBufferInternal(aSource,
    2847             :                                            aSourceEnd,
    2848             :                                            aDestination,
    2849             :                                            0 /* aTagOffset */,
    2850           0 :                                            0 /* aRecursionDepth */);
    2851             :   }
    2852             : 
    2853             :   NS_DECL_ISUPPORTS
    2854             : 
    2855             : private:
    2856             :   ~UpgradeKeyFunction() = default;
    2857             : 
    2858             :   static nsresult
    2859             :   CopyAndUpgradeKeyBufferInternal(const uint8_t*& aSource,
    2860             :                                   const uint8_t* aSourceEnd,
    2861             :                                   uint8_t*& aDestination,
    2862             :                                   uint8_t aTagOffset,
    2863             :                                   uint8_t aRecursionDepth);
    2864             : 
    2865             :   static uint32_t
    2866             :   AdjustedSize(uint32_t aMaxSize,
    2867             :                const uint8_t* aSource,
    2868             :                const uint8_t* aSourceEnd)
    2869             :   {
    2870             :     MOZ_ASSERT(aMaxSize);
    2871             :     MOZ_ASSERT(aSource);
    2872             :     MOZ_ASSERT(aSourceEnd);
    2873             :     MOZ_ASSERT(aSource <= aSourceEnd);
    2874             : 
    2875           0 :     return std::min(aMaxSize, uint32_t(aSourceEnd - aSource));
    2876             :   }
    2877             : 
    2878             :   NS_DECL_MOZISTORAGEFUNCTION
    2879             : };
    2880             : 
    2881             : // static
    2882             : nsresult
    2883           0 : UpgradeSchemaFrom17_0To18_0Helper::
    2884             : UpgradeKeyFunction::CopyAndUpgradeKeyBufferInternal(const uint8_t*& aSource,
    2885             :                                                     const uint8_t* aSourceEnd,
    2886             :                                                     uint8_t*& aDestination,
    2887             :                                                     uint8_t aTagOffset,
    2888             :                                                     uint8_t aRecursionDepth)
    2889             : {
    2890             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!NS_IsMainThread());
    2891             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!IsOnBackgroundThread());
    2892             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aSource);
    2893             :   MOZ_ASSERT(*aSource);
    2894             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aSourceEnd);
    2895             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aSource < aSourceEnd);
    2896             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aDestination);
    2897             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aTagOffset <=  Key::kMaxArrayCollapse);
    2898             : 
    2899             :   static constexpr uint8_t kOldNumberTag = 0x1;
    2900             :   static constexpr uint8_t kOldDateTag = 0x2;
    2901             :   static constexpr uint8_t kOldStringTag = 0x3;
    2902             :   static constexpr uint8_t kOldArrayTag = 0x4;
    2903             :   static constexpr uint8_t kOldMaxType = kOldArrayTag;
    2904             : 
    2905           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(aRecursionDepth > Key::kMaxRecursionDepth)) {
    2906           0 :     IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();
    2907           0 :     return NS_ERROR_FILE_CORRUPTED;
    2908             :   }
    2909             : 
    2910           0 :   const uint8_t sourceTag = *aSource - (aTagOffset * kOldMaxType);
    2911             :   MOZ_ASSERT(sourceTag);
    2912             : 
    2913           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(sourceTag > kOldMaxType * Key::kMaxArrayCollapse)) {
    2914           0 :     IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();
    2915           0 :     return NS_ERROR_FILE_CORRUPTED;
    2916             :   }
    2917             : 
    2918           0 :   if (sourceTag == kOldNumberTag || sourceTag == kOldDateTag) {
    2919             :     // Write the new tag.
    2920             :     *aDestination++ =
    2921             :       (sourceTag == kOldNumberTag ? Key::eFloat : Key::eDate) +
    2922           0 :       (aTagOffset * Key::eMaxType);
    2923           0 :     aSource++;
    2924             : 
    2925             :     // Numbers and Dates are encoded as 64-bit integers, but trailing 0
    2926             :     // bytes have been removed.
    2927             :     const uint32_t byteCount =
    2928           0 :       AdjustedSize(sizeof(uint64_t), aSource, aSourceEnd);
    2929             : 
    2930           0 :     for (uint32_t count = 0; count < byteCount; count++) {
    2931           0 :       *aDestination++ = *aSource++;
    2932             :     }
    2933             : 
    2934             :     return NS_OK;
    2935             :   }
    2936             : 
    2937           0 :   if (sourceTag == kOldStringTag) {
    2938             :     // Write the new tag.
    2939           0 :     *aDestination++ = Key::eString + (aTagOffset * Key::eMaxType);
    2940           0 :     aSource++;
    2941             : 
    2942           0 :     while (aSource < aSourceEnd) {
    2943           0 :       const uint8_t byte = *aSource++;
    2944           0 :       *aDestination++ = byte;
    2945             : 
    2946           0 :       if (!byte) {
    2947             :         // Just copied the terminator.
    2948             :         break;
    2949             :       }
    2950             : 
    2951             :       // Maybe copy one or two extra bytes if the byte is tagged and we have
    2952             :       // enough source space.
    2953           0 :       if (byte & 0x80) {
    2954             :         const uint32_t byteCount =
    2955           0 :           AdjustedSize((byte & 0x40) ? 2 : 1, aSource, aSourceEnd);
    2956             : 
    2957           0 :         for (uint32_t count = 0; count < byteCount; count++) {
    2958           0 :           *aDestination++ = *aSource++;
    2959             :         }
    2960             :       }
    2961             :     }
    2962             : 
    2963             :     return NS_OK;
    2964             :   }
    2965             : 
    2966           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(sourceTag < kOldArrayTag)) {
    2967           0 :     IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();
    2968           0 :     return NS_ERROR_FILE_CORRUPTED;
    2969             :   }
    2970             : 
    2971           0 :   aTagOffset++;
    2972             : 
    2973           0 :   if (aTagOffset == Key::kMaxArrayCollapse) {
    2974             :     MOZ_ASSERT(sourceTag == kOldArrayTag);
    2975             : 
    2976           0 :     *aDestination++ = (aTagOffset * Key::eMaxType);
    2977           0 :     aSource++;
    2978             : 
    2979           0 :     aTagOffset = 0;
    2980             :   }
    2981             : 
    2982           0 :   while (aSource < aSourceEnd &&
    2983           0 :          (*aSource - (aTagOffset * kOldMaxType)) != Key::eTerminator) {
    2984             :     nsresult rv = CopyAndUpgradeKeyBufferInternal(aSource,
    2985             :                                                   aSourceEnd,
    2986             :                                                   aDestination,
    2987             :                                                   aTagOffset,
    2988           0 :                                                   aRecursionDepth + 1);
    2989           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    2990           0 :       return rv;
    2991             :     }
    2992             : 
    2993             :     aTagOffset = 0;
    2994             :   }
    2995             : 
    2996           0 :   if (aSource < aSourceEnd) {
    2997             :     MOZ_ASSERT((*aSource - (aTagOffset * kOldMaxType)) == Key::eTerminator);
    2998           0 :     *aDestination++ = Key::eTerminator + (aTagOffset * Key::eMaxType);
    2999           0 :     aSource++;
    3000             :   }
    3001             : 
    3002             :   return NS_OK;
    3003             : }

    3035             :     return rv;
    3036             :   }

    3038             :   // Upgrading the key doesn't change the amount of space needed to hold it.
    3039             :   UniqueFreePtr<uint8_t> upgradedBlobData(
    3040           0 :     static_cast<uint8_t*>(malloc(blobDataLength)));
    3041           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(!upgradedBlobData)) {

    3051             :   }

    3105             : 
    3106             : // static
    3107             : nsresult
    3108           0 : UpgradeSchemaFrom17_0To18_0Helper::DoUpgradeInternal(
    3109             :                                              mozIStorageConnection* aConnection,
    3110             :                                              const nsACString& aOrigin)
    3111             : {
    3112             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aConnection);
    3113             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!aOrigin.IsEmpty());
    3114             : 
    3115             :   nsresult rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    3116             :     // Drop these triggers to avoid unnecessary work during the upgrade process.
    3117             :     "DROP TRIGGER object_data_insert_trigger;"
    3118             :     "DROP TRIGGER object_data_update_trigger;"
    3119             :     "DROP TRIGGER object_data_delete_trigger;"
    3120           0 :   ));
    3121           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    3122             :     return rv;
    3123             :   }
    3124             : 
    3125             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    3126             :     // Drop these indexes before we do anything else to free disk space.
    3127             :     "DROP INDEX index_data_object_data_id_index;"
    3128             :     "DROP INDEX unique_index_data_object_data_id_index;"
    3129           0 :   ));
    3130           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    3131             :     return rv;
    3132             :   }
    3133             : 
    3134             :   // Create the new tables and triggers first.
    3135             : 
    3136             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    3137             :     // This will eventually become the |database| table.
    3138             :     "CREATE TABLE database_upgrade "
    3139             :       "( name TEXT PRIMARY KEY"
    3140             :       ", origin TEXT NOT NULL"
    3141             :       ", version INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0"
    3142             :       ", last_vacuum_time INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0"
    3143             :       ", last_analyze_time INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0"
    3144             :       ", last_vacuum_size INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0"
    3145             :       ") WITHOUT ROWID;"
    3146           0 :   ));
    3147           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    3148             :     return rv;
    3149             :   }
    3150             : 
    3151             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    3152             :      // This will eventually become the |object_store| table.
    3153             :     "CREATE TABLE object_store_upgrade"
    3154             :       "( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY"
    3155             :       ", auto_increment INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0"
    3156             :       ", name TEXT NOT NULL"
    3157             :       ", key_path TEXT"
    3158             :       ");"
    3159           0 :   ));
    3160           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    3161             :     return rv;
    3162             :   }
    3163             : 
    3164             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    3165             :     // This will eventually become the |object_store_index| table.
    3166             :     "CREATE TABLE object_store_index_upgrade"
    3167             :       "( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY"
    3168             :       ", object_store_id INTEGER NOT NULL"
    3169             :       ", name TEXT NOT NULL"
    3170             :       ", key_path TEXT NOT NULL"
    3171             :       ", unique_index INTEGER NOT NULL"
    3172             :       ", multientry INTEGER NOT NULL"
    3173             :       ", FOREIGN KEY (object_store_id) "
    3174             :           "REFERENCES object_store(id) "
    3175             :       ");"
    3176           0 :   ));
    3177           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    3178             :     return rv;
    3179             :   }
    3180             : 
    3181             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    3182             :     // This will eventually become the |object_data| table.
    3183             :     "CREATE TABLE object_data_upgrade"
    3184             :       "( object_store_id INTEGER NOT NULL"
    3185             :       ", key BLOB NOT NULL"
    3186             :       ", index_data_values BLOB DEFAULT NULL"
    3187             :       ", file_ids TEXT"
    3188             :       ", data BLOB NOT NULL"
    3189             :       ", PRIMARY KEY (object_store_id, key)"
    3190             :       ", FOREIGN KEY (object_store_id) "
    3191             :           "REFERENCES object_store(id) "
    3192             :       ") WITHOUT ROWID;"
    3193           0 :   ));
    3194           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    3195             :     return rv;
    3196             :   }
    3197             : 
    3198             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    3199             :     // This will eventually become the |index_data| table.
    3200             :     "CREATE TABLE index_data_upgrade"
    3201             :       "( index_id INTEGER NOT NULL"
    3202             :       ", value BLOB NOT NULL"
    3203             :       ", object_data_key BLOB NOT NULL"
    3204             :       ", object_store_id INTEGER NOT NULL"
    3205             :       ", PRIMARY KEY (index_id, value, object_data_key)"
    3206             :       ", FOREIGN KEY (index_id) "

    3209             :           "REFERENCES object_data(object_store_id, key) "
    3210             :       ") WITHOUT ROWID;"
    3211           0 :   ));
    3212           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    3213             :     return rv;
    3214             :   }
    3215             :

    3217             :     // This will eventually become the |unique_index_data| table.
    3218             :     "CREATE TABLE unique_index_data_upgrade"
    3219             :       "( index_id INTEGER NOT NULL"
    3220             :       ", value BLOB NOT NULL"
    3221             :       ", object_store_id INTEGER NOT NULL"
    3222             :       ", object_data_key BLOB NOT NULL"
    3223             :       ", PRIMARY KEY (index_id, value)"
    3224             :       ", FOREIGN KEY (index_id) "
    3225             :           "REFERENCES object_store_index(id) "
    3226             :       ", FOREIGN KEY (object_store_id, object_data_key) "
    3227             :           "REFERENCES object_data(object_store_id, key) "
    3228             :       ") WITHOUT ROWID;"
    3229           0 :   ));
    3230           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    3231             :     return rv;
    3232             :   }
    3233             : 
    3234             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    3235             :     // Temporarily store |index_data_values| that we build during the upgrade of
    3236             :     // the index tables. We will later move this to the |object_data| table.
    3237             :     "CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE temp_index_data_values "
    3238             :       "( object_store_id INTEGER NOT NULL"
    3239             :       ", key BLOB NOT NULL"
    3240             :       ", index_data_values BLOB DEFAULT NULL"
    3241             :       ", PRIMARY KEY (object_store_id, key)"
    3242             :       ") WITHOUT ROWID;"
    3243           0 :   ));
    3244           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    3245             :     return rv;
    3246             :   }
    3247             : 
    3248             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    3249             :     // These two triggers help build the |index_data_values| blobs. The nested
    3250             :     // SELECT statements help us achieve an "INSERT OR UPDATE"-like behavior.
    3251             :     "CREATE TEMPORARY TRIGGER unique_index_data_upgrade_insert_trigger "
    3252             :       "AFTER INSERT ON unique_index_data_upgrade "
    3253             :       "BEGIN "
    3254             :         "INSERT OR REPLACE INTO temp_index_data_values "
    3255             :           "VALUES "
    3256             :           "( NEW.object_store_id"
    3257             :           ", NEW.object_data_key"
    3258             :           ", insert_idv("
    3259             :               "( SELECT index_data_values "
    3260             :                   "FROM temp_index_data_values "
    3261             :                   "WHERE object_store_id = NEW.object_store_id "
    3262             :                   "AND key = NEW.object_data_key "
    3263             :               "), NEW.index_id"
    3264             :                ", 1" /* unique */
    3265             :                ", NEW.value"
    3266             :             ")"
    3267             :           ");"
    3268             :       "END;"
    3269           0 :   ));
    3270           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {

    3272             :   }
    3273             :

    3278             :         "INSERT OR REPLACE INTO temp_index_data_values "

    3536             :

    3538             :   }

    3540             : 
    3541             :   // Recreate file table triggers.
    3542             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    3543             :     "CREATE TRIGGER object_data_insert_trigger "
    3544             :       "AFTER INSERT ON object_data "
    3545             :       "WHEN NEW.file_ids IS NOT NULL "
    3546             :       "BEGIN "
    3547             :         "SELECT update_refcount(NULL, NEW.file_ids);"
    3548             :       "END;"

    3555             :     "CREATE TRIGGER object_data_update_trigger "
    3556             :       "AFTER UPDATE OF file_ids ON object_data "
    3557             :       "WHEN OLD.file_ids IS NOT NULL OR NEW.file_ids IS NOT NULL "
    3558             :       "BEGIN "
    3559             :         "SELECT update_refcount(OLD.file_ids, NEW.file_ids);"
    3560             :       "END;"
    3561           0 :   ));
    3562           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    3563             :     return rv;
    3564             :   }
    3565             : 
    3566             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
    3567             :     "CREATE TRIGGER object_data_delete_trigger "
    3568             :       "AFTER DELETE ON object_data "
    3569             :       "WHEN OLD.file_ids IS NOT NULL "
    3570             :       "BEGIN "
    3571             :         "SELECT update_refcount(OLD.file_ids, NULL);"
    3572             :       "END;"
    3573           0 :   ));
    3574           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    3575             :     return rv;
    3576             :   }
    3577             : 
    3578             :   // Finally, turn on auto_vacuum mode. We use full auto_vacuum mode to reclaim
    3579             :   // disk space on mobile devices (at the cost of some COMMIT speed), and
    3580             :   // incremental auto_vacuum mode on desktop builds.
    3581             :   rv = aConnection->ExecuteSimpleSQL(
    3582             : #ifdef IDB_MOBILE
    3583             :     NS_LITERAL_CSTRING("PRAGMA auto_vacuum = FULL;")

    3585             :     NS_LITERAL_CSTRING("PRAGMA auto_vacuum = INCREMENTAL;")
    3586             : #endif
    3587           0 :   );
    3588           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    3589             :     return rv;
    3590             :   }
    3591             : 
    3592           0 :   rv = aConnection->SetSchemaVersion(MakeSchemaVersion(18, 0));
    3593           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    3594           0 :     return rv;
    3595             :   }
    3596             : 
    3597             :   return NS_OK;
    3598             : }

    3726           0 :   AssertIsOnIOThread();

    3730             :                  "UpgradeSchemaFrom19_0To20_0",
    3731             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
    3732             : 
    3733             : #if defined(MOZ_B2G)
    3734             : 
    3735             :   // We don't have to do the upgrade of file ids on B2G. The old format was
    3736             :   // only used by the previous single process implementation and B2G was
    3737             :   // always multi process. This is a nice optimization since the upgrade needs
    3738             :   // to deserialize all structured clones which reference a stored file or
    3739             :   // a mutable file.
    3740             :   nsresult rv = aConnection->SetSchemaVersion(MakeSchemaVersion(20, 0));

    3742             :     return rv;

    3751             :     "WHERE file_ids IS NOT NULL"
    3752           0 :   ), getter_AddRefs(stmt));

    3754             :     return rv;

    3766             :     }
    3767             : 
    3768           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(!hasResult)) {
    3769             :       MOZ_ASSERT(false, "This should never be possible!");
    3770             :       return NS_ERROR_FAILURE;
    3771             :     }
    3772             : 
    3773           0 :     count = stmt->AsInt64(0);
    3774           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(count < 0)) {
    3775             :       MOZ_ASSERT(false, "This should never be possible!");
    3776             :       return NS_ERROR_FAILURE;
    3777           0 :     }
    3778             :   }
    3779             :

    3781             :     // Nothing to upgrade.

    3784           0 :       return rv;

    3880           0 : UpgradeIndexDataValuesFunction::ReadOldCompressedIDVFromBlob(
    3881             :                                    const uint8_t* aBlobData,
    3882             :                                    uint32_t aBlobDataLength,
    3883             :                                    nsTArray<IndexDataValue>& aIndexValues)
    3884             : {
    3885             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!NS_IsMainThread());
    3886             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!IsOnBackgroundThread());
    3887             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aBlobData);
    3888             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aBlobDataLength);
    3889             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aIndexValues.IsEmpty());
    3890             : 
    3891           0 :   const uint8_t* blobDataIter = aBlobData;
    3892           0 :   const uint8_t* blobDataEnd = aBlobData + aBlobDataLength;
    3893             : 
    3894             :   int64_t indexId;
    3895             :   bool unique;
    3896           0 :   bool nextIndexIdAlreadyRead = false;
    3897             : 
    3898           0 :   while (blobDataIter < blobDataEnd) {
    3899           0 :     if (!nextIndexIdAlreadyRead) {
    3900           0 :       ReadCompressedIndexId(&blobDataIter, blobDataEnd, &indexId, &unique);
    3901             :     }
    3902           0 :     nextIndexIdAlreadyRead = false;
    3903             : 
    3904           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(blobDataIter == blobDataEnd)) {
    3905           0 :       IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();
    3906           0 :       return NS_ERROR_FILE_CORRUPTED;
    3907             :     }
    3908             : 
    3909             :     // Read key buffer length.
    3910             :     const uint64_t keyBufferLength =
    3911           0 :       ReadCompressedNumber(&blobDataIter, blobDataEnd);
    3912             : 
    3913           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(blobDataIter == blobDataEnd) ||
    3914           0 :         NS_WARN_IF(keyBufferLength > uint64_t(UINT32_MAX)) ||
    3915           0 :         NS_WARN_IF(blobDataIter + keyBufferLength > blobDataEnd)) {
    3916           0 :       IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();
    3917             :       return NS_ERROR_FILE_CORRUPTED;
    3918             :     }
    3919             : 
    3920             :     nsCString keyBuffer(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(blobDataIter),
    3921           0 :                         uint32_t(keyBufferLength));
    3922           0 :     blobDataIter += keyBufferLength;
    3923             : 
    3924           0 :     IndexDataValue idv(indexId, unique, Key(keyBuffer));
    3925             : 
    3926           0 :     if (blobDataIter < blobDataEnd) {
    3927             :       // Read either a sort key buffer length or an index id.
    3928           0 :       uint64_t maybeIndexId = ReadCompressedNumber(&blobDataIter, blobDataEnd);
    3929             : 
    3930             :       // Locale-aware indexes haven't been around long enough to have any users,
    3931             :       // we can safely assume all sort key buffer lengths will be zero.
    3932           0 :       if (maybeIndexId != 0) {
    3933           0 :         if (maybeIndexId % 2) {
    3934           0 :           unique = true;
    3935           0 :           maybeIndexId--;
    3936             :         } else {
    3937           0 :           unique = false;
    3938             :         }
    3939           0 :         indexId = maybeIndexId/2;
    3940           0 :         nextIndexIdAlreadyRead = true;
    3941             :       }
    3942             :     }
    3943             : 
    3944           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(!aIndexValues.InsertElementSorted(idv, fallible))) {
    3945           0 :       IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();
    3946           0 :       return NS_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY;
    3947             :     }
    3948             :   }
    3949             : 
    3950             :   MOZ_ASSERT(blobDataIter == blobDataEnd);
    3951             : 
    3952             :   return NS_OK;
    3953             : }

    4178             :     // attributes.

    4300           0 : SetDefaultPragmas(mozIStorageConnection* aConnection)
    4301             : {
    4302             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!NS_IsMainThread());
    4303             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aConnection);
    4304             : 
    4305             :   static const char kBuiltInPragmas[] =
    4306             :     // We use foreign keys in DEBUG builds only because there is a performance
    4307             :     // cost to using them.
    4308             :    "PRAGMA foreign_keys = "
    4309             : #ifdef DEBUG
    4310             :      "ON"
    4311             : #else
    4312             :      "OFF"
    4313             : #endif
    4314             :      ";"
    4315             : 
    4316             :     // The "INSERT OR REPLACE" statement doesn't fire the update trigger,
    4317             :     // instead it fires only the insert trigger. This confuses the update
    4318             :     // refcount function. This behavior changes with enabled recursive triggers,
    4319             :     // so the statement fires the delete trigger first and then the insert
    4320             :     // trigger.
    4321             :     "PRAGMA recursive_triggers = ON;"
    4322             : 
    4323             :     // We aggressively truncate the database file when idle so don't bother
    4324             :     // overwriting the WAL with 0 during active periods.
    4325             :     "PRAGMA secure_delete = OFF;"
    4326             :   ;
    4327             : 
    4328             :   nsresult rv =

    4738           0 :       if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    4739             :         return rv;
    4740             :       }
    4741             : 
    4742           0 :       rv = stmt->Execute();
    4743           0 :       if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    4744             :         return rv;
    4745             :       }
    4746             :     } else  {
    4747             :       // This logic needs to change next time we change the schema!
    4748             :       static_assert(kSQLiteSchemaVersion == int32_t((26 << 4) + 0),
    4749             :                     "Upgrade function needed due to schema version increase.");
    4750             : 
    4751           0 :       while (schemaVersion != kSQLiteSchemaVersion) {
    4752           0 :         if (schemaVersion == 4) {
    4753           0 :           rv = UpgradeSchemaFrom4To5(connection);
    4754           0 :         } else if (schemaVersion == 5) {

    5889             : struct ConnectionPool::TransactionInfoPair final
    5890             : {
    5891             :   friend class nsAutoPtr<TransactionInfoPair>;
    5892             : 
    5893             :   // Multiple reading transactions can block future writes.
    5894             :   nsTArray<TransactionInfo*> mLastBlockingWrites;
    5895             :   // But only a single writing transaction can block future reads.
    5896             :   TransactionInfo* mLastBlockingReads;
    5897             : 
    5898             :   TransactionInfoPair();
    5899             : 
    5900             : private:
    5901             :   ~TransactionInfoPair();
    5902             : };

    5904             : /*******************************************************************************
    5905             :  * Actor class declarations
    5906             :  ******************************************************************************/
    5907             : 
    5908             : class DatabaseOperationBase
    5909             :   : public Runnable
    5910             :   , public mozIStorageProgressHandler
    5911             : {
    5912             :   friend class UpgradeFileIdsFunction;
    5913             : 
    5914             : protected:
    5915             :   class AutoSetProgressHandler;
    5916             : 
    5917             :   typedef nsDataHashtable<nsUint64HashKey, bool> UniqueIndexTable;
    5918             : 
    5919             :   nsCOMPtr<nsIEventTarget> mOwningThread;
    5920             :   const nsID mBackgroundChildLoggingId;
    5921             :   const uint64_t mLoggingSerialNumber;
    5922             :   nsresult mResultCode;
    5923             : 
    5924             : private:
    5925             :   Atomic<bool> mOperationMayProceed;
    5926             :   bool mActorDestroyed;
    5927             : 
    5928             : public:
    5929             :   NS_DECL_ISUPPORTS_INHERITED
    5930             : 
    5931             :   bool
    5932           0 :   IsOnOwningThread() const
    5933             :   {
    5934             :     MOZ_ASSERT(mOwningThread);
    5935             : 
    5936             :     bool current;
    5937           0 :     return NS_SUCCEEDED(mOwningThread->IsOnCurrentThread(&current)) && current;
    5938             :   }
    5939             : 
    5940             :   void
    5941             :   AssertIsOnOwningThread() const
    5942             :   {
    5943             :     MOZ_ASSERT(IsOnBackgroundThread());
    5944             :     MOZ_ASSERT(IsOnOwningThread());
    5945             :   }
    5946             : 
    5947             :   void

    6150             : class TransactionDatabaseOperationBase
    6151             :   : public DatabaseOperationBase
    6152             : {
    6153             :   enum class InternalState
    6154             :   {
    6155             :     Initial,
    6156             :     DatabaseWork,
    6157             :     SendingPreprocess,
    6158             :     WaitingForContinue,
    6159             :     SendingResults,
    6160             :     Completed
    6161             :   };
    6162             : 
    6163             :   RefPtr<TransactionBase> mTransaction;
    6164             :   const int64_t mTransactionLoggingSerialNumber;
    6165             :   InternalState mInternalState;
    6166             :   const bool mTransactionIsAborted;
    6167             : 
    6168             : public:
    6169             :   void
    6170             :   AssertIsOnConnectionThread() const
    6171             : #ifdef DEBUG
    6172             :   ;
    6173             : #else
    6174             :   { }
    6175             : #endif
    6176             : 
    6177             :   uint64_t
    6178             :   StartOnConnectionPool(const nsID& aBackgroundChildLoggingId,
    6179             :                         const nsACString& aDatabaseId,
    6180             :                         int64_t aLoggingSerialNumber,
    6181             :                         const nsTArray<nsString>& aObjectStoreNames,
    6182             :                         bool aIsWriteTransaction);
    6183             : 
    6184             :   void
    6185             :   DispatchToConnectionPool();
    6186             : 
    6187             :   TransactionBase*
    6188             :   Transaction() const
    6189             :   {
    6190             :     MOZ_ASSERT(mTransaction);
    6191             : 
    6192           0 :     return mTransaction;
    6193             :   }
    6194             : 
    6195             :   void
    6196             :   NoteContinueReceived();
    6197             : 
    6198             :   // May be overridden by subclasses if they need to perform work on the
    6199             :   // background thread before being dispatched. Returning false will kill the
    6200             :   // child actors and prevent dispatch.
    6201             :   virtual bool
    6202             :   Init(TransactionBase* aTransaction);
    6203             : 
    6204             :   // This callback will be called on the background thread before releasing the
    6205             :   // final reference to this request object. Subclasses may perform any
    6206             :   // additional cleanup here but must always call the base class implementation.
    6207             :   virtual void
    6208             :   Cleanup();
    6209             : 
    6210             : protected:
    6211             :   explicit
    6212             :   TransactionDatabaseOperationBase(TransactionBase* aTransaction);
    6213             : 
    6214             :   TransactionDatabaseOperationBase(TransactionBase* aTransaction,
    6215             :                                    uint64_t aLoggingSerialNumber);
    6216             : 
    6217             :   ~TransactionDatabaseOperationBase() override;
    6218             : 
    6219             :   virtual void
    6220             :   RunOnConnectionThread();
    6221             : 
    6222             :   // Must be overridden in subclasses. Called on the target thread to allow the
    6223             :   // subclass to perform necessary database or file operations. A successful
    6224             :   // return value will trigger a SendSuccessResult callback on the background
    6225             :   // thread while a failure value will trigger a SendFailureResult callback.
    6226             :   virtual nsresult
    6227             :   DoDatabaseWork(DatabaseConnection* aConnection) = 0;
    6228             : 
    6229             :   // May be overriden in subclasses. Called on the background thread to decide
    6230             :   // if the subclass needs to send any preprocess info to the child actor.
    6231             :   virtual bool
    6232             :   HasPreprocessInfo();
    6233             : 
    6234             :   // May be overriden in subclasses. Called on the background thread to allow
    6235             :   // the subclass to serialize its preprocess info and send it to the child
    6236             :   // actor. A successful return value will trigger a wait for a
    6237             :   // NoteContinueReceived callback on the background thread while a failure
    6238             :   // value will trigger a SendFailureResult callback.
    6239             :   virtual nsresult
    6240             :   SendPreprocessInfo();
    6241             : 
    6242             :   // Must be overridden in subclasses. Called on the background thread to allow
    6243             :   // the subclass to serialize its results and send them to the child actor. A
    6244             :   // failed return value will trigger a SendFailureResult callback.
    6245             :   virtual nsresult
    6246             :   SendSuccessResult() = 0;
    6247             : 
    6248             :   // Must be overridden in subclasses. Called on the background thread to allow
    6249             :   // the subclass to send its failure code. Returning false will cause the
    6250             :   // transaction to be aborted with aResultCode. Returning true will not cause
    6251             :   // the transaction to be aborted.
    6252             :   virtual bool
    6253             :   SendFailureResult(nsresult aResultCode) = 0;
    6254             : 
    6255             : private:
    6256             :   void
    6257             :   SendToConnectionPool();
    6258             : 
    6259             :   void
    6260             :   SendPreprocess();
    6261             : 
    6262             :   void
    6263             :   SendResults();
    6264             : 
    6265             :   void
    6266             :   SendPreprocessInfoOrResults(bool aSendPreprocessInfo);
    6267             : 
    6268             :   // Not to be overridden by subclasses.
    6269             :   NS_DECL_NSIRUNNABLE
    6270             : };

    6578             :
