    6717             : 
    6718             : class Database::StartTransactionOp final
    6719             :   : public TransactionDatabaseOperationBase
    6720             : {
    6721             :   friend class Database;
    6722             : 
    6723             : private:
    6724             :   explicit
    6725           0 :   StartTransactionOp(TransactionBase* aTransaction)
    6726             :     : TransactionDatabaseOperationBase(aTransaction,
    6727           0 :                                        /* aLoggingSerialNumber */ 0)
    6728           0 :   { }
    6729             : 
    6730           0 :   ~StartTransactionOp() override = default;
    6731             : 
    6732             :   void
    6733             :   RunOnConnectionThread() override;
    6734             : 
    6735             :   nsresult
    6736             :   DoDatabaseWork(DatabaseConnection* aConnection) override;
    6737             : 
    6738             :   nsresult
    6739             :   SendSuccessResult() override;
    6740             : 
    6741             :   bool
    6742             :   SendFailureResult(nsresult aResultCode) override;
    6743             : 
    6744             :   void
    6745             :   Cleanup() override;
    6746             : };
    6747             : 
    6748             : /**
    6749             :  * In coordination with IDBDatabase's mFileActors weak-map on the child side, a
    6750             :  * long-lived mapping from a child process's live Blobs to their corresponding
    6751             :  * FileInfo in our owning database.  Assists in avoiding redundant IPC traffic
    6752             :  * and disk storage.  This includes both:
    6753             :  * - Blobs retrieved from this database and sent to the child that do not need
    6754             :  *   to be written to disk because they already exist on disk in this database's
    6755             :  *   files directory.
    6756             :  * - Blobs retrieved from other databases (that are therefore !IsShareable())
    6757             :  *   or from anywhere else that will need to be written to this database's files
    6758             :  *   directory.  In this case we will hold a reference to its BlobImpl in
    6759             :  *   mBlobImpl until we have successfully written the Blob to disk.
    6760             :  *
    6761             :  * Relevant Blob context: Blobs sent from the parent process to child processes
    6762             :  * are automatically linked back to their source BlobImpl when the child process
    6763             :  * references the Blob via IPC.  (This is true even when a new "KnownBlob" actor
    6764             :  * must be created because the reference is occurring on a different thread than
    6765             :  * the PBlob actor created when the blob was sent to the child.)  However, when
    6766             :  * getting an actor in the child process for sending an in-child-created Blob to
    6767             :  * the parent process, there is (currently) no Blob machinery to automatically
    6768             :  * establish and reuse a long-lived Actor.  As a result, without IDB's weak-map
    6769             :  * cleverness, a memory-backed Blob repeatedly sent from the child to the parent
    6770             :  * would appear as a different Blob each time, requiring the Blob data to be
    6771             :  * sent over IPC each time as well as potentially needing to be written to disk
    6772             :  * each time.
    6773             :  *
    6774             :  * This object remains alive as long as there is an active child actor or an
    6775             :  * ObjectStoreAddOrPutRequestOp::StoredFileInfo for a queued or active add/put
    6776             :  * op is holding a reference to us.
    6777             :  */
    6778             : class DatabaseFile final
    6779             :   : public PBackgroundIDBDatabaseFileParent
    6780             : {
    6781             :   friend class Database;
    6782             : 
    6783             :   // mBlobImpl's ownership lifecycle:
    6784             :   // - Initialized on the background thread at creation time.  Then
    6785             :   //   responsibility is handed off to the connection thread.
    6786             :   // - Checked and used by the connection thread to generate a stream to write
    6787             :   //   the blob to disk by an add/put operation.
    6788             :   // - Cleared on the connection thread once the file has successfully been
    6789             :   //   written to disk.
    6790             :   RefPtr<BlobImpl> mBlobImpl;
    6791             :   RefPtr<FileInfo> mFileInfo;
    6792             : 
    6793             : public:
    6794           0 :   NS_INLINE_DECL_THREADSAFE_REFCOUNTING(mozilla::dom::indexedDB::DatabaseFile);
    6795             : 
    6796             :   FileInfo*
    6797             :   GetFileInfo() const
    6798             :   {
    6799             :     AssertIsOnBackgroundThread();
    6800             : 
    6801           0 :     return mFileInfo;
    6802             :   }
    6803             : 
    6804             :   /**
    6805             :    * If mBlobImpl is non-null (implying the contents of this file have not yet
    6806             :    * been written to disk), then return an input stream that is guaranteed to
    6807             :    * block on reads and never return NS_BASE_STREAM_WOULD_BLOCK.  If mBlobImpl
    6808             :    * is null (because the contents have been written to disk), returns null.
    6809             :    *
    6810             :    * Because this method does I/O, it should only be called on a database I/O
    6811             :    * thread, not on PBackground.  Note that we actually open the stream on this
    6812             :    * thread, where previously it was opened on PBackground.  This is safe and
    6813             :    * equally efficient because blob implementations are thread-safe and blobs in
    6814             :    * the parent are fully populated.  (This would not be efficient in the child
    6815             :    * where the open request would have to be dispatched back to the PBackground
    6816             :    * thread because of the need to potentially interact with actors.)
    6817             :    *
    6818             :    * We enforce this guarantee by wrapping the stream in a blocking pipe unless
    6819             :    * either is true:
    6820             :    * - The stream is already a blocking stream.  (AKA it's not non-blocking.)
    6821             :    *   This is the case for nsFileStreamBase-derived implementations and
    6822             :    *   appropriately configured nsPipes (but not PSendStream-generated pipes).
    6823             :    * - The stream already contains the entire contents of the Blob.  For
    6824             :    *   example, nsStringInputStreams report as non-blocking, but also have their
    6825             :    *   entire contents synchronously available, so they will never return
    6826             :    *   NS_BASE_STREAM_WOULD_BLOCK.  There is no need to wrap these in a pipe.
    6827             :    *   (It's also very common for SendStream-based Blobs to have their contents
    6828             :    *   entirely streamed into the parent process by the time this call is
    6829             :    *   issued.)
    6830             :    *
    6831             :    * This additional logic is necessary because our database operations all
    6832             :    * are written in such a way that the operation is assumed to have completed
    6833             :    * when they yield control-flow, and:
    6834             :    * - When memory-backed blobs cross a certain threshold (1MiB at the time of
    6835             :    *   writing), they will be sent up from the child via PSendStream in chunks
    6836             :    *   to a non-blocking pipe that will return NS_BASE_STREAM_WOULD_BLOCK.
    6837             :    * - Other Blob types could potentially be non-blocking.  (We're not making
    6838             :    *   any assumptions.)
    6839             :    */
    6840             :   already_AddRefed<nsIInputStream>
    6841             :   GetBlockingInputStream(ErrorResult &rv) const;
    6842             : 
    6843             :   /**
    6844             :    * To be called upon successful copying of the stream GetBlockingInputStream()
    6845             :    * returned so that we won't try and redundantly write the file to disk in the
    6846             :    * future.  This is a separate step from GetBlockingInputStream() because
    6847             :    * the write could fail due to quota errors that happen now but that might
    6848             :    * not happen in a future attempt.
    6849             :    */
    6850             :   void
    6851             :   WriteSucceededClearBlobImpl()
    6852             :   {
    6853             :     MOZ_ASSERT(!IsOnBackgroundThread());
    6854             : 
    6855           0 :     mBlobImpl = nullptr;
    6856             :   }
    6857             : 
    6858             : private:
    6859             :   // Called when sending to the child.
    6860           0 :   explicit DatabaseFile(FileInfo* aFileInfo)
    6861           0 :     : mFileInfo(aFileInfo)
    6862             :   {
    6863             :     AssertIsOnBackgroundThread();
    6864             :     MOZ_ASSERT(aFileInfo);
    6865           0 :   }
    6866             : 
    6867             :   // Called when receiving from the child.
    6868           0 :   DatabaseFile(BlobImpl* aBlobImpl, FileInfo* aFileInfo)
    6869             :     : mBlobImpl(aBlobImpl)
    6870           0 :     , mFileInfo(aFileInfo)
    6871             :   {
    6872             :     AssertIsOnBackgroundThread();
    6873             :     MOZ_ASSERT(aBlobImpl);
    6874             :     MOZ_ASSERT(aFileInfo);
    6875           0 :   }
    6876             : 
    6877           0 :   ~DatabaseFile() override = default;
    6878             : 
    6879             :   void
    6880           0 :   ActorDestroy(ActorDestroyReason aWhy) override
    6881             :   {
    6882             :     AssertIsOnBackgroundThread();
    6883           0 :   }
    6884             : };
    6885             : 
    6886             : already_AddRefed<nsIInputStream>
    6887           0 : DatabaseFile::GetBlockingInputStream(ErrorResult &rv) const
    6888             : {
    6889             :   // We should only be called from our DB connection thread, not the background
    6890             :   // thread.
    6891             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!IsOnBackgroundThread());
    6892             : 
    6893           0 :   if (!mBlobImpl) {
    6894           0 :     return nullptr;
    6895             :   }
    6896             : 
    6897             :   nsCOMPtr<nsIInputStream> inputStream;
    6898           0 :   mBlobImpl->GetInternalStream(getter_AddRefs(inputStream), rv);
    6899           0 :   if (rv.Failed()) {
    6900           0 :     return nullptr;
    6901             :   }
    6902             : 
    6903             :   // If it's non-blocking we may need a pipe.
    6904             :   bool pipeNeeded;
    6905           0 :   rv = inputStream->IsNonBlocking(&pipeNeeded);
    6906           0 :   if (rv.Failed()) {
    6907           0 :     return nullptr;
    6908             :   }
    6909             : 
    6910             :   // We don't need a pipe if all the bytes might already be available.
    6911           0 :   if (pipeNeeded) {
    6912             :     uint64_t available;
    6913           0 :     rv = inputStream->Available(&available);
    6914           0 :     if (rv.Failed()) {
    6915           0 :       return nullptr;
    6916             :     }
    6917             : 
    6918           0 :     uint64_t blobSize = mBlobImpl->GetSize(rv);
    6919           0 :     if (rv.Failed()) {
    6920           0 :       return nullptr;
    6921             :     }
    6922             : 
    6923           0 :     if (available == blobSize) {
    6924           0 :       pipeNeeded = false;
    6925             :     }
    6926             :   }
    6927             : 
    6928           0 :   if (pipeNeeded) {
    6929             :     nsCOMPtr<nsIEventTarget> target =
    6930           0 :       do_GetService(NS_STREAMTRANSPORTSERVICE_CONTRACTID);
    6931           0 :     if (!target) {
    6932           0 :       rv.Throw(NS_ERROR_UNEXPECTED);
    6933           0 :       return nullptr;
    6934             :     }
    6935             : 
    6936             :     nsCOMPtr<nsIInputStream> pipeInputStream;
    6937             :     nsCOMPtr<nsIOutputStream> pipeOutputStream;
    6938             : 
    6939           0 :     rv = NS_NewPipe(
    6940             :       getter_AddRefs(pipeInputStream),
    6941             :       getter_AddRefs(pipeOutputStream),
    6942             :       0, 0, // default buffering is fine;
    6943             :       false, // we absolutely want a blocking input stream
    6944             :       true); // we don't need the writer to block
    6945           0 :     if (rv.Failed()) {
    6946           0 :       return nullptr;
    6947             :     }
    6948             : 
    6949           0 :     rv = NS_AsyncCopy(inputStream, pipeOutputStream, target);
    6950           0 :     if (rv.Failed()) {
    6951           0 :       return nullptr;
    6952             :     }
    6953             : 
    6954           0 :     inputStream = pipeInputStream;
    6955             :   }
    6956             : 
    6957             :   return inputStream.forget();
    6958             : }
    6959             :

    7157             :   void

    7159             :   {

    7161             : 
    7162             :     // If we've already committed or aborted then there's nothing else to do.
    7163           0 :     if (mCommittedOrAborted) {
    7164             :       return;
    7165             :     }
    7166             : 
    7167             :     // If there are active requests then we have to wait for those requests to
    7168             :     // complete (see NoteFinishedRequest).
    7169           0 :     if (mActiveRequestCount) {
    7170             :       return;
    7171             :     }
    7172             : 
    7173             :     // If we haven't yet received a commit or abort message then there could be
    7174             :     // additional requests coming so we should wait unless we're being forced to
    7175             :     // abort.
    7176           0 :     if (!mCommitOrAbortReceived && !mForceAborted) {
    7177             :       return;
    7178             :     }
    7179             : 
    7180           0 :     CommitOrAbort();
    7181             :   }
    7182             : 
    7183             :   PBackgroundIDBRequestParent*
    7184             :   AllocRequest(const RequestParams& aParams, bool aTrustParams);
    7185             : 
    7186             :   bool
    7187             :   StartRequest(PBackgroundIDBRequestParent* aActor);
    7188             : 
    7189             :   bool
    7190             :   DeallocRequest(PBackgroundIDBRequestParent* aActor);
    7191             : 
    7192             :   PBackgroundIDBCursorParent*
    7193             :   AllocCursor(const OpenCursorParams& aParams, bool aTrustParams);
    7194             : 
    7195             :   bool
    7196             :   StartCursor(PBackgroundIDBCursorParent* aActor,
    7197             :               const OpenCursorParams& aParams);
    7198             : 
    7199             :   bool
    7200             :   DeallocCursor(PBackgroundIDBCursorParent* aActor);
    7201             : 
    7202             :   virtual void
    7203           0 :   UpdateMetadata(nsresult aResult)
    7204           0 :   { }
    7205             : 
    7206             :   virtual void
    7207             :   SendCompleteNotification(nsresult aResult) = 0;
    7208             : 
    7209             : private:
    7210             :   bool
    7211             :   VerifyRequestParams(const RequestParams& aParams) const;
    7212             : 
    7213             :   bool
    7214             :   VerifyRequestParams(const SerializedKeyRange& aKeyRange) const;
    7215             :

    7489             : 
    7490             : class FactoryOp
    7491             :   : public DatabaseOperationBase
    7492             :   , public OpenDirectoryListener
    7493             :   , public PBackgroundIDBFactoryRequestParent
    7494             : {
    7495             : public:
    7496             :   struct MaybeBlockedDatabaseInfo;
    7497             : 
    7498             : protected:
    7499             :   enum class State
    7500             :   {
    7501             :     // Just created on the PBackground thread, dispatched to the main thread.
    7502             :     // Next step is either SendingResults if permission is denied,
    7503             :     // PermissionChallenge if the permission is unknown, or FinishOpen
    7504             :     // if permission is granted.
    7505             :     Initial,
    7506             : 
    7507             :     // Sending a permission challenge message to the child on the PBackground
    7508             :     // thread. Next step is PermissionRetry.
    7509             :     PermissionChallenge,
    7510             : 
    7511             :     // Retrying permission check after a challenge on the main thread. Next step
    7512             :     // is either SendingResults if permission is denied or FinishOpen
    7513             :     // if permission is granted.
    7514             :     PermissionRetry,
    7515             : 
    7516             :     // Opening directory or initializing quota manager on the PBackground
    7517             :     // thread. Next step is either DirectoryOpenPending if quota manager is
    7518             :     // already initialized or QuotaManagerPending if quota manager needs to be
    7519             :     // initialized.
    7520             :     FinishOpen,
    7521             : 
    7522             :     // Waiting for quota manager initialization to complete on the PBackground
    7523             :     // thread. Next step is either SendingResults if initialization failed or
    7524             :     // DirectoryOpenPending if initialization succeeded.
    7525             :     QuotaManagerPending,
    7526             : 
    7527             :     // Waiting for directory open allowed on the PBackground thread. The next
    7528             :     // step is either SendingResults if directory lock failed to acquire, or
    7529             :     // DatabaseOpenPending if directory lock is acquired.
    7530             :     DirectoryOpenPending,
    7531             : 
    7532             :     // Waiting for database open allowed on the PBackground thread. The next
    7533             :     // step is DatabaseWorkOpen.
    7534             :     DatabaseOpenPending,
    7535             : 
    7536             :     // Waiting to do/doing work on the QuotaManager IO thread. Its next step is
    7537             :     // either BeginVersionChange if the requested version doesn't match the
    7538             :     // existing database version or SendingResults if the versions match.
    7539             :     DatabaseWorkOpen,
    7540             : 
    7541             :     // Starting a version change transaction or deleting a database on the
    7542             :     // PBackground thread. We need to notify other databases that a version
    7543             :     // change is about to happen, and maybe tell the request that a version
    7544             :     // change has been blocked. If databases are notified then the next step is
    7545             :     // WaitingForOtherDatabasesToClose. Otherwise the next step is
    7546             :     // WaitingForTransactionsToComplete.
    7547             :     BeginVersionChange,
    7548             : 
    7549             :     // Waiting for other databases to close on the PBackground thread. This
    7550             :     // state may persist until all databases are closed. The next state is
    7551             :     // WaitingForTransactionsToComplete.
    7552             :     WaitingForOtherDatabasesToClose,
    7553             : 
    7554             :     // Waiting for all transactions that could interfere with this operation to
    7555             :     // complete on the PBackground thread. Next state is
    7556             :     // DatabaseWorkVersionChange.
    7557             :     WaitingForTransactionsToComplete,
    7558             : 
    7559             :     // Waiting to do/doing work on the "work thread". This involves waiting for
    7560             :     // the VersionChangeOp (OpenDatabaseOp and DeleteDatabaseOp each have a
    7561             :     // different implementation) to do its work. Eventually the state will
    7562             :     // transition to SendingResults.
    7563             :     DatabaseWorkVersionChange,
    7564             : 
    7565             :     // Waiting to send/sending results on the PBackground thread. Next step is
    7566             :     // Completed.
    7567             :     SendingResults,
    7568             : 
    7569             :     // All done.
    7570             :     Completed
    7571             :   };
    7572             : 
    7573             :   // Must be released on the background thread!
    7574             :   RefPtr<Factory> mFactory;
    7575             : 
    7576             :   // Must be released on the main thread!
    7577             :   RefPtr<ContentParent> mContentParent;
    7578             : 
    7579             :   // Must be released on the main thread!
    7580             :   RefPtr<DirectoryLock> mDirectoryLock;
    7581             : 
    7582             :   RefPtr<FactoryOp> mDelayedOp;
    7583             :   nsTArray<MaybeBlockedDatabaseInfo> mMaybeBlockedDatabases;
    7584             : 
    7585             :   const CommonFactoryRequestParams mCommonParams;
    7586             :   nsCString mSuffix;
    7587             :   nsCString mGroup;
    7588             :   nsCString mOrigin;
    7589             :   nsCString mDatabaseId;
    7590             :   nsString mDatabaseFilePath;
    7591             :   State mState;
    7592             :   bool mEnforcingQuota;
    7593             :   const bool mDeleting;
    7594             :   bool mBlockedDatabaseOpen;
    7595             :   bool mChromeWriteAccessAllowed;
    7596             :   bool mFileHandleDisabled;
    7597             : 
    7598             : public:
    7599             :   void
    7600             :   NoteDatabaseBlocked(Database* aDatabase);
    7601             : 
    7602             :   virtual void
    7603             :   NoteDatabaseClosed(Database* aDatabase) = 0;
    7604             : 
    7605             : #ifdef DEBUG
    7606             :   bool
    7607             :   HasBlockedDatabases() const
    7608             :   {
    7609             :     return !mMaybeBlockedDatabases.IsEmpty();
    7610             :   }
    7611             : #endif
    7612             : 
    7613             :   const nsString&
    7614             :   DatabaseFilePath() const
    7615             :   {
    7616             :     return mDatabaseFilePath;
    7617             :   }
    7618             : 
    7619             : protected:
    7620             :   FactoryOp(Factory* aFactory,
    7621             :             already_AddRefed<ContentParent> aContentParent,
    7622             :             const CommonFactoryRequestParams& aCommonParams,
    7623             :             bool aDeleting);
    7624             : 
    7625           0 :   ~FactoryOp() override
    7626           0 :   {
    7627             :     // Normally this would be out-of-line since it is a virtual function but
    7628             :     // MSVC 2010 fails to link for some reason if it is not inlined here...
    7629             :     MOZ_ASSERT_IF(OperationMayProceed(),
    7630             :                   mState == State::Initial || mState == State::Completed);
    7631           0 :   }
    7632             : 
    7633             :   nsresult
    7634             :   Open();
    7635             : 
    7636             :   nsresult
    7637             :   ChallengePermission();
    7638             : 
    7639             :   nsresult
    7640             :   RetryCheckPermission();
    7641             : 
    7642             :   nsresult
    7643             :   DirectoryOpen();
    7644             : 
    7645             :   nsresult
    7646             :   SendToIOThread();
    7647             : 
    7648             :   void
    7649             :   WaitForTransactions();
    7650             : 
    7651             :   void
    7652             :   FinishSendResults();
    7653             : 
    7654             :   nsresult
    7655             :   SendVersionChangeMessages(DatabaseActorInfo* aDatabaseActorInfo,
    7656             :                             Database* aOpeningDatabase,
    7657             :                             uint64_t aOldVersion,
    7658             :                             const NullableVersion& aNewVersion);
    7659             : 
    7660             :   // Methods that subclasses must implement.
    7661             :   virtual nsresult
    7662             :   DatabaseOpen() = 0;
    7663             : 
    7664             :   virtual nsresult
    7665             :   DoDatabaseWork() = 0;
    7666             : 
    7667             :   virtual nsresult

    7669             : 
    7670             :   virtual nsresult
    7671             :   DispatchToWorkThread() = 0;
    7672             : 
    7673             :   virtual void
    7674             :   SendResults() = 0;
    7675             : 
    7676             :   NS_DECL_ISUPPORTS_INHERITED
    7677             : 
    7678             :   // Common nsIRunnable implementation that subclasses may not override.
    7679             :   NS_IMETHOD
    7680             :   Run() final;
    7681             : 
    7682             :   // OpenDirectoryListener overrides.
    7683             :   void
    7684             :   DirectoryLockAcquired(DirectoryLock* aLock) override;
    7685             : 
    7686             :   void
    7687             :   DirectoryLockFailed() override;
    7688             : 
    7689             :   // IPDL methods.
    7690             :   void
    7691             :   ActorDestroy(ActorDestroyReason aWhy) override;
    7692             :

    7694             :   RecvPermissionRetry() override;
    7695             : 
    7696             :   virtual void
    7697             :   SendBlockedNotification() = 0;
    7698             : 
    7699             : private:
    7700             :   nsresult
    7701             :   CheckPermission(ContentParent* aContentParent,
    7702             :                   PermissionRequestBase::PermissionValue* aPermission);
    7703             : 
    7704             :   static bool
    7705             :   CheckAtLeastOneAppHasPermission(ContentParent* aContentParent,
    7706             :                                   const nsACString& aPermissionString);
    7707             : 
    7708             :   nsresult
    7709             :   FinishOpen();
    7710             :

    7712             :   QuotaManagerOpen();

    7716             :

    7718             :   bool
    7719             :   MustWaitFor(const FactoryOp& aExistingOp);

    7721             : 
    7722             : struct FactoryOp::MaybeBlockedDatabaseInfo final
    7723             : {
    7724             :   RefPtr<Database> mDatabase;
    7725             :   bool mBlocked;
    7726             : 
    7727           0 :   MOZ_IMPLICIT MaybeBlockedDatabaseInfo(Database* aDatabase)
    7728             :     : mDatabase(aDatabase)
    7729           0 :     , mBlocked(false)
    7730             :   {
    7731             :     MOZ_ASSERT(aDatabase);
    7732             : 
    7733             :     MOZ_COUNT_CTOR(FactoryOp::MaybeBlockedDatabaseInfo);
    7734           0 :   }
    7735             : 
    7736             :   ~MaybeBlockedDatabaseInfo()
    7737           0 :   {
    7738             :     MOZ_COUNT_DTOR(FactoryOp::MaybeBlockedDatabaseInfo);
    7739           0 :   }
    7740             : 
    7741             :   bool
    7742             :   operator==(const MaybeBlockedDatabaseInfo& aOther) const
    7743             :   {
    7744           0 :     return mDatabase == aOther.mDatabase;
    7745             :   }
    7746             : 
    7747             :   bool
    7748             :   operator<(const MaybeBlockedDatabaseInfo& aOther) const
    7749             :   {
    7750             :     return mDatabase < aOther.mDatabase;
    7751             :   }
    7752             : 
    7753             :   Database*
    7754             :   operator->() MOZ_NO_ADDREF_RELEASE_ON_RETURN
    7755             :   {
    7756           0 :     return mDatabase;
    7757             :   }
    7758             : };
    7759             : 
    7760             : class OpenDatabaseOp final
    7761             :   : public FactoryOp
    7762             : {
    7763             :   friend class Database;
    7764             :   friend class VersionChangeTransaction;
    7765             : 
    7766             :   class VersionChangeOp;
    7767             : 
    7768             :   Maybe<ContentParentId> mOptionalContentParentId;
    7769             : 
    7770             :   RefPtr<FullDatabaseMetadata> mMetadata;
    7771             : 
    7772             :   uint64_t mRequestedVersion;
    7773             :   RefPtr<FileManager> mFileManager;
    7774             : 
    7775             :   RefPtr<Database> mDatabase;
    7776             :   RefPtr<VersionChangeTransaction> mVersionChangeTransaction;
    7777             : 
    7778             :   // This is only set while a VersionChangeOp is live. It holds a strong
    7779             :   // reference to its OpenDatabaseOp object so this is a weak pointer to avoid
    7780             :   // cycles.
    7781             :   VersionChangeOp* mVersionChangeOp;
    7782             : 
    7783             :   uint32_t mTelemetryId;
    7784             : 
    7785             : public:
    7786             :   OpenDatabaseOp(Factory* aFactory,
    7787             :                  already_AddRefed<ContentParent> aContentParent,
    7788             :                  const CommonFactoryRequestParams& aParams);
    7789             : 
    7790             :   bool
    7791             :   IsOtherProcessActor() const
    7792             :   {
    7793             :     return mOptionalContentParentId.isSome();
    7794             :   }
    7795             : 
    7796             : private:
    7797           0 :   ~OpenDatabaseOp() override
    7798           0 :   {
    7799             :     MOZ_ASSERT(!mVersionChangeOp);
    7800           0 :   }

    7979             : 
    7980             : class DatabaseOp
    7981             :   : public DatabaseOperationBase
    7982             :   , public PBackgroundIDBDatabaseRequestParent
    7983             : {
    7984             : protected:
    7985             :   RefPtr<Database> mDatabase;
    7986             : 
    7987             :   enum class State
    7988             :   {
    7989             :     // Just created on the PBackground thread, dispatched to the main thread.
    7990             :     // Next step is DatabaseWork.
    7991             :     Initial,
    7992             : 
    7993             :     // Waiting to do/doing work on the QuotaManager IO thread. Next step is
    7994             :     // SendingResults.
    7995             :     DatabaseWork,
    7996             : 
    7997             :     // Waiting to send/sending results on the PBackground thread. Next step is
    7998             :     // Completed.
    7999             :     SendingResults,
    8000             : 
    8001             :     // All done.
    8002             :     Completed
    8003             :   };
    8004             : 
    8005             :   State mState;
    8006             : 
    8007             : public:
    8008             :   void
    8009             :   RunImmediately()
    8010             :   {
    8011             :     MOZ_ASSERT(mState == State::Initial);
    8012             : 
    8013           0 :     Unused << this->Run();
    8014             :   }
    8015             : 
    8016             : protected:
    8017             :   DatabaseOp(Database* aDatabase);
    8018             : 
    8019           0 :   ~DatabaseOp() override
    8020           0 :   {
    8021             :     MOZ_ASSERT_IF(OperationMayProceed(),
    8022             :                   mState == State::Initial || mState == State::Completed);
    8023           0 :   }
    8024             : 
    8025             :   nsresult
    8026             :   SendToIOThread();
    8027             : 
    8028             :   // Methods that subclasses must implement.
    8029             :   virtual nsresult
    8030             :   DoDatabaseWork() = 0;
    8031             : 
    8032             :   virtual void
    8033             :   SendResults() = 0;
    8034             : 
    8035             :   // Common nsIRunnable implementation that subclasses may not override.
    8036             :   NS_IMETHOD
    8037             :   Run() final;
    8038             : 
    8039             :   // IPDL methods.
    8040             :   void
    8041             :   ActorDestroy(ActorDestroyReason aWhy) override;
    8042             : };

    8379           0 :   ~NormalTransactionOp() override = default;
    8380             : 
    8381             :   // An overload of DatabaseOperationBase's function that can avoid doing extra
    8382             :   // work on non-versionchange transactions.

    8385             :                         DatabaseConnection* aConnection,

    8415             : 
    8416             : class ObjectStoreAddOrPutRequestOp final
    8417             :   : public NormalTransactionOp
    8418             : {
    8419             :   friend class TransactionBase;
    8420             : 
    8421             :   typedef mozilla::dom::quota::PersistenceType PersistenceType;
    8422             : 
    8423             :   struct StoredFileInfo;
    8424             :   class SCInputStream;
    8425             : 
    8426             :   const ObjectStoreAddPutParams mParams;
    8427             :   Maybe<UniqueIndexTable> mUniqueIndexTable;
    8428             : 
    8429             :   // This must be non-const so that we can update the mNextAutoIncrementId field
    8430             :   // if we are modifying an autoIncrement objectStore.
    8431             :   RefPtr<FullObjectStoreMetadata> mMetadata;
    8432             : 
    8433             :   FallibleTArray<StoredFileInfo> mStoredFileInfos;
    8434             : 
    8435             :   Key mResponse;
    8436             :   const nsCString mGroup;
    8437             :   const nsCString mOrigin;

    8465             : 
    8466             : struct ObjectStoreAddOrPutRequestOp::StoredFileInfo final
    8467             : {
    8468             :   RefPtr<DatabaseFile> mFileActor;
    8469             :   RefPtr<FileInfo> mFileInfo;
    8470             :   // A non-Blob-backed inputstream to write to disk.  If null, mFileActor may
    8471             :   // still have a stream for us to write.
    8472             :   nsCOMPtr<nsIInputStream> mInputStream;
    8473             :   StructuredCloneFile::FileType mType;
    8474             : 
    8475             :   StoredFileInfo()
    8476           0 :     : mType(StructuredCloneFile::eBlob)
    8477             :   {
    8478             :     AssertIsOnBackgroundThread();
    8479             : 
    8480             :     MOZ_COUNT_CTOR(ObjectStoreAddOrPutRequestOp::StoredFileInfo);
    8481             :   }
    8482             : 
    8483           0 :   ~StoredFileInfo()
    8484           0 :   {
    8485             :     AssertIsOnBackgroundThread();
    8486             : 
    8487             :     MOZ_COUNT_DTOR(ObjectStoreAddOrPutRequestOp::StoredFileInfo);
    8488           0 :   }
    8489             : 
    8490             :   void
    8491           0 :   Serialize(nsString& aText)
    8492             :   {
    8493             :     MOZ_ASSERT(mFileInfo);
    8494             : 
    8495           0 :     const int64_t id = mFileInfo->Id();
    8496             : 
    8497           0 :     switch (mType) {
    8498             :       case StructuredCloneFile::eBlob:
    8499           0 :         aText.AppendInt(id);
    8500           0 :         break;
    8501             : 
    8502             :       case StructuredCloneFile::eMutableFile:
    8503           0 :         aText.AppendInt(-id);
    8504           0 :         break;
    8505             : 
    8506             :       case StructuredCloneFile::eStructuredClone:
    8507           0 :         aText.Append('.');
    8508           0 :         aText.AppendInt(id);
    8509           0 :         break;
    8510             : 
    8511             :       case StructuredCloneFile::eWasmBytecode:
    8512           0 :         aText.Append('/');
    8513           0 :         aText.AppendInt(id);
    8514           0 :         break;
    8515             : 
    8516             :       case StructuredCloneFile::eWasmCompiled:
    8517           0 :         aText.Append('\\');
    8518           0 :         aText.AppendInt(id);
    8519           0 :         break;
    8520             : 
    8521             :       default:
    8522           0 :         MOZ_CRASH("Should never get here!");
    8523             :     }
    8524           0 :   }
    8525             : };

    9058             :

    9196             : class BlobImplStoredFile final
    9197             :   : public FileBlobImpl
    9198             : {
    9199             :   RefPtr<FileInfo> mFileInfo;
    9200             :   const bool mSnapshot;
    9201             : 
    9202             : public:
    9203           0 :   BlobImplStoredFile(nsIFile* aFile, FileInfo* aFileInfo, bool aSnapshot)
    9204             :     : FileBlobImpl(aFile)
    9205             :     , mFileInfo(aFileInfo)
    9206           0 :     , mSnapshot(aSnapshot)
    9207             :   {
    9208             :     AssertIsOnBackgroundThread();
    9209             : 
    9210             :     // Getting the content type is not currently supported off the main thread.
    9211             :     // This isn't a problem here because:
    9212             :     //
    9213             :     //   1. The real content type is stored in the structured clone data and
    9214             :     //      that's all that the DOM will see. This blob's data will be updated
    9215             :     //      during RecvSetMysteryBlobInfo().
    9216             :     //   2. The nsExternalHelperAppService guesses the content type based only
    9217             :     //      on the file extension. Our stored files have no extension so the
    9218             :     //      current code path fails and sets the content type to the empty
    9219             :     //      string.
    9220             :     //
    9221             :     // So, this is a hack to keep the nsExternalHelperAppService out of the
    9222             :     // picture entirely. Eventually we should probably fix this some other way.
    9223           0 :     mContentType.Truncate();
    9224           0 :     mIsFile = false;
    9225           0 :   }
    9226             : 
    9227             :   bool
    9228           0 :   IsShareable(FileManager* aFileManager) const
    9229             :   {
    9230             :     AssertIsOnBackgroundThread();
    9231             : 
    9232           0 :     return mFileInfo->Manager() == aFileManager && !mSnapshot;
    9233             :   }
    9234             :

    9410             :   // Runs on the PBackground thread. Checks to see if there's a queued
    9411             :   // Maintenance to run.
    9412             :   void
    9413             :   ProcessMaintenanceQueue();
    9414             : };
    9415             : 
    9416             : class Maintenance final
    9417             :   : public Runnable
    9418             :   , public OpenDirectoryListener
    9419             : {
    9420             :   struct DirectoryInfo;
    9421             : 
    9422             :   enum class State
    9423             :   {
    9424             :     // Newly created on the PBackground thread. Will proceed immediately or be
    9425             :     // added to the maintenance queue. The next step is either
    9426             :     // DirectoryOpenPending if IndexedDatabaseManager is running, or
    9427             :     // CreateIndexedDatabaseManager if not.
    9428             :     Initial = 0,
    9429             : 
    9430             :     // Create IndexedDatabaseManager on the main thread. The next step is either
    9431             :     // Finishing if IndexedDatabaseManager initialization fails, or
    9432             :     // IndexedDatabaseManagerOpen if initialization succeeds.
    9433             :     CreateIndexedDatabaseManager,
    9434             : 
    9435             :     // Call OpenDirectory() on the PBackground thread. The next step is
    9436             :     // DirectoryOpenPending.
    9437             :     IndexedDatabaseManagerOpen,
    9438             : 
    9439             :     // Waiting for directory open allowed on the PBackground thread. The next
    9440             :     // step is either Finishing if directory lock failed to acquire, or
    9441             :     // DirectoryWorkOpen if directory lock is acquired.
    9442             :     DirectoryOpenPending,
    9443             : 
    9444             :     // Waiting to do/doing work on the QuotaManager IO thread. The next step is
    9445             :     // BeginDatabaseMaintenance.
    9446             :     DirectoryWorkOpen,
    9447             : 
    9448             :     // Dispatching a runnable for each database on the PBackground thread. The
    9449             :     // next state is either WaitingForDatabaseMaintenancesToComplete if at least
    9450             :     // one runnable has been dispatched, or Finishing otherwise.
    9451             :     BeginDatabaseMaintenance,
    9452             : 
    9453             :     // Waiting for DatabaseMaintenance to finish on maintenance thread pool.
    9454             :     // The next state is Finishing if the last runnable has finished.
    9455             :     WaitingForDatabaseMaintenancesToComplete,
    9456             : 
    9457             :     // Waiting to finish/finishing on the PBackground thread. The next step is
    9458             :     // Completed.
    9459             :     Finishing,
    9460             : 
    9461             :     // All done.
    9462             :     Complete
    9463             :   };
    9464             : 
    9465             :   RefPtr<QuotaClient> mQuotaClient;
    9466             :   PRTime mStartTime;
    9467             :   RefPtr<DirectoryLock> mDirectoryLock;
    9468             :   nsTArray<DirectoryInfo> mDirectoryInfos;
    9469             :   nsDataHashtable<nsStringHashKey, DatabaseMaintenance*> mDatabaseMaintenances;
    9470             :   Atomic<bool> mAborted;
    9471             :   State mState;
    9472             : 
    9473             : public:
    9474           0 :   explicit Maintenance(QuotaClient* aQuotaClient)
    9475             :     : mQuotaClient(aQuotaClient)
    9476           0 :     , mStartTime(PR_Now())
    9477             :     , mAborted(false)
    9478           0 :     , mState(State::Initial)
    9479             :   {
    9480             :     AssertIsOnBackgroundThread();
    9481             :     MOZ_ASSERT(aQuotaClient);
    9482             :     MOZ_ASSERT(QuotaClient::GetInstance() == aQuotaClient);
    9483             :     MOZ_ASSERT(mStartTime);
    9484           0 :   }
    9485             : 
    9486             :   nsIEventTarget*
    9487             :   BackgroundThread() const
    9488             :   {
    9489             :     MOZ_ASSERT(mQuotaClient);
    9490           0 :     return mQuotaClient->BackgroundThread();
    9491             :   }
    9492             : 
    9493             :   PRTime
    9494             :   StartTime() const
    9495             :   {
    9496             :     return mStartTime;
    9497             :   }
    9498             : 
    9499             :   bool
    9500             :   IsAborted() const
    9501             :   {
    9502           0 :     return mAborted;
    9503             :   }
    9504             : 
    9505             :   void
    9506             :   RunImmediately()
    9507             :   {
    9508             :     MOZ_ASSERT(mState == State::Initial);
    9509             : 
    9510           0 :     Unused << this->Run();
    9511             :   }
    9512             : 
    9513             :   void
    9514           0 :   Abort()
    9515             :   {
    9516             :     AssertIsOnBackgroundThread();
    9517             : 
    9518           0 :     mAborted = true;
    9519           0 :   }
    9520             : 
    9521             :   void
    9522             :   RegisterDatabaseMaintenance(DatabaseMaintenance* aDatabaseMaintenance);
    9523             : 
    9524             :   void
    9525             :   UnregisterDatabaseMaintenance(DatabaseMaintenance* aDatabaseMaintenance);
    9526             : 
    9527             :   already_AddRefed<DatabaseMaintenance>
    9528           0 :   GetDatabaseMaintenance(const nsAString& aDatabasePath) const
    9529             :   {
    9530             :     AssertIsOnBackgroundThread();
    9531             : 
    9532             :     RefPtr<DatabaseMaintenance> result =
    9533           0 :       mDatabaseMaintenances.Get(aDatabasePath);
    9534           0 :     return result.forget();
    9535             :   }
    9536             : 
    9537             : private:
    9538           0 :   ~Maintenance() override
    9539           0 :   {
    9540             :     MOZ_ASSERT(mState == State::Complete);
    9541             :     MOZ_ASSERT(!mDatabaseMaintenances.Count());
    9542           0 :   }
    9543             : 
    9544             :   // Runs on the PBackground thread. Checks if IndexedDatabaseManager is
    9545             :   // running. Calls OpenDirectory() or dispatches to the main thread on which
    9546             :   // CreateIndexedDatabaseManager() is called.
    9547             :   nsresult
    9548             :   Start();
    9549             : 
    9550             :   // Runs on the main thread. Once IndexedDatabaseManager is created it will
    9551             :   // dispatch to the PBackground thread on which OpenDirectory() is called.
    9552             :   nsresult
    9553             :   CreateIndexedDatabaseManager();
    9554             : 
    9555             :   // Runs on the PBackground thread. Once QuotaManager has given a lock it will
    9556             :   // call DirectoryOpen().
    9557             :   nsresult
    9558             :   OpenDirectory();
    9559             : 
    9560             :   // Runs on the PBackground thread. Dispatches to the QuotaManager I/O thread.
    9561             :   nsresult
    9562             :   DirectoryOpen();
    9563             : 
    9564             :   // Runs on the QuotaManager I/O thread. Once it finds databases it will
    9565             :   // dispatch to the PBackground thread on which BeginDatabaseMaintenance()
    9566             :   // is called.
    9567             :   nsresult
    9568             :   DirectoryWork();
    9569             : 
    9570             :   // Runs on the PBackground thread. It dispatches a runnable for each database.
    9571             :   nsresult
    9572             :   BeginDatabaseMaintenance();
    9573             : 
    9574             :   // Runs on the PBackground thread. Called when the maintenance is finished or
    9575             :   // if any of above methods fails.
    9576             :   void
    9577             :   Finish();
    9578             : 
    9579             :   NS_DECL_ISUPPORTS_INHERITED
    9580             : 
    9581             :   NS_DECL_NSIRUNNABLE
    9582             : 
    9583             :   // OpenDirectoryListener overrides.
    9584             :   void
    9585             :   DirectoryLockAcquired(DirectoryLock* aLock) override;
    9586             : 
    9587             :   void
    9588             :   DirectoryLockFailed() override;
    9589             : };
    9590             : 
    9591             : struct Maintenance::DirectoryInfo final
    9592             : {
    9593             :   const nsCString mGroup;
    9594             :   const nsCString mOrigin;
    9595             :   nsTArray<nsString> mDatabasePaths;
    9596             :   const PersistenceType mPersistenceType;
    9597             : 
    9598           0 :   DirectoryInfo(PersistenceType aPersistenceType,
    9599             :                 const nsACString& aGroup,
    9600             :                 const nsACString& aOrigin,
    9601             :                 nsTArray<nsString>&& aDatabasePaths)
    9602             :    : mGroup(aGroup)
    9603             :    , mOrigin(aOrigin)
    9604             :    , mDatabasePaths(Move(aDatabasePaths))
    9605           0 :    , mPersistenceType(aPersistenceType)
    9606             :   {
    9607             :     MOZ_ASSERT(aPersistenceType != PERSISTENCE_TYPE_INVALID);
    9608             :     MOZ_ASSERT(!aGroup.IsEmpty());
    9609             :     MOZ_ASSERT(!aOrigin.IsEmpty());
    9610             : #ifdef DEBUG
    9611             :     MOZ_ASSERT(!mDatabasePaths.IsEmpty());
    9612             :     for (const nsString& databasePath : mDatabasePaths) {
    9613             :       MOZ_ASSERT(!databasePath.IsEmpty());
    9614             :     }
    9615             : #endif
    9616             : 
    9617             :     MOZ_COUNT_CTOR(Maintenance::DirectoryInfo);
    9618           0 :   }
    9619             : 
    9620           0 :   DirectoryInfo(DirectoryInfo&& aOther)
    9621           0 :     : mGroup(Move(aOther.mGroup))
    9622           0 :     , mOrigin(Move(aOther.mOrigin))
    9623           0 :     , mDatabasePaths(Move(aOther.mDatabasePaths))
    9624           0 :     , mPersistenceType(Move(aOther.mPersistenceType))
    9625             :   {
    9626             : #ifdef DEBUG
    9627             :     MOZ_ASSERT(!mDatabasePaths.IsEmpty());
    9628             :     for (const nsString& databasePath : mDatabasePaths) {
    9629             :       MOZ_ASSERT(!databasePath.IsEmpty());
    9630             :     }
    9631             : #endif
    9632             : 
    9633             :     MOZ_COUNT_CTOR(Maintenance::DirectoryInfo);
    9634           0 :   }
    9635             : 
    9636           0 :   ~DirectoryInfo()
    9637           0 :   {
    9638             :     MOZ_COUNT_DTOR(Maintenance::DirectoryInfo);
    9639           0 :   }
    9640             : 
    9641             :   DirectoryInfo(const DirectoryInfo& aOther) = delete;
    9642             : };
    9643             : 
    9644             : class DatabaseMaintenance final
    9645             :   : public Runnable
    9646             : {
    9647             :   // The minimum amount of time that has passed since the last vacuum before we
    9648             :   // will attempt to analyze the database for fragmentation.
    9649             :   static const PRTime kMinVacuumAge =
    9650             :     PRTime(PR_USEC_PER_SEC) * 60 * 60 * 24 * 7;
    9651             : 
    9652             :   // If the percent of database pages that are not in contiguous order is higher
    9653             :   // than this percentage we will attempt a vacuum.
    9654             :   static const int32_t kPercentUnorderedThreshold = 30;
    9655             : 
    9656             :   // If the percent of file size growth since the last vacuum is higher than
    9657             :   // this percentage we will attempt a vacuum.
    9658             :   static const int32_t kPercentFileSizeGrowthThreshold = 10;
    9659             : 
    9660             :   // The number of freelist pages beyond which we will favor an incremental
    9661             :   // vacuum over a full vacuum.
    9662             :   static const int32_t kMaxFreelistThreshold = 5;
    9663             : 
    9664             :   // If the percent of unused file bytes in the database exceeds this percentage
    9665             :   // then we will attempt a full vacuum.
    9666             :   static const int32_t kPercentUnusedThreshold = 20;
    9667             : 
    9668             :   class AutoProgressHandler;
    9669             : 
    9670             :   enum class MaintenanceAction
    9671             :   {
    9672             :     Nothing = 0,
    9673             :     IncrementalVacuum,
    9674             :     FullVacuum
    9675             :   };

    9916           0 : DeserializeStructuredCloneFile(FileManager* aFileManager,
    9917             :                                const nsString& aText,
    9918             :                                StructuredCloneFile* aFile)
    9919             : {
    9920             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!aText.IsEmpty());
    9921             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aFile);
    9922             : 
    9923             :   StructuredCloneFile::FileType type;
    9924             : 
    9925           0 :   switch (aText.First()) {
    9926             :     case char16_t('-'):
    9927             :       type = StructuredCloneFile::eMutableFile;
    9928             :       break;
    9929             : 
    9930             :     case char16_t('.'):
    9931           0 :       type = StructuredCloneFile::eStructuredClone;
    9932           0 :       break;
    9933             : 
    9934             :     case char16_t('/'):
    9935           0 :       type = StructuredCloneFile::eWasmBytecode;
    9936           0 :       break;
    9937             : 
    9938             :     case char16_t('\\'):
    9939           0 :       type = StructuredCloneFile::eWasmCompiled;
    9940           0 :       break;
    9941             : 
    9942             :     default:
    9943           0 :       type = StructuredCloneFile::eBlob;
    9944             :   }
    9945             : 
    9946             :   nsresult rv;
    9947             :   int32_t id;
    9948             : 
    9949           0 :   if (type == StructuredCloneFile::eBlob) {
    9950           0 :     id = aText.ToInteger(&rv);
    9951             :   } else {
    9952           0 :     nsString text(Substring(aText, 1));
    9953             : 
    9954           0 :     id = text.ToInteger(&rv);
    9955             :   }
    9956           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
    9957             :     return rv;
    9958             :   }
    9959             : 
    9960           0 :   RefPtr<FileInfo> fileInfo = aFileManager->GetFileInfo(id);
    9961             :   MOZ_ASSERT(fileInfo);
    9962             : 
    9963           0 :   aFile->mFileInfo.swap(fileInfo);
    9964           0 :   aFile->mType = type;
    9965             : 
    9966           0 :   return NS_OK;
    9967             : }

   10174             :

   10177           0 :   aBaseFilename.Rebind(aFilename, 0, aFilename.Length() - aSuffix.Length());

   10181             : nsresult
   10182           0 : SerializeStructuredCloneFiles(

   10187             :                          FallibleTArray<SerializedStructuredCloneFile>& aResult)
   10188             : {

   10191             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aDatabase);
   10192             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aResult.IsEmpty());

   10197             : 
   10198           0 :   FileManager* fileManager = aDatabase->GetFileManager();
   10199             : 
   10200           0 :   nsCOMPtr<nsIFile> directory = fileManager->GetCheckedDirectory();
   10201           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(!directory)) {
   10202           0 :     IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();
   10203           0 :     return NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_UNKNOWN_ERR;
   10204             :   }
   10205             : 
   10206           0 :   const uint32_t count = aFiles.Length();
   10207             : 
   10208           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(!aResult.SetCapacity(count, fallible))) {
   10209             :     return NS_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY;
   10210             :   }
   10211             : 
   10212           0 :   for (uint32_t index = 0; index < count; index++) {
   10213           0 :     const StructuredCloneFile& file = aFiles[index];

   10216           0 :         file.mType != StructuredCloneFile::eWasmBytecode &&

   10223             :

   10227           0 :       IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();

   10488             : uint32_t
   10489           0 : TelemetryIdForFile(nsIFile* aFile)
   10490             : {
   10491             :   // May be called on any thread!
   10492             : 
   10493             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aFile);
   10494             :   MOZ_ASSERT(gTelemetryIdMutex);
   10495             : 
   10496             :   // The storage directory is structured like this:
   10497             :   //
   10498             :   //   <profile>/storage/<persistence>/<origin>/idb/<filename>.sqlite
   10499             :   //
   10500             :   // For the purposes of this function we're only concerned with the
   10501             :   // <persistence>, <origin>, and <filename> pieces.
   10502             : 
   10503             :   nsString filename;
   10504           0 :   MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(aFile->GetLeafName(filename));
   10505             : 
   10506             :   // Make sure we were given a database file.
   10507             :   NS_NAMED_LITERAL_STRING(sqliteExtension, ".sqlite");
   10508             : 
   10509             :   MOZ_ASSERT(StringEndsWith(filename, sqliteExtension));
   10510             : 
   10511           0 :   filename.Truncate(filename.Length() - sqliteExtension.Length());
   10512             : 
   10513             :   // Get the "idb" directory.
   10514             :   nsCOMPtr<nsIFile> idbDirectory;
   10515           0 :   MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(aFile->GetParent(getter_AddRefs(idbDirectory)));
   10516             : 
   10517             :   DebugOnly<nsString> idbLeafName;
   10518             :   MOZ_ASSERT(NS_SUCCEEDED(idbDirectory->GetLeafName(idbLeafName)));
   10519             :   MOZ_ASSERT(static_cast<nsString&>(idbLeafName).EqualsLiteral("idb"));
   10520             : 
   10521             :   // Get the <origin> directory.
   10522             :   nsCOMPtr<nsIFile> originDirectory;
   10523           0 :   MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(
   10524             :     idbDirectory->GetParent(getter_AddRefs(originDirectory)));
   10525             : 
   10526             :   nsString origin;
   10527           0 :   MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(originDirectory->GetLeafName(origin));
   10528             : 
   10529             :   // Any databases in these directories are owned by the application and should
   10530             :   // not have their filenames masked. Hopefully they also appear in the
   10531             :   // Telemetry.cpp whitelist.
   10532           0 :   if (origin.EqualsLiteral("chrome") ||
   10533           0 :       origin.EqualsLiteral("moz-safe-about+home")) {
   10534             :     return 0;
   10535             :   }
   10536             : 
   10537             :   // Get the <persistence> directory.
   10538             :   nsCOMPtr<nsIFile> persistenceDirectory;
   10539           0 :   MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(
   10540             :     originDirectory->GetParent(getter_AddRefs(persistenceDirectory)));

   10542             :   nsString persistence;

   10547           0 :   uint32_t hashValue = HashString(persistence + separator +
   10548           0 :                                   origin + separator +
   10549           0 :                                   filename);
   10550             : 
   10551           0 :   MutexAutoLock lock(*gTelemetryIdMutex);
   10552             : 
   10553           0 :   if (!gTelemetryIdHashtable) {
   10554           0 :     gTelemetryIdHashtable = new TelemetryIdHashtable();

   11082           0 : DatabaseConnection::CheckpointInternal(CheckpointMode aMode)
   11083             : {
   11084           0 :   AssertIsOnConnectionThread();
   11085             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!mInReadTransaction);
   11086             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!mInWriteTransaction);

   11089             :                  "DatabaseConnection::CheckpointInternal",
   11090             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
   11091             : 
   11092           0 :   nsAutoCString stmtString;
   11093           0 :   stmtString.AssignLiteral("PRAGMA wal_checkpoint(");
   11094             : 
   11095           0 :   switch (aMode) {
   11096             :     case CheckpointMode::Full:
   11097             :       // Ensures that the database is completely checkpointed and flushed to
   11098             :       // disk.
   11099           0 :       stmtString.AppendLiteral("FULL");
   11100           0 :       break;
   11101             : 
   11102             :     case CheckpointMode::Restart:
   11103             :       // Like Full, but also ensures that the next write will start overwriting
   11104             :       // the existing WAL file rather than letting the WAL file grow.
   11105           0 :       stmtString.AppendLiteral("RESTART");
   11106           0 :       break;
   11107             : 
   11108             :     case CheckpointMode::Truncate:
   11109             :       // Like Restart but also truncates the existing WAL file.
   11110           0 :       stmtString.AppendLiteral("TRUNCATE");
   11111           0 :       break;
   11112             : 
   11113             :     default:
   11114           0 :       MOZ_CRASH("Unknown CheckpointMode!");
   11115             :   }
   11116             : 
   11117           0 :   stmtString.AppendLiteral(");");
   11118             : 
   11119             :   CachedStatement stmt;
   11120           0 :   nsresult rv = GetCachedStatement(stmtString, &stmt);
   11121           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   11122             :     return rv;
   11123             :   }
   11124             : 
   11125           0 :   rv = stmt->Execute();
   11126           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   11127           0 :     return rv;
   11128             :   }
   11129             : 
   11130           0 :   return NS_OK;
   11131             : }
   11132             : 
   11133             : void
   11134           0 : DatabaseConnection::DoIdleProcessing(bool aNeedsCheckpoint)
   11135             : {
   11136           0 :   AssertIsOnConnectionThread();
   11137             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mInReadTransaction);
   11138             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!mInWriteTransaction);
   11139             : 
   11140           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
   11141             :                  "DatabaseConnection::DoIdleProcessing",
   11142             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
   11143             : 
   11144           0 :   DatabaseConnection::CachedStatement freelistStmt;
   11145             :   uint32_t freelistCount;
   11146           0 :   nsresult rv = GetFreelistCount(freelistStmt, &freelistCount);
   11147           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   11148           0 :     freelistCount = 0;
   11149             :   }
   11150             : 
   11151           0 :   CachedStatement rollbackStmt;
   11152           0 :   CachedStatement beginStmt;
   11153           0 :   if (aNeedsCheckpoint || freelistCount) {
   11154           0 :     rv = GetCachedStatement(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING("ROLLBACK;"), &rollbackStmt);
   11155           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   11156           0 :       return;
   11157             :     }
   11158             : 
   11159           0 :     rv = GetCachedStatement(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING("BEGIN;"), &beginStmt);
   11160           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   11161             :       return;
   11162             :     }
   11163             : 
   11164             :     // Release the connection's normal transaction. It's possible that it could
   11165             :     // fail, but that isn't a problem here.
   11166           0 :     Unused << rollbackStmt->Execute();
   11167             : 
   11168           0 :     mInReadTransaction = false;
   11169             :   }
   11170             : 
   11171           0 :   bool freedSomePages = false;
   11172             : 
   11173           0 :   if (freelistCount) {
   11174             :     rv = ReclaimFreePagesWhileIdle(freelistStmt,
   11175             :                                    rollbackStmt,
   11176             :                                    freelistCount,
   11177             :                                    aNeedsCheckpoint,
   11178           0 :                                    &freedSomePages);
   11179             :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   11180             :       MOZ_ASSERT(!freedSomePages);
   11181             :     }
   11182             : 
   11183             :     // Make sure we didn't leave a transaction running.
   11184             :     MOZ_ASSERT(!mInReadTransaction);
   11185             :     MOZ_ASSERT(!mInWriteTransaction);
   11186             :   }
   11187             : 
   11188             :   // Truncate the WAL if we were asked to or if we managed to free some space.
   11189           0 :   if (aNeedsCheckpoint || freedSomePages) {
   11190           0 :     rv = CheckpointInternal(CheckpointMode::Truncate);
   11191           0 :     Unused << NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv));
   11192             :   }
   11193             : 
   11194             :   // Finally try to restart the read transaction if we rolled it back earlier.
   11195           0 :   if (beginStmt) {
   11196           0 :     rv = beginStmt->Execute();
   11197           0 :     if (NS_SUCCEEDED(rv)) {
   11198           0 :       mInReadTransaction = true;
   11199             :     } else {
   11200             :       NS_WARNING("Falied to restart read transaction!");
   11201             :     }
   11202           0 :   }
   11203             : }
   11204             : 
   11205             : nsresult
   11206           0 : DatabaseConnection::ReclaimFreePagesWhileIdle(
   11207             :                                             CachedStatement& aFreelistStatement,
   11208             :                                             CachedStatement& aRollbackStatement,
   11209             :                                             uint32_t aFreelistCount,
   11210             :                                             bool aNeedsCheckpoint,
   11211             :                                             bool* aFreedSomePages)
   11212             : {
   11213           0 :   AssertIsOnConnectionThread();
   11214             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aFreelistStatement);
   11215             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aRollbackStatement);
   11216             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aFreelistCount);
   11217             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aFreedSomePages);
   11218             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!mInReadTransaction);
   11219             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!mInWriteTransaction);
   11220             : 
   11221           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
   11222             :                  "DatabaseConnection::ReclaimFreePagesWhileIdle",
   11223             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
   11224             : 
   11225             :   // Make sure we don't keep working if anything else needs this thread.
   11226           0 :   nsIThread* currentThread = NS_GetCurrentThread();
   11227             :   MOZ_ASSERT(currentThread);
   11228             : 
   11229           0 :   if (NS_HasPendingEvents(currentThread)) {
   11230           0 :     *aFreedSomePages = false;
   11231           0 :     return NS_OK;
   11232             :   }
   11233             : 
   11234             :   // Only try to free 10% at a time so that we can bail out if this connection
   11235             :   // suddenly becomes active or if the thread is needed otherwise.
   11236           0 :   nsAutoCString stmtString;
   11237           0 :   stmtString.AssignLiteral("PRAGMA incremental_vacuum(");
   11238           0 :   stmtString.AppendInt(std::max(uint64_t(1), uint64_t(aFreelistCount / 10)));
   11239           0 :   stmtString.AppendLiteral(");");
   11240             : 
   11241             :   // Make all the statements we'll need up front.
   11242           0 :   CachedStatement incrementalVacuumStmt;
   11243           0 :   nsresult rv = GetCachedStatement(stmtString, &incrementalVacuumStmt);
   11244           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   11245             :     return rv;
   11246             :   }
   11247             : 
   11248           0 :   CachedStatement beginImmediateStmt;
   11249             :   rv = GetCachedStatement(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING("BEGIN IMMEDIATE;"),
   11250           0 :                           &beginImmediateStmt);
   11251           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   11252             :     return rv;
   11253             :   }
   11254             : 
   11255           0 :   CachedStatement commitStmt;
   11256           0 :   rv = GetCachedStatement(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING("COMMIT;"), &commitStmt);
   11257           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   11258             :     return rv;
   11259             :   }
   11260             : 
   11261           0 :   if (aNeedsCheckpoint) {
   11262             :     // Freeing pages is a journaled operation, so it will require additional WAL
   11263             :     // space. However, we're idle and are about to checkpoint anyway, so doing a
   11264             :     // RESTART checkpoint here should allow us to reuse any existing space.
   11265           0 :     rv = CheckpointInternal(CheckpointMode::Restart);
   11266           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   11267             :       return rv;
   11268             :     }
   11269             :   }
   11270             : 
   11271             :   // Start the write transaction.
   11272           0 :   rv = beginImmediateStmt->Execute();
   11273           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   11274             :     return rv;
   11275             :   }
   11276             : 
   11277           0 :   mInWriteTransaction = true;
   11278             : 
   11279           0 :   bool freedSomePages = false;
   11280             : 
   11281           0 :   while (aFreelistCount) {
   11282           0 :     if (NS_HasPendingEvents(currentThread)) {
   11283             :       // Something else wants to use the thread so roll back this transaction.
   11284             :       // It's ok if we never make progress here because the idle service should
   11285             :       // eventually reclaim this space.
   11286             :       rv = NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_UNKNOWN_ERR;
   11287             :       break;
   11288             :     }
   11289             : 
   11290           0 :     rv = incrementalVacuumStmt->Execute();
   11291           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   11292             :       break;
   11293             :     }
   11294             : 
   11295           0 :     freedSomePages = true;
   11296             : 
   11297           0 :     rv = GetFreelistCount(aFreelistStatement, &aFreelistCount);
   11298           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   11299             :       break;
   11300             :     }
   11301             :   }
   11302             : 
   11303           0 :   if (NS_SUCCEEDED(rv) && freedSomePages) {
   11304             :     // Commit the write transaction.
   11305           0 :     rv = commitStmt->Execute();
   11306           0 :     if (NS_SUCCEEDED(rv)) {
   11307           0 :       mInWriteTransaction = false;
   11308             :     } else {
   11309             :       NS_WARNING("Failed to commit!");
   11310             :     }
   11311             :   }
   11312             : 
   11313           0 :   if (NS_FAILED(rv)) {
   11314             :     MOZ_ASSERT(mInWriteTransaction);
   11315             : 
   11316             :     // Something failed, make sure we roll everything back.
   11317           0 :     Unused << aRollbackStatement->Execute();
   11318             : 
   11319           0 :     mInWriteTransaction = false;
   11320             : 
   11321           0 :     return rv;
   11322             :   }
   11323             : 
   11324           0 :   *aFreedSomePages = freedSomePages;
   11325           0 :   return NS_OK;
   11326             : }
   11327             : 
   11328             : nsresult
   11329           0 : DatabaseConnection::GetFreelistCount(CachedStatement& aCachedStatement,
   11330             :                                      uint32_t* aFreelistCount)
   11331             : {
   11332           0 :   AssertIsOnConnectionThread();
   11333             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aFreelistCount);
   11334             : 
   11335           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
   11336             :                  "DatabaseConnection::GetFreelistCount",

   11863           0 :   mJournalsToCreateBeforeCommit.Clear();
   11864           0 :   mJournalsToRemoveAfterCommit.Clear();
   11865           0 :   mJournalsToRemoveAfterAbort.Clear();
   11866             : 
   11867             :   // FileInfo implementation automatically removes unreferenced files, but it's
   11868             :   // done asynchronously and with a delay. We want to remove them (and decrease
   11869             :   // quota usage) before we fire the commit event.
   11870           0 :   for (auto iter = mFileInfoEntries.ConstIter(); !iter.Done(); iter.Next()) {

   11872             :

   12256           0 : ConnectionPool::IdleTimerCallback(nsITimer* aTimer, void* aClosure)

   12258             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aTimer);
   12259             : 
   12260           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",

   12275           0 :   TimeStamp now = TimeStamp::NowLoRes() + TimeDuration::FromMilliseconds(500);

   12428             :     MOZ_ASSERT(dbInfo->mReadTransactionCount < UINT32_MAX);
   12429           0 :     dbInfo->mReadTransactionCount++;

   12445             :     // Mark what we are blocking on.

   12461             :       }
   12462             : 
   12463           0 :       blockInfo->mLastBlockingReads = transactionInfo;
   12464           0 :       blockInfo->mLastBlockingWrites.Clear();

   12466           0 :       blockInfo->mLastBlockingWrites.AppendElement(transactionInfo);
   12467             :     }

   12472           0 :                                   /* aFromQueuedTransactions */ false);

   12476           0 :       (mIdleDatabases.RemoveElement(dbInfo) ||

   12653             : void
   12654           0 : ConnectionPool::AdjustIdleTimer()
   12655             : {
   12656           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();
   12657             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mIdleTimer);
   12658             : 
   12659           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
   12660             :                  "ConnectionPool::AdjustIdleTimer",
   12661             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
   12662             : 
   12663             :   // Figure out the next time at which we should release idle resources. This
   12664             :   // includes both databases and threads.
   12665           0 :   TimeStamp newTargetIdleTime;
   12666             :   MOZ_ASSERT(newTargetIdleTime.IsNull());
   12667             : 
   12668           0 :   if (!mIdleDatabases.IsEmpty()) {
   12669           0 :     newTargetIdleTime = mIdleDatabases[0].mIdleTime;
   12670             :   }
   12671             : 
   12672           0 :   if (!mIdleThreads.IsEmpty()) {
   12673           0 :     const TimeStamp& idleTime = mIdleThreads[0].mIdleTime;
   12674             : 
   12675           0 :     if (newTargetIdleTime.IsNull() || idleTime < newTargetIdleTime) {
   12676           0 :       newTargetIdleTime = idleTime;
   12677             :     }
   12678             :   }
   12679             : 
   12680             :   MOZ_ASSERT_IF(newTargetIdleTime.IsNull(), mIdleDatabases.IsEmpty());

   12683             :   // Cancel the timer if it was running and the new target time is different.
   12684           0 :   if (!mTargetIdleTime.IsNull() &&
   12685           0 :       (newTargetIdleTime.IsNull() || mTargetIdleTime != newTargetIdleTime)) {
   12686           0 :     CancelIdleTimer();
   12687             : 
   12688             :     MOZ_ASSERT(mTargetIdleTime.IsNull());
   12689             :   }
   12690             : 
   12691             :   // Schedule the timer if we have a target time different than before.
   12692           0 :   if (!newTargetIdleTime.IsNull() &&
   12693           0 :       (mTargetIdleTime.IsNull() || mTargetIdleTime != newTargetIdleTime)) {
   12694           0 :     double delta = (newTargetIdleTime - TimeStamp::NowLoRes()).ToMilliseconds();
   12695             : 
   12696             :     uint32_t delay;
   12697           0 :     if (delta > 0) {
   12698           0 :       delay = uint32_t(std::min(delta, double(UINT32_MAX)));
   12699             :     } else {
   12700             :       delay = 0;
   12701             :     }
   12702             : 
   12703           0 :     MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(
   12704             :       mIdleTimer->InitWithFuncCallback(IdleTimerCallback,

   12706             :                                        delay,
   12707             :                                        nsITimer::TYPE_ONE_SHOT));

   12800             : bool
   12801           0 : ConnectionPool::ScheduleTransaction(TransactionInfo* aTransactionInfo,
   12802             :                                     bool aFromQueuedTransactions)

   12819             :       !dbInfo->mTransactionsScheduledDuringClose.Contains(aTransactionInfo));
   12820             : 
   12821           0 :     dbInfo->mTransactionsScheduledDuringClose.AppendElement(aTransactionInfo);
   12822           0 :     return true;

   12824             :

   12826             :     MOZ_ASSERT(!dbInfo->mThreadInfo.mRunnable);

   12829           0 :       bool created = false;
