   12831           0 :       if (mTotalThreadCount < kMaxConnectionThreadCount) {
   12832             :         // This will set the thread up with the profiler.
   12833           0 :         RefPtr<ThreadRunnable> runnable = new ThreadRunnable();
   12834             : 
   12835             :         nsCOMPtr<nsIThread> newThread;
   12836             :         nsresult rv =
   12837             :           NS_NewNamedThread(runnable->GetThreadName(),
   12838           0 :                             getter_AddRefs(newThread), runnable);

   12843             :                          runnable->SerialNumber()));

   12845           0 :           dbInfo->mThreadInfo.mThread.swap(newThread);
   12846           0 :           dbInfo->mThreadInfo.mRunnable.swap(runnable);
   12847             : 
   12848           0 :           mTotalThreadCount++;
   12849           0 :           created = true;
   12850             :         } else {
   12851             :           NS_WARNING("Failed to make new thread!");
   12852           0 :         }
   12853           0 :       } else if (!mDatabasesPerformingIdleMaintenance.IsEmpty()) {

   12855             :         // posting a dummy runnable to each thread that might be doing idle
   12856             :         // maintenance.
   12857           0 :         nsCOMPtr<nsIRunnable> runnable = new Runnable();

   12871             : 
   12872           0 :       if (!created) {

   12874             :           MOZ_ASSERT(!mQueuedTransactions.Contains(aTransactionInfo));

   12894             :   MOZ_ASSERT(dbInfo->mThreadInfo.mRunnable);

   12899             :       // transaction for later.

   12935             : void
   12936           0 : ConnectionPool::NoteFinishedTransaction(uint64_t aTransactionId)
   12937             : {
   12938           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();
   12939             : 
   12940           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
   12941             :                  "ConnectionPool::NoteFinishedTransaction",
   12942             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
   12943             : 
   12944           0 :   TransactionInfo* transactionInfo = mTransactions.Get(aTransactionId);
   12945             :   MOZ_ASSERT(transactionInfo);
   12946             :   MOZ_ASSERT(transactionInfo->mRunning);
   12947             :   MOZ_ASSERT(transactionInfo->mFinished);
   12948             : 
   12949           0 :   transactionInfo->mRunning = false;
   12950             : 
   12951           0 :   DatabaseInfo* dbInfo = transactionInfo->mDatabaseInfo;
   12952             :   MOZ_ASSERT(dbInfo);
   12953             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mDatabases.Get(transactionInfo->mDatabaseId) == dbInfo);
   12954             :   MOZ_ASSERT(dbInfo->mThreadInfo.mThread);
   12955             :   MOZ_ASSERT(dbInfo->mThreadInfo.mRunnable);
   12956             : 
   12957             :   // Schedule the next write transaction if there are any queued.
   12958           0 :   if (dbInfo->mRunningWriteTransaction == transactionInfo) {
   12959             :     MOZ_ASSERT(transactionInfo->mIsWriteTransaction);
   12960             :     MOZ_ASSERT(dbInfo->mNeedsCheckpoint);
   12961             : 
   12962           0 :     dbInfo->mRunningWriteTransaction = nullptr;
   12963             : 
   12964           0 :     if (!dbInfo->mScheduledWriteTransactions.IsEmpty()) {
   12965             :       TransactionInfo* nextWriteTransaction =
   12966           0 :         dbInfo->mScheduledWriteTransactions[0];
   12967             :       MOZ_ASSERT(nextWriteTransaction);
   12968             : 
   12969           0 :       dbInfo->mScheduledWriteTransactions.RemoveElementAt(0);
   12970             : 
   12971           0 :       MOZ_ALWAYS_TRUE(ScheduleTransaction(nextWriteTransaction,
   12972             :                                           /* aFromQueuedTransactions */ false));
   12973             :     }
   12974             :   }
   12975             : 
   12976             :   const nsTArray<nsString>& objectStoreNames =
   12977           0 :     transactionInfo->mObjectStoreNames;
   12978             : 
   12979           0 :   for (uint32_t index = 0, count = objectStoreNames.Length();
   12980             :        index < count;
   12981             :        index++) {
   12982             :     TransactionInfoPair* blockInfo =
   12983           0 :       dbInfo->mBlockingTransactions.Get(objectStoreNames[index]);
   12984             :     MOZ_ASSERT(blockInfo);
   12985             : 
   12986           0 :     if (transactionInfo->mIsWriteTransaction &&
   12987           0 :         blockInfo->mLastBlockingReads == transactionInfo) {
   12988           0 :       blockInfo->mLastBlockingReads = nullptr;
   12989             :     }
   12990             : 
   12991           0 :     blockInfo->mLastBlockingWrites.RemoveElement(transactionInfo);
   12992             :   }
   12993             : 
   12994           0 :   transactionInfo->RemoveBlockingTransactions();
   12995             : 
   12996           0 :   if (transactionInfo->mIsWriteTransaction) {
   12997             :     MOZ_ASSERT(dbInfo->mWriteTransactionCount);
   12998           0 :     dbInfo->mWriteTransactionCount--;
   12999             :   } else {
   13000             :     MOZ_ASSERT(dbInfo->mReadTransactionCount);
   13001           0 :     dbInfo->mReadTransactionCount--;
   13002             :   }
   13003             : 
   13004           0 :   mTransactions.Remove(aTransactionId);
   13005             : 
   13006             : #ifdef DEBUG
   13007             :   // That just deleted |transactionInfo|.
   13008             :   transactionInfo = nullptr;
   13009             : #endif
   13010             : 
   13011           0 :   if (!dbInfo->TotalTransactionCount()) {
   13012             :     MOZ_ASSERT(!dbInfo->mIdle);
   13013           0 :     dbInfo->mIdle = true;
   13014             : 
   13015           0 :     NoteIdleDatabase(dbInfo);
   13016           0 :   }
   13017           0 : }
   13018             : 
   13019             : void
   13020           0 : ConnectionPool::ScheduleQueuedTransactions(ThreadInfo& aThreadInfo)
   13021             : {
   13022           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();
   13023             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aThreadInfo.mThread);
   13024             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aThreadInfo.mRunnable);
   13025             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!mQueuedTransactions.IsEmpty());
   13026             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!mIdleThreads.Contains(aThreadInfo));
   13027             : 
   13028           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
   13029             :                  "ConnectionPool::ScheduleQueuedTransactions",
   13030             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
   13031             : 
   13032           0 :   mIdleThreads.InsertElementSorted(aThreadInfo);
   13033             : 
   13034           0 :   aThreadInfo.mRunnable = nullptr;
   13035           0 :   aThreadInfo.mThread = nullptr;
   13036             : 
   13037           0 :   uint32_t index = 0;
   13038           0 :   for (uint32_t count = mQueuedTransactions.Length(); index < count; index++) {
   13039           0 :     if (!ScheduleTransaction(mQueuedTransactions[index],
   13040           0 :                              /* aFromQueuedTransactions */ true)) {
   13041             :       break;
   13042             :     }
   13043             :   }
   13044             : 
   13045           0 :   if (index) {
   13046           0 :     mQueuedTransactions.RemoveElementsAt(0, index);
   13047             :   }
   13048             : 
   13049           0 :   AdjustIdleTimer();
   13050           0 : }
   13051             : 
   13052             : void
   13053           0 : ConnectionPool::NoteIdleDatabase(DatabaseInfo* aDatabaseInfo)
   13054             : {
   13055           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();
   13056             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aDatabaseInfo);
   13057             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!aDatabaseInfo->TotalTransactionCount());
   13058             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aDatabaseInfo->mThreadInfo.mThread);
   13059             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aDatabaseInfo->mThreadInfo.mRunnable);
   13060             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!mIdleDatabases.Contains(aDatabaseInfo));
   13061             : 
   13062           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
   13063             :                  "ConnectionPool::NoteIdleDatabase",
   13064             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
   13065             : 
   13066           0 :   const bool otherDatabasesWaiting = !mQueuedTransactions.IsEmpty();
   13067             : 
   13068           0 :   if (mShutdownRequested ||
   13069           0 :       otherDatabasesWaiting ||
   13070             :       aDatabaseInfo->mCloseOnIdle) {
   13071             :     // Make sure we close the connection if we're shutting down or giving the
   13072             :     // thread to another database.
   13073           0 :     CloseDatabase(aDatabaseInfo);
   13074             : 
   13075           0 :     if (otherDatabasesWaiting) {
   13076             :       // Let another database use this thread.
   13077           0 :       ScheduleQueuedTransactions(aDatabaseInfo->mThreadInfo);
   13078           0 :     } else if (mShutdownRequested) {
   13079             :       // If there are no other databases that need to run then we can shut this
   13080             :       // thread down immediately instead of going through the idle thread
   13081             :       // mechanism.
   13082           0 :       ShutdownThread(aDatabaseInfo->mThreadInfo);
   13083             :     }
   13084             : 
   13085           0 :     return;
   13086             :   }
   13087             : 
   13088           0 :   mIdleDatabases.InsertElementSorted(aDatabaseInfo);
   13089             : 
   13090           0 :   AdjustIdleTimer();
   13091             : }
   13092             : 
   13093             : void
   13094           0 : ConnectionPool::NoteClosedDatabase(DatabaseInfo* aDatabaseInfo)
   13095             : {
   13096           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();
   13097             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aDatabaseInfo);
   13098             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aDatabaseInfo->mClosing);
   13099             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!mIdleDatabases.Contains(aDatabaseInfo));
   13100             : 
   13101           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
   13102             :                  "ConnectionPool::NoteClosedDatabase",
   13103             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
   13104             : 
   13105           0 :   aDatabaseInfo->mClosing = false;
   13106             : 
   13107             :   // Figure out what to do with this database's thread. It may have already been
   13108             :   // given to another database, in which case there's nothing to do here.
   13109             :   // Otherwise we prioritize the thread as follows:
   13110             :   //   1. Databases that haven't had an opportunity to run at all are highest
   13111             :   //      priority. Those live in the |mQueuedTransactions| list.
   13112             :   //   2. If this database has additional transactions that were started after
   13113             :   //      we began closing the connection then the thread can be reused for
   13114             :   //      those transactions.
   13115             :   //   3. If we're shutting down then we can get rid of the thread.
   13116             :   //   4. Finally, if nothing above took the thread then we can add it to our
   13117             :   //      list of idle threads. It may be reused or it may time out. If we have
   13118             :   //      too many idle threads then we will shut down the oldest.
   13119           0 :   if (aDatabaseInfo->mThreadInfo.mThread) {
   13120             :     MOZ_ASSERT(aDatabaseInfo->mThreadInfo.mRunnable);
   13121             : 
   13122           0 :     if (!mQueuedTransactions.IsEmpty()) {
   13123             :       // Give the thread to another database.
   13124           0 :       ScheduleQueuedTransactions(aDatabaseInfo->mThreadInfo);
   13125           0 :     } else if (!aDatabaseInfo->TotalTransactionCount()) {
   13126           0 :       if (mShutdownRequested) {
   13127           0 :         ShutdownThread(aDatabaseInfo->mThreadInfo);
   13128             :       } else {
   13129             :         MOZ_ASSERT(!mIdleThreads.Contains(aDatabaseInfo->mThreadInfo));
   13130             : 
   13131           0 :         mIdleThreads.InsertElementSorted(aDatabaseInfo->mThreadInfo);
   13132             : 
   13133           0 :         aDatabaseInfo->mThreadInfo.mRunnable = nullptr;
   13134           0 :         aDatabaseInfo->mThreadInfo.mThread = nullptr;
   13135             : 
   13136           0 :         if (mIdleThreads.Length() > kMaxIdleConnectionThreadCount) {
   13137           0 :           ShutdownThread(mIdleThreads[0].mThreadInfo);
   13138           0 :           mIdleThreads.RemoveElementAt(0);
   13139             :         }
   13140             : 
   13141           0 :         AdjustIdleTimer();
   13142             :       }
   13143             :     }
   13144             :   }
   13145             : 
   13146             :   // Schedule any transactions that were started while we were closing the
   13147             :   // connection.
   13148           0 :   if (aDatabaseInfo->TotalTransactionCount()) {
   13149             :     nsTArray<TransactionInfo*>& scheduledTransactions =
   13150           0 :       aDatabaseInfo->mTransactionsScheduledDuringClose;
   13151             : 
   13152             :     MOZ_ASSERT(!scheduledTransactions.IsEmpty());
   13153             : 
   13154           0 :     for (uint32_t index = 0, count = scheduledTransactions.Length();
   13155             :          index < count;
   13156             :          index++) {
   13157           0 :       Unused << ScheduleTransaction(scheduledTransactions[index],
   13158           0 :                                     /* aFromQueuedTransactions */ false);
   13159             :     }
   13160             : 
   13161           0 :     scheduledTransactions.Clear();
   13162             : 
   13163           0 :     return;
   13164             :   }
   13165             : 
   13166             :   // There are no more transactions and the connection has been closed. We're
   13167             :   // done with this database.
   13168             :   {
   13169           0 :     MutexAutoLock lock(mDatabasesMutex);
   13170             : 
   13171           0 :     mDatabases.Remove(aDatabaseInfo->mDatabaseId);
   13172             :   }
   13173             : 
   13174             : #ifdef DEBUG
   13175             :   // That just deleted |aDatabaseInfo|.
   13176             :   aDatabaseInfo = nullptr;
   13177             : #endif
   13178             : 
   13179             :   // See if we need to fire any complete callbacks now that the database is
   13180             :   // finished.
   13181           0 :   for (uint32_t index = 0;
   13182           0 :        index < mCompleteCallbacks.Length();
   13183             :        /* conditionally incremented */) {
   13184           0 :     if (MaybeFireCallback(mCompleteCallbacks[index])) {
   13185           0 :       mCompleteCallbacks.RemoveElementAt(index);
   13186             :     } else {
   13187           0 :       index++;
   13188             :     }
   13189             :   }
   13190             : 
   13191             :   // If that was the last database and we're supposed to be shutting down then
   13192             :   // we are finished.
   13193           0 :   if (mShutdownRequested && !mDatabases.Count()) {
   13194             :     MOZ_ASSERT(!mTransactions.Count());
   13195           0 :     Cleanup();
   13196           0 :   }
   13197             : }
   13198             : 
   13199             : bool
   13200           0 : ConnectionPool::MaybeFireCallback(DatabasesCompleteCallback* aCallback)
   13201             : {
   13202           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();
   13203             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aCallback);
   13204             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!aCallback->mDatabaseIds.IsEmpty());
   13205             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aCallback->mCallback);
   13206             : 
   13207           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
   13208             :                  "ConnectionPool::MaybeFireCallback",
   13209             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
   13210             : 
   13211           0 :   for (uint32_t count = aCallback->mDatabaseIds.Length(), index = 0;
   13212             :        index < count;
   13213             :        index++) {
   13214           0 :     const nsCString& databaseId = aCallback->mDatabaseIds[index];
   13215             :     MOZ_ASSERT(!databaseId.IsEmpty());
   13216             : 
   13217           0 :     if (mDatabases.Get(databaseId)) {
   13218             :       return false;
   13219             :     }
   13220             :   }
   13221             : 
   13222           0 :   Unused << aCallback->mCallback->Run();
   13223           0 :   return true;
   13224             : }

   13226             : void

   13241           0 :     new IdleConnectionRunnable(aDatabaseInfo, aDatabaseInfo->mNeedsCheckpoint);

   13243           0 :   aDatabaseInfo->mNeedsCheckpoint = false;
   13244           0 :   aDatabaseInfo->mIdle = false;

   14189             :     case State::Initial:
   14190           0 :       MaybeWaitForTransactions();
   14191           0 :       break;

   14193             :     case State::WaitingForTransactions:
   14194           0 :       MaybeWaitForFileHandles();
   14195           0 :       break;

   14198           0 :       CallCallback();

   14202           0 :       MOZ_CRASH("Should never get here!");

   14262             :     {
   14263             :       AssertIsOnBackgroundThread();
   14264             : 
   14265           0 :       const uint32_t count = aTable.Count();
   14266           0 :       if (!count) {
   14267             :         return true;
   14268             :       }

   14271           0 :       if (NS_WARN_IF(!transactions.SetCapacity(count, fallible))) {

   14273             :       }

   14275           0 :       for (auto iter = aTable.Iter(); !iter.Done(); iter.Next()) {

   14277             :                                                    fallible))) {
   14278           0 :           return false;
   14279             :         }

   14292             : 
   14293             :       return true;
   14294             :     }

   16304           0 :     return;
   16305             :   }

   16309             :     // "If the upgrade transaction was aborted, run the steps for closing a

   16840           0 : Cursor::Cursor(TransactionBase* aTransaction,
   16841             :                Type aType,
   16842             :                FullObjectStoreMetadata* aObjectStoreMetadata,
   16843             :                FullIndexMetadata* aIndexMetadata,
   16844             :                Direction aDirection)
   16845             :   : mTransaction(aTransaction)
   16846             :   , mBackgroundParent(nullptr)
   16847             :   , mObjectStoreMetadata(aObjectStoreMetadata)
   16848             :   , mIndexMetadata(aIndexMetadata)
   16849           0 :   , mObjectStoreId(aObjectStoreMetadata->mCommonMetadata.id())
   16850           0 :   , mIndexId(aIndexMetadata ? aIndexMetadata->mCommonMetadata.id() : 0)

   16852             :   , mType(aType)
   16853             :   , mDirection(aDirection)
   16854             :   , mUniqueIndex(aIndexMetadata ?
   16855           0 :                  aIndexMetadata->mCommonMetadata.unique() :
   16856             :                  false)
   16857             :   , mIsSameProcessActor(!BackgroundParent::IsOtherProcessActor(
   16858           0 :                            aTransaction->GetBackgroundParent()))
   16859           0 :   , mActorDestroyed(false)
   16860             : {
   16861             :   AssertIsOnBackgroundThread();
   16862             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aTransaction);
   16863             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aType != OpenCursorParams::T__None);
   16864             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aObjectStoreMetadata);
   16865             :   MOZ_ASSERT_IF(aType == OpenCursorParams::TIndexOpenCursorParams ||
   16866             :                   aType == OpenCursorParams::TIndexOpenKeyCursorParams,
   16867             :                 aIndexMetadata);
   16868             : 
   16869           0 :   if (mType == OpenCursorParams::TObjectStoreOpenCursorParams ||
   16870             :       mType == OpenCursorParams::TIndexOpenCursorParams) {
   16871           0 :     mDatabase = aTransaction->GetDatabase();
   16872             :     MOZ_ASSERT(mDatabase);
   16873             : 
   16874           0 :     mFileManager = mDatabase->GetFileManager();
   16875             :     MOZ_ASSERT(mFileManager);
   16876             : 
   16877           0 :     mBackgroundParent = aTransaction->GetBackgroundParent();
   16878             :     MOZ_ASSERT(mBackgroundParent);
   16879             :   }
   16880             : 
   16881           0 :   if (aIndexMetadata) {
   16882           0 :     mLocale = aIndexMetadata->mCommonMetadata.locale();
   16883             :   }
   16884             : 
   16885             :   static_assert(OpenCursorParams::T__None == 0 &&
   16886             :                   OpenCursorParams::T__Last == 4,
   16887             :                 "Lots of code here assumes only four types of cursors!");
   16888           0 : }
   16889             : 
   16890             : bool
   16891           0 : Cursor::VerifyRequestParams(const CursorRequestParams& aParams) const
   16892             : {
   16893             :   AssertIsOnBackgroundThread();
   16894             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aParams.type() != CursorRequestParams::T__None);
   16895             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mObjectStoreMetadata);
   16896             :   MOZ_ASSERT_IF(mType == OpenCursorParams::TIndexOpenCursorParams ||
   16897             :                   mType == OpenCursorParams::TIndexOpenKeyCursorParams,
   16898             :                 mIndexMetadata);
   16899             : 
   16900             : #ifdef DEBUG
   16901             :   {
   16902             :     RefPtr<FullObjectStoreMetadata> objectStoreMetadata =
   16903             :       mTransaction->GetMetadataForObjectStoreId(mObjectStoreId);
   16904             :     if (objectStoreMetadata) {

   18325             :     // Skip Desktop Service Store (.DS_Store) files. These files are only used
   18326             :     // on Mac OS X, but the profile can be shared across different operating
   18327             :     // systems, so we check it on all platforms.

   18329             :       continue;
   18330             :     }

   18332             :     // Skip SQLite temporary files. These files take up space on disk but will
   18333             :     // be deleted as soon as the database is opened, so we don't count them

   18505             : void

   18515             : 
   18516           0 :   if (mDatabaseMaintenances.Count()) {
   18517           0 :     return;
   18518             :   }
   18519             : 
   18520           0 :   mState = State::Finishing;
   18521           0 :   Finish();
   18522             : }

   18524             : nsresult
   18525           0 : Maintenance::Start()
   18526             : {
   18527             :   AssertIsOnBackgroundThread();
   18528             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mState == State::Initial);
   18529             : 
   18530           0 :   if (IsAborted()) {
   18531             :     return NS_ERROR_ABORT;
   18532             :   }
   18533             : 
   18534             :   // Make sure that the IndexedDatabaseManager is running so that we can check
   18535             :   // for low disk space mode.
   18536             : 
   18537           0 :   if (IndexedDatabaseManager::Get()) {
   18538           0 :     OpenDirectory();
   18539           0 :     return NS_OK;
   18540             :   }
   18541             : 
   18542           0 :   mState = State::CreateIndexedDatabaseManager;
   18543           0 :   MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(NS_DispatchToMainThread(this));
   18544             : 
   18545           0 :   return NS_OK;
   18546             : }
   18547             : 
   18548             : nsresult
   18549           0 : Maintenance::CreateIndexedDatabaseManager()

   18621           0 : Maintenance::DirectoryWork()
   18622             : {
   18623           0 :   AssertIsOnIOThread();
   18624             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mState == State::DirectoryWorkOpen);
   18625             : 
   18626             :   // The storage directory is structured like this:
   18627             :   //
   18628             :   //   <profile>/storage/<persistence>/<origin>/idb/*.sqlite
   18629             :   //
   18630             :   // We have to find all database files that match any persistence type and any
   18631             :   // origin. We ignore anything out of the ordinary for now.
   18632             : 
   18633           0 :   if (IsAborted()) {
   18634             :     return NS_ERROR_ABORT;
   18635             :   }
   18636             : 
   18637           0 :   QuotaManager* quotaManager = QuotaManager::Get();
   18638             :   MOZ_ASSERT(quotaManager);
   18639             : 
   18640           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(quotaManager->EnsureStorageIsInitialized()))) {
   18641             :     return NS_ERROR_FAILURE;
   18642             :   }
   18643             : 
   18644           0 :   nsCOMPtr<nsIFile> storageDir = GetFileForPath(quotaManager->GetStoragePath());
   18645             :   MOZ_ASSERT(storageDir);
   18646             : 
   18647             :   bool exists;
   18648           0 :   MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(storageDir->Exists(&exists));
   18649           0 :   if (!exists) {
   18650             :     return NS_ERROR_NOT_AVAILABLE;
   18651             :   }
   18652             : 
   18653             :   bool isDirectory;
   18654           0 :   MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(storageDir->IsDirectory(&isDirectory));
   18655           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(!isDirectory)) {
   18656             :     return NS_ERROR_FAILURE;
   18657             :   }
   18658             : 
   18659             :   // There are currently only 3 persistence types, and we want to iterate them
   18660             :   // in this order:
   18661             :   static const PersistenceType kPersistenceTypes[] = {
   18662             :     PERSISTENCE_TYPE_PERSISTENT,
   18663             :     PERSISTENCE_TYPE_DEFAULT,
   18664             :     PERSISTENCE_TYPE_TEMPORARY
   18665             :   };
   18666             : 
   18667             :   static_assert((sizeof(kPersistenceTypes) / sizeof(kPersistenceTypes[0])) ==
   18668             :                   size_t(PERSISTENCE_TYPE_INVALID),
   18669             :                 "Something changed with available persistence types!");
   18670             : 
   18671             :   NS_NAMED_LITERAL_STRING(idbDirName, IDB_DIRECTORY_NAME);
   18672             :   NS_NAMED_LITERAL_STRING(sqliteExtension, ".sqlite");
   18673             : 
   18674           0 :   for (const PersistenceType persistenceType : kPersistenceTypes) {
   18675             :     // Loop over "<persistence>" directories.
   18676           0 :     if (IsAborted()) {
   18677           0 :       return NS_ERROR_ABORT;
   18678             :     }
   18679             : 
   18680           0 :     nsAutoCString persistenceTypeString;
   18681           0 :     if (persistenceType == PERSISTENCE_TYPE_PERSISTENT) {
   18682             :       // XXX This shouldn't be a special case...
   18683           0 :       persistenceTypeString.AssignLiteral("permanent");
   18684             :     } else {
   18685           0 :       PersistenceTypeToText(persistenceType, persistenceTypeString);
   18686             :     }
   18687             : 
   18688             :     nsCOMPtr<nsIFile> persistenceDir;
   18689           0 :     MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(
   18690             :       storageDir->Clone(getter_AddRefs(persistenceDir)));
   18691           0 :     MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(
   18692             :       persistenceDir->Append(NS_ConvertASCIItoUTF16(persistenceTypeString)));
   18693             : 
   18694           0 :     MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(persistenceDir->Exists(&exists));
   18695           0 :     if (!exists) {
   18696             :       continue;
   18697             :     }
   18698             : 
   18699           0 :     MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(persistenceDir->IsDirectory(&isDirectory));
   18700           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(!isDirectory)) {
   18701             :       continue;
   18702             :     }
   18703             : 
   18704             :     nsCOMPtr<nsISimpleEnumerator> persistenceDirEntries;
   18705           0 :     MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(
   18706             :       persistenceDir->GetDirectoryEntries(
   18707             :         getter_AddRefs(persistenceDirEntries)));
   18708           0 :     if (!persistenceDirEntries) {
   18709             :       continue;
   18710             :     }
   18711             : 
   18712             :     while (true) {
   18713             :       // Loop over "<origin>/idb" directories.
   18714           0 :       if (IsAborted()) {
   18715           0 :         return NS_ERROR_ABORT;

   18717             :

   18722           0 :       if (!persistenceDirHasMoreEntries) {
   18723             :         break;

   18733             :       MOZ_ASSERT(NS_SUCCEEDED(originDir->Exists(&exists)));
   18734             :       MOZ_ASSERT(exists);
   18735             : 
   18736           0 :       MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(originDir->IsDirectory(&isDirectory));

   18760             :         continue;

   18769           0 :         if (IsAborted()) {
   18770           0 :           return NS_ERROR_ABORT;
   18771             :         }

   18775             :           idbDirEntries->HasMoreElements(&idbDirHasMoreEntries));
   18776             : 
   18777           0 :         if (!idbDirHasMoreEntries) {
   18778             :           break;
   18779             :         }
   18780             : 
   18781             :         nsCOMPtr<nsISupports> idbDirEntry;
   18782           0 :         MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(
   18783             :           idbDirEntries->GetNext(getter_AddRefs(idbDirEntry)));
   18784             : 
   18785           0 :         nsCOMPtr<nsIFile> idbDirFile = do_QueryInterface(idbDirEntry);
   18786             :         MOZ_ASSERT(idbDirFile);
   18787             : 
   18788             :         nsString idbFilePath;
   18789           0 :         MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(idbDirFile->GetPath(idbFilePath));
   18790             : 
   18791           0 :         if (!StringEndsWith(idbFilePath, sqliteExtension)) {
   18792             :           continue;
   18793             :         }
   18794             : 
   18795             :         MOZ_ASSERT(NS_SUCCEEDED(idbDirFile->Exists(&exists)));
   18796             :         MOZ_ASSERT(exists);
   18797             : 
   18798           0 :         MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(idbDirFile->IsDirectory(&isDirectory));
   18799           0 :         if (isDirectory) {
   18800             :           continue;
   18801             :         }
   18802             : 
   18803             :         // Found a database.
   18804           0 :         if (databasePaths.IsEmpty()) {
   18805             :           MOZ_ASSERT(group.IsEmpty());
   18806             :           MOZ_ASSERT(origin.IsEmpty());
   18807             : 
   18808             :           int64_t dummyTimeStamp;
   18809             :           bool dummyPersisted;
   18810             :           nsCString dummySuffix;
   18811           0 :           if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(
   18812             :                 quotaManager->GetDirectoryMetadata2(originDir,

   18816             :                                                     group,
   18817             :                                                     origin)))) {
   18818             :             // Not much we can do here...
   18819             :             continue;

   18845             : nsresult
   18846           0 : Maintenance::BeginDatabaseMaintenance()
   18847             : {

   18850             : 
   18851             :   class MOZ_STACK_CLASS Helper final
   18852             :   {
   18853             :   public:
   18854             :     static bool
   18855           0 :     IsSafeToRunMaintenance(const nsAString& aDatabasePath)
   18856             :     {
   18857           0 :       if (gFactoryOps) {
   18858           0 :         for (uint32_t index = gFactoryOps->Length(); index > 0; index--) {
   18859           0 :           RefPtr<FactoryOp>& existingOp = (*gFactoryOps)[index - 1];
   18860             : 
   18861             :           MOZ_ASSERT(!existingOp->DatabaseFilePath().IsEmpty());
   18862             : 
   18863           0 :           if (existingOp->DatabaseFilePath() == aDatabasePath) {
   18864             :             return false;
   18865             :           }
   18866             :         }
   18867             :       }
   18868             : 
   18869           0 :       if (gLiveDatabaseHashtable) {
   18870           0 :         for (auto iter = gLiveDatabaseHashtable->ConstIter();
   18871           0 :              !iter.Done(); iter.Next()) {
   18872           0 :           for (Database* database : iter.Data()->mLiveDatabases) {
   18873           0 :             if (database->FilePath() == aDatabasePath) {
   18874           0 :               return false;
   18875             :             }
   18876             :           }
   18877             :         }
   18878             :       }
   18879             : 
   18880             :       return true;
   18881             :     }
   18882             :   };
   18883             : 
   18884             :   RefPtr<nsThreadPool> threadPool;
   18885             : 
   18886           0 :   for (DirectoryInfo& directoryInfo : mDirectoryInfos) {
   18887           0 :     for (const nsString& databasePath : directoryInfo.mDatabasePaths) {
   18888           0 :       if (Helper::IsSafeToRunMaintenance(databasePath)) {
   18889             :         RefPtr<DatabaseMaintenance> databaseMaintenance =
   18890             :           new DatabaseMaintenance(this,
   18891             :                                   directoryInfo.mPersistenceType,
   18892             :                                   directoryInfo.mGroup,
   18893             :                                   directoryInfo.mOrigin,
   18894           0 :                                   databasePath);
   18895             : 
   18896           0 :         if (!threadPool) {
   18897           0 :           threadPool = mQuotaClient->GetOrCreateThreadPool();
   18898             :           MOZ_ASSERT(threadPool);
   18899             :         }
   18900             : 
   18901           0 :         MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(
   18902             :           threadPool->Dispatch(databaseMaintenance, NS_DISPATCH_NORMAL));
   18903             : 
   18904           0 :         RegisterDatabaseMaintenance(databaseMaintenance);
   18905             :       }
   18906             :     }
   18907             :   }
   18908             : 
   18909           0 :   mDirectoryInfos.Clear();

   18911           0 :   if (mDatabaseMaintenances.Count()) {
   18912           0 :     mState = State::WaitingForDatabaseMaintenancesToComplete;
   18913             :   } else {
   18914           0 :     mState = State::Finishing;
   18915           0 :     Finish();
   18916             :   }
   18917             : 
   18918           0 :   return NS_OK;

   18921             : void
   18922           0 : Maintenance::Finish()

   18926             : 
   18927           0 :   mDirectoryLock = nullptr;

   18937           0 : Maintenance::Run()

   18939             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mState != State::Complete);
   18940             : 
   18941             :   nsresult rv;
   18942             : 
   18943           0 :   switch (mState) {
   18944             :     case State::Initial:
   18945           0 :       rv = Start();
   18946           0 :       break;
   18947             : 
   18948             :     case State::CreateIndexedDatabaseManager:
   18949           0 :       rv = CreateIndexedDatabaseManager();
   18950           0 :       break;
   18951             : 
   18952             :     case State::IndexedDatabaseManagerOpen:
   18953           0 :       rv = OpenDirectory();
   18954           0 :       break;
   18955             : 
   18956             :     case State::DirectoryWorkOpen:
   18957           0 :       rv = DirectoryWork();
   18958           0 :       break;
   18959             : 
   18960             :     case State::BeginDatabaseMaintenance:
   18961           0 :       rv = BeginDatabaseMaintenance();
   18962           0 :       break;
   18963             : 
   18964             :     case State::Finishing:
   18965           0 :       Finish();
   18966           0 :       return NS_OK;
   18967             : 
   18968             :     default:
   18969           0 :       MOZ_CRASH("Bad state!");
   18970             :   }
   18971             : 
   18972           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv)) && mState != State::Finishing) {
   18973             :     // Must set mState before dispatching otherwise we will race with the owning
   18974             :     // thread.
   18975           0 :     mState = State::Finishing;
   18976             : 
   18977           0 :     if (IsOnBackgroundThread()) {
   18978           0 :       Finish();

   18985             :   return NS_OK;

   19116             : nsresult
   19117           0 : DatabaseMaintenance::CheckIntegrity(mozIStorageConnection* aConnection,
   19118             :                                     bool* aOk)
   19119             : {
   19120             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!NS_IsMainThread());
   19121             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!IsOnBackgroundThread());

   19230             : nsresult
   19231           0 : DatabaseMaintenance::DetermineMaintenanceAction(
   19232             :                                           mozIStorageConnection* aConnection,
   19233             :                                           nsIFile* aDatabaseFile,
   19234             :                                           MaintenanceAction* aMaintenanceAction)
   19235             : {
   19236             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!NS_IsMainThread());
   19237             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!IsOnBackgroundThread());
   19238             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aConnection);
   19239             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aDatabaseFile);
   19240             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aMaintenanceAction);
   19241             : 
   19242             :   int32_t schemaVersion;
   19243           0 :   nsresult rv = aConnection->GetSchemaVersion(&schemaVersion);
   19244           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   19245             :     return rv;
   19246             :   }
   19247             : 
   19248             :   // Don't do anything if the schema version is less than 18; before that
   19249             :   // version no databases had |auto_vacuum == INCREMENTAL| set and we didn't
   19250             :   // track the values needed for the heuristics below.
   19251           0 :   if (schemaVersion < MakeSchemaVersion(18, 0)) {
   19252           0 :     *aMaintenanceAction = MaintenanceAction::Nothing;
   19253           0 :     return NS_OK;
   19254             :   }
   19255             : 
   19256           0 :   bool lowDiskSpace = IndexedDatabaseManager::InLowDiskSpaceMode();
   19257             : 
   19258           0 :   if (QuotaManager::IsRunningXPCShellTests()) {
   19259             :     // If we're running XPCShell then we want to test both the low disk space
   19260             :     // and normal disk space code paths so pick semi-randomly based on the
   19261             :     // current time.
   19262           0 :     lowDiskSpace = ((PR_Now() / PR_USEC_PER_MSEC) % 2) == 0;
   19263             :   }
   19264             : 
   19265             :   // If we're low on disk space then the best we can hope for is that an
   19266             :   // incremental vacuum might free some space. That is a journaled operation so
   19267             :   // it may not be possible even then.
   19268           0 :   if (lowDiskSpace) {
   19269           0 :     *aMaintenanceAction = MaintenanceAction::IncrementalVacuum;
   19270           0 :     return NS_OK;
   19271             :   }
   19272             : 
   19273             :   // This method shouldn't make any permanent changes to the database, so make
   19274             :   // sure everything gets rolled back when we leave.
   19275             :   mozStorageTransaction transaction(aConnection,
   19276           0 :                                     /* aCommitOnComplete */ false);

   19278             :   // Check to see when we last vacuumed this database.
   19279             :   nsCOMPtr<mozIStorageStatement> stmt;

   19310           0 :   PRTime startTime = mMaintenance->StartTime();

   19312             :   // This shouldn't really be possible...

   19314           0 :     *aMaintenanceAction = MaintenanceAction::Nothing;
   19315           0 :     return NS_OK;
   19316             :   }
   19317             : 
   19318           0 :   if (startTime - lastVacuumTime < kMinVacuumAge) {
   19319           0 :     *aMaintenanceAction = MaintenanceAction::IncrementalVacuum;
   19320           0 :     return NS_OK;
   19321             :   }
   19322             : 
   19323             :   // It has been more than a week since the database was vacuumed, so gather
   19324             :   // statistics on its usage to see if vacuuming is worthwhile.
   19325             : 
   19326             :   // Create a temporary copy of the dbstat table to speed up the queries that
   19327             :   // come later.

   19329             :     "CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE __stats__ USING dbstat;"

   19331           0 :   ));
   19332           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   19333             :     return rv;
   19334             :   }
   19335             : 
   19336             :   // Calculate the percentage of the database pages that are not in contiguous
   19337             :   // order.
   19338             :   rv = aConnection->CreateStatement(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
   19339             :     "SELECT SUM(__ts1__.pageno != __ts2__.pageno + 1) * 100.0 / COUNT(*) "

   19348           0 :   rv = stmt->ExecuteStep(&hasResult);

   19350             :     return rv;

   19364           0 :   if (percentUnordered >= kPercentUnorderedThreshold) {
   19365           0 :     *aMaintenanceAction = MaintenanceAction::FullVacuum;
   19366           0 :     return NS_OK;

   19368             : 
   19369             :   // Don't try a full vacuum if the file hasn't grown by 10%.

   19377           0 :       (((currentFileSize - lastVacuumSize) * 100 / currentFileSize) <

   19379           0 :     *aMaintenanceAction = MaintenanceAction::IncrementalVacuum;

   19381             :   }

   19393             :     return rv;

   19401             :     return rv;

   19404             :   MOZ_ASSERT(freelistCount >= 0);

   19407             :   // that causes too much fragmentation then we'll try a full vacuum later.

   19409           0 :     *aMaintenanceAction = MaintenanceAction::IncrementalVacuum;

   19412             : 
   19413             :   // Calculate the percentage of unused bytes on pages in the database.

   19641             : nsresult
   19642           0 : UpgradeFileIdsFunction::Init(nsIFile* aFMDirectory,
   19643             :                              mozIStorageConnection* aConnection)

   19648             :     new FileManager(PERSISTENCE_TYPE_INVALID,

   20158           0 : DatabaseOperationBase::IndexDataValuesFromUpdateInfos(

   20162             : {

   20167             :                  "DatabaseOperationBase::IndexDataValuesFromUpdateInfos",

   20179             :   }

   21048             :     return NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_UNKNOWN_ERR;

   21050             : 
   21051             :   // See if this FactoryOp needs to wait.

   21054           0 :     RefPtr<FactoryOp>& existingOp = (*gFactoryOps)[index - 1];

   21056             :       // Only one op can be delayed.
   21057             :       MOZ_ASSERT(!existingOp->mDelayedOp);
   21058           0 :       existingOp->mDelayedOp = this;
   21059           0 :       delayed = true;
   21060           0 :       break;

   21065             :   // proceeding until this one is done.

   21167             : nsresult
   21168           0 : FactoryOp::CheckPermission(ContentParent* aContentParent,
   21169             :                            PermissionRequestBase::PermissionValue* aPermission)
   21170             : {
   21171             :   MOZ_ASSERT(NS_IsMainThread());
   21172             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mState == State::Initial || mState == State::PermissionRetry);
   21173             : 
   21174           0 :   const PrincipalInfo& principalInfo = mCommonParams.principalInfo();
   21175           0 :   if (principalInfo.type() != PrincipalInfo::TSystemPrincipalInfo &&
   21176           0 :       NS_WARN_IF(!Preferences::GetBool(kPrefIndexedDBEnabled, false))) {
   21177           0 :     if (aContentParent) {
   21178             :       // The DOM in the other process should have kept us from receiving any
   21179             :       // indexedDB messages so assume that the child is misbehaving.
   21180           0 :       aContentParent->KillHard("IndexedDB CheckPermission 1");
   21181             :     }
   21182             :     return NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_NOT_ALLOWED_ERR;
   21183             :   }
   21184             : 
   21185           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(mCommonParams.privateBrowsingMode())) {
   21186             :     // XXX This is only temporary.
   21187             :     return NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_NOT_ALLOWED_ERR;
   21188             :   }
   21189             : 
   21190           0 :   mFileHandleDisabled = !Preferences::GetBool(kPrefFileHandleEnabled);
   21191             : 
   21192           0 :   PersistenceType persistenceType = mCommonParams.metadata().persistenceType();
   21193             : 
   21194             :   MOZ_ASSERT(principalInfo.type() != PrincipalInfo::TNullPrincipalInfo);
   21195             : 
   21196           0 :   if (principalInfo.type() == PrincipalInfo::TSystemPrincipalInfo) {
   21197             :     MOZ_ASSERT(mState == State::Initial);
   21198             :     MOZ_ASSERT(persistenceType == PERSISTENCE_TYPE_PERSISTENT);
   21199             : 
   21200           0 :     if (aContentParent) {
   21201             :       // Check to make sure that the child process has access to the database it
   21202             :       // is accessing.
   21203             :       NS_NAMED_LITERAL_CSTRING(permissionStringBase,
   21204             :                                PERMISSION_STRING_CHROME_BASE);
   21205           0 :       NS_ConvertUTF16toUTF8 databaseName(mCommonParams.metadata().name());
   21206             :       NS_NAMED_LITERAL_CSTRING(readSuffix, PERMISSION_STRING_CHROME_READ_SUFFIX);
   21207             :       NS_NAMED_LITERAL_CSTRING(writeSuffix, PERMISSION_STRING_CHROME_WRITE_SUFFIX);
   21208             : 
   21209             :       const nsAutoCString permissionStringWrite =
   21210           0 :         permissionStringBase + databaseName + writeSuffix;
   21211             :       const nsAutoCString permissionStringRead =
   21212           0 :         permissionStringBase + databaseName + readSuffix;
   21213             : 
   21214             :       bool canWrite =
   21215           0 :         CheckAtLeastOneAppHasPermission(aContentParent, permissionStringWrite);
   21216             : 
   21217             :       bool canRead;
   21218             :       if (canWrite) {
   21219             :         MOZ_ASSERT(CheckAtLeastOneAppHasPermission(aContentParent,
   21220             :                                                    permissionStringRead));
   21221           0 :         canRead = true;
   21222             :       } else {
   21223             :         canRead =
   21224             :           CheckAtLeastOneAppHasPermission(aContentParent, permissionStringRead);
   21225             :       }
   21226             : 
   21227             :       // Deleting a database requires write permissions.
   21228             :       if (mDeleting && !canWrite) {
   21229             :         aContentParent->KillHard("IndexedDB CheckPermission 2");
   21230             :         IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();
   21231             :         return NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_UNKNOWN_ERR;
   21232             :       }
   21233             : 
   21234             :       // Opening or deleting requires read permissions.
   21235             :       if (!canRead) {
   21236             :         aContentParent->KillHard("IndexedDB CheckPermission 3");
   21237             :         IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();
   21238             :         return NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_UNKNOWN_ERR;
   21239             :       }
   21240             : 
   21241           0 :       mChromeWriteAccessAllowed = canWrite;
   21242             :     } else {
   21243           0 :       mChromeWriteAccessAllowed = true;
   21244             :     }
   21245             : 
   21246           0 :     if (State::Initial == mState) {
   21247           0 :       QuotaManager::GetInfoForChrome(&mSuffix, &mGroup, &mOrigin);
   21248             : 
   21249             :       MOZ_ASSERT(QuotaManager::IsOriginInternal(mOrigin));
   21250             : 
   21251           0 :       mEnforcingQuota = false;
   21252             :     }
   21253             : 
   21254           0 :     *aPermission = PermissionRequestBase::kPermissionAllowed;
   21255           0 :     return NS_OK;
   21256             :   }
   21257             :

   21259             :

   21262           0 :     PrincipalInfoToPrincipal(principalInfo, &rv);

   21311           0 : FactoryOp::SendVersionChangeMessages(DatabaseActorInfo* aDatabaseActorInfo,
   21312             :                                      Database* aOpeningDatabase,
   21313             :                                      uint64_t aOldVersion,
   21314             :                                      const NullableVersion& aNewVersion)
   21315             : {
   21316           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();
   21317             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aDatabaseActorInfo);
   21318             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mState == State::BeginVersionChange);
   21319             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mMaybeBlockedDatabases.IsEmpty());
   21320             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!IsActorDestroyed());
   21321             : 
   21322           0 :   const uint32_t expectedCount = mDeleting ? 0 : 1;
   21323           0 :   const uint32_t liveCount = aDatabaseActorInfo->mLiveDatabases.Length();

   21325             :     FallibleTArray<MaybeBlockedDatabaseInfo> maybeBlockedDatabases;
   21326           0 :     for (uint32_t index = 0; index < liveCount; index++) {
   21327           0 :       Database* database = aDatabaseActorInfo->mLiveDatabases[index];

   21329           0 :           !database->IsClosed() &&
   21330           0 :           NS_WARN_IF(!maybeBlockedDatabases.AppendElement(database, fallible))) {
   21331           0 :         return NS_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY;
   21332             :       }
   21333             :     }
   21334             : 
   21335           0 :     if (!maybeBlockedDatabases.IsEmpty()) {
   21336           0 :       mMaybeBlockedDatabases.SwapElements(maybeBlockedDatabases);
   21337             :     }
   21338             :   }
   21339             : 
   21340           0 :   if (!mMaybeBlockedDatabases.IsEmpty()) {
   21341           0 :     for (uint32_t count = mMaybeBlockedDatabases.Length(), index = 0;
   21342             :          index < count;
   21343             :          /* incremented conditionally */) {
   21344           0 :       if (mMaybeBlockedDatabases[index]->SendVersionChange(aOldVersion,
   21345           0 :                                                            aNewVersion)) {
   21346           0 :         index++;
   21347             :       } else {
   21348             :         // We don't want to wait forever if we were not able to send the
   21349             :         // message.
   21350           0 :         mMaybeBlockedDatabases.RemoveElementAt(index);
   21351           0 :         count--;
   21352             :       }
   21353             :     }
   21354             :   }
   21355             : 
   21356             :   return NS_OK;
   21357             : }

   21480             : void
   21481           0 : FactoryOp::NoteDatabaseBlocked(Database* aDatabase)
   21482             : {
   21483           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();
   21484             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mState == State::WaitingForOtherDatabasesToClose);
   21485             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!mMaybeBlockedDatabases.IsEmpty());
   21486             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mMaybeBlockedDatabases.Contains(aDatabase));
   21487             : 
   21488             :   // Only send the blocked event if all databases have reported back. If the
   21489             :   // database was closed then it will have been removed from the array.
   21490             :   // Otherwise if it was blocked its |mBlocked| flag will be true.
   21491           0 :   bool sendBlockedEvent = true;
   21492             : 
   21493           0 :   for (uint32_t count = mMaybeBlockedDatabases.Length(), index = 0;
   21494             :        index < count;
   21495             :        index++) {
   21496           0 :     MaybeBlockedDatabaseInfo& info = mMaybeBlockedDatabases[index];
   21497           0 :     if (info == aDatabase) {
   21498             :       // This database was blocked, mark accordingly.
   21499           0 :       info.mBlocked = true;
   21500           0 :     } else if (!info.mBlocked) {
   21501             :       // A database has not yet reported back yet, don't send the event yet.
   21502           0 :       sendBlockedEvent = false;
   21503             :     }
   21504             :   }
   21505             : 
   21506           0 :   if (sendBlockedEvent) {
   21507           0 :     SendBlockedNotification();
   21508             :   }
   21509           0 : }

   21513             : NS_IMETHODIMP
   21514           0 : FactoryOp::Run()
   21515             : {
   21516             :   nsresult rv;
   21517             : 
   21518           0 :   switch (mState) {
   21519             :     case State::Initial:
   21520           0 :       rv = Open();
   21521           0 :       break;
   21522             : 
   21523             :     case State::PermissionChallenge:
   21524           0 :       rv = ChallengePermission();
   21525           0 :       break;
   21526             : 
   21527             :     case State::PermissionRetry:
   21528           0 :       rv = RetryCheckPermission();
   21529           0 :       break;
   21530             : 
   21531             :     case State::FinishOpen:
   21532           0 :       rv = FinishOpen();
   21533           0 :       break;
   21534             : 
   21535             :     case State::QuotaManagerPending:
   21536           0 :       rv = QuotaManagerOpen();
   21537           0 :       break;
   21538             : 
   21539             :     case State::DatabaseOpenPending:
   21540           0 :       rv = DatabaseOpen();
   21541           0 :       break;
   21542             : 
   21543             :     case State::DatabaseWorkOpen:
   21544           0 :       rv = DoDatabaseWork();
   21545           0 :       break;
   21546             : 
   21547             :     case State::BeginVersionChange:
   21548           0 :       rv = BeginVersionChange();
   21549           0 :       break;
   21550             : 
   21551             :     case State::WaitingForTransactionsToComplete:
   21552           0 :       rv = DispatchToWorkThread();
   21553           0 :       break;
   21554             : 
   21555             :     case State::SendingResults:
   21556           0 :       SendResults();
   21557           0 :       return NS_OK;
   21558             : 
   21559             :     default:
   21560           0 :       MOZ_CRASH("Bad state!");
   21561             :   }
   21562             : 
   21563           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv)) && mState != State::SendingResults) {
   21564           0 :     if (NS_SUCCEEDED(mResultCode)) {
   21565           0 :       mResultCode = rv;
   21566             :     }
   21567             : 
   21568             :     // Must set mState before dispatching otherwise we will race with the owning
   21569             :     // thread.
   21570           0 :     mState = State::SendingResults;
   21571             : 
   21572           0 :     if (IsOnOwningThread()) {
   21573           0 :       SendResults();
   21574             :     } else {
   21575           0 :       MOZ_ALWAYS_SUCCEEDS(mOwningThread->Dispatch(this, NS_DISPATCH_NORMAL));
   21576             :     }
   21577             :   }
   21578             : 
   21579             :   return NS_OK;
   21580             : }

   21791           0 :                                getter_AddRefs(connection));
   21792           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   21793             :     return rv;
   21794             :   }
   21795             : 
   21796           0 :   AutoSetProgressHandler asph;

   21798           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   21799             :     return rv;
   21800             :   }
   21801             : 
   21802           0 :   rv = LoadDatabaseInformation(connection);
   21803           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   21804             :     return rv;
   21805             :   }
   21806             : 
   21807             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mMetadata->mNextObjectStoreId > mMetadata->mObjectStores.Count());
   21808             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mMetadata->mNextIndexId > 0);
   21809             : 
   21810             :   // See if we need to do a versionchange transaction
   21811             : 
   21812             :   // Optional version semantics.
   21813           0 :   if (!mRequestedVersion) {

   22313           0 : OpenDatabaseOp::BeginVersionChange()
   22314             : {
   22315           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();

   22318             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mMetadata->mCommonMetadata.version() <= mRequestedVersion);
   22319             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!mDatabase);

   22321             : 
   22322           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(QuotaClient::IsShuttingDownOnBackgroundThread()) ||
   22323           0 :       IsActorDestroyed()) {
   22324           0 :     IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();
   22325           0 :     return NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_UNKNOWN_ERR;
   22326             :   }
   22327             : 
   22328           0 :   EnsureDatabaseActor();
   22329             : 
   22330           0 :   if (mDatabase->IsInvalidated()) {
   22331           0 :     IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();
   22332           0 :     return NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_UNKNOWN_ERR;
   22333             :   }
   22334             : 
   22335             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!mDatabase->IsClosed());
   22336             : 
   22337             :   DatabaseActorInfo* info;
   22338           0 :   MOZ_ALWAYS_TRUE(gLiveDatabaseHashtable->Get(mDatabaseId, &info));
   22339             : 
   22340             :   MOZ_ASSERT(info->mLiveDatabases.Contains(mDatabase));

   22345           0 :     new VersionChangeTransaction(this);

   22347           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(!transaction->CopyDatabaseMetadata())) {
   22348             :     return NS_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY;

   22350             :

   22359           0 :                               mMetadata->mCommonMetadata.version(),
   22360           0 :                               newVersion);

   22362             :     return rv;
   22363             :   }
   22364             : 
   22365           0 :   mVersionChangeTransaction.swap(transaction);
   22366             :

   22368             :     // We don't need to wait on any databases, just jump to the transaction
   22369             :     // pool.

   22380             : void
   22381           0 : OpenDatabaseOp::NoteDatabaseClosed(Database* aDatabase)
   22382             : {
   22383           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();
   22384             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aDatabase);

   22386             :              mState == State::WaitingForTransactionsToComplete ||
   22387             :              mState == State::DatabaseWorkVersionChange);

   22392             :                  aDatabase->Metadata()->mCommonMetadata.version(),

   22535             : void
   22536           0 : OpenDatabaseOp::SendResults()

   22542             : 
   22543           0 :   mMaybeBlockedDatabases.Clear();

   22545             :   // Only needed if we're being called from within NoteDatabaseDone() since this
   22546             :   // OpenDatabaseOp is only held alive by the gLiveDatabaseHashtable.

   22551           0 :       gLiveDatabaseHashtable->Get(mDatabaseId, &info) &&

   22555           0 :       static_cast<OpenDatabaseOp*>(info->mWaitingFactoryOp.get());

   22568           0 :       mResultCode = NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_UNKNOWN_ERR;
   22569             :     }

   22571             :     FactoryRequestResponse response;
   22572             :

   22575             :       // need to update the version in our metadata.
   22576           0 :       mMetadata->mCommonMetadata.version() = mRequestedVersion;
   22577             : 
   22578           0 :       nsresult rv = EnsureDatabaseActorIsAlive();

   22580             :         // We successfully opened a database so use its actor as the success
   22581             :         // result for this request.
   22582           0 :         OpenDatabaseRequestResponse openResponse;
   22583           0 :         openResponse.databaseParent() = mDatabase;
   22584           0 :         response = openResponse;

   22586           0 :         response = ClampResultCode(rv);

   22590             :       }
   22591             :     } else {
   22592             : #ifdef DEBUG

   22609           0 :       mDatabase->Invalidate();

   22644             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!mDatabaseFilePath.IsEmpty());
   22645             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!IsActorDestroyed());

   22648           0 :     return;

   22683             : 
   22684             :   // Balanced in Database::CleanupMetadata().
   22685           0 :   IncreaseBusyCount();

   22688             : nsresult
   22689           0 : OpenDatabaseOp::EnsureDatabaseActorIsAlive()
   22690             : {
   22691           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();

   22693             :              mState == State::SendingResults);

   22719             : void
   22720           0 : OpenDatabaseOp::MetadataToSpec(DatabaseSpec& aSpec)
   22721             : {
   22722           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();
   22723             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mMetadata);
   22724             : 
   22725           0 :   aSpec.metadata() = mMetadata->mCommonMetadata;
   22726             : 
   22727           0 :   for (auto objectStoreIter = mMetadata->mObjectStores.ConstIter();
   22728           0 :        !objectStoreIter.Done();
   22729           0 :        objectStoreIter.Next()) {

   22732             :     MOZ_ASSERT(metadata);
   22733             :

   22735           0 :     ObjectStoreSpec* objectStoreSpec = aSpec.objectStores().AppendElement();

   22737             : 
   22738           0 :     for (auto indexIter = metadata->mIndexes.Iter();

   22751             : 
   22752             : #ifdef DEBUG
   22753             : 
   22754             : void
   22755             : OpenDatabaseOp::AssertMetadataConsistency(const FullDatabaseMetadata* aMetadata)
   22756             : {
   22757             :   AssertIsOnBackgroundThread();
   22758             : 
   22759             :   const FullDatabaseMetadata* thisDB = mMetadata;
   22760             :   const FullDatabaseMetadata* otherDB = aMetadata;
   22761             : 
   22762             :   MOZ_ASSERT(thisDB);
   22763             :   MOZ_ASSERT(otherDB);
   22764             :   MOZ_ASSERT(thisDB != otherDB);
   22765             : 
   22766             :   MOZ_ASSERT(thisDB->mCommonMetadata.name() == otherDB->mCommonMetadata.name());
   22767             :   MOZ_ASSERT(thisDB->mCommonMetadata.version() ==
   22768             :                otherDB->mCommonMetadata.version());
   22769             :   MOZ_ASSERT(thisDB->mCommonMetadata.persistenceType() ==
   22770             :                otherDB->mCommonMetadata.persistenceType());
   22771             :   MOZ_ASSERT(thisDB->mDatabaseId == otherDB->mDatabaseId);
   22772             :   MOZ_ASSERT(thisDB->mFilePath == otherDB->mFilePath);
   22773             : 
   22774             :   // |thisDB| reflects the latest objectStore and index ids that have committed
   22775             :   // to disk. The in-memory metadata |otherDB| keeps track of objectStores and
   22776             :   // indexes that were created and then removed as well, so the next ids for
   22777             :   // |otherDB| may be higher than for |thisDB|.
   22778             :   MOZ_ASSERT(thisDB->mNextObjectStoreId <= otherDB->mNextObjectStoreId);
   22779             :   MOZ_ASSERT(thisDB->mNextIndexId <= otherDB->mNextIndexId);
   22780             : 
   22781             :   MOZ_ASSERT(thisDB->mObjectStores.Count() == otherDB->mObjectStores.Count());
   22782             : 
   22783             :   for (auto objectStoreIter = thisDB->mObjectStores.ConstIter();
   22784             :        !objectStoreIter.Done();
   22785             :        objectStoreIter.Next()) {
   22786             :     FullObjectStoreMetadata* thisObjectStore = objectStoreIter.UserData();
   22787             :     MOZ_ASSERT(thisObjectStore);
   22788             :     MOZ_ASSERT(!thisObjectStore->mDeleted);
   22789             : 
   22790             :     auto* otherObjectStore =
   22791             :       MetadataNameOrIdMatcher<FullObjectStoreMetadata>::Match(
   22792             :         otherDB->mObjectStores, thisObjectStore->mCommonMetadata.id());
   22793             :     MOZ_ASSERT(otherObjectStore);
   22794             : 
   22795             :     MOZ_ASSERT(thisObjectStore != otherObjectStore);
   22796             : 
   22797             :     MOZ_ASSERT(thisObjectStore->mCommonMetadata.id() ==
   22798             :                  otherObjectStore->mCommonMetadata.id());
   22799             :     MOZ_ASSERT(thisObjectStore->mCommonMetadata.name() ==
   22800             :                  otherObjectStore->mCommonMetadata.name());
   22801             :     MOZ_ASSERT(thisObjectStore->mCommonMetadata.autoIncrement() ==
   22802             :                  otherObjectStore->mCommonMetadata.autoIncrement());
   22803             :     MOZ_ASSERT(thisObjectStore->mCommonMetadata.keyPath() ==
   22804             :                  otherObjectStore->mCommonMetadata.keyPath());
   22805             :     // mNextAutoIncrementId and mCommittedAutoIncrementId may be modified
   22806             :     // concurrently with this OpenOp, so it is not possible to assert equality
   22807             :     // here. It's also possible that we've written the new ids to disk but not
   22808             :     // yet updated the in-memory count.
   22809             :     MOZ_ASSERT(thisObjectStore->mNextAutoIncrementId <=
   22810             :                  otherObjectStore->mNextAutoIncrementId);
   22811             :     MOZ_ASSERT(thisObjectStore->mCommittedAutoIncrementId <=
   22812             :                  otherObjectStore->mCommittedAutoIncrementId ||
   22813             :                thisObjectStore->mCommittedAutoIncrementId ==
   22814             :                  otherObjectStore->mNextAutoIncrementId);
   22815             :     MOZ_ASSERT(!otherObjectStore->mDeleted);
   22816             : 
   22817             :     MOZ_ASSERT(thisObjectStore->mIndexes.Count() ==
   22818             :                  otherObjectStore->mIndexes.Count());
   22819             : 
   22820             :     for (auto indexIter = thisObjectStore->mIndexes.Iter();
   22821             :          !indexIter.Done();
   22822             :          indexIter.Next()) {
   22823             :       FullIndexMetadata* thisIndex = indexIter.UserData();
   22824             :       MOZ_ASSERT(thisIndex);
   22825             :       MOZ_ASSERT(!thisIndex->mDeleted);
   22826             : 
   22827             :       auto* otherIndex =
   22828             :         MetadataNameOrIdMatcher<FullIndexMetadata>::
   22829             :           Match(otherObjectStore->mIndexes, thisIndex->mCommonMetadata.id());
   22830             :       MOZ_ASSERT(otherIndex);
   22831             : 
   22832             :       MOZ_ASSERT(thisIndex != otherIndex);
   22833             : 
   22834             :       MOZ_ASSERT(thisIndex->mCommonMetadata.id() ==
   22835             :                    otherIndex->mCommonMetadata.id());
   22836             :       MOZ_ASSERT(thisIndex->mCommonMetadata.name() ==
   22837             :                    otherIndex->mCommonMetadata.name());
   22838             :       MOZ_ASSERT(thisIndex->mCommonMetadata.keyPath() ==
   22839             :                    otherIndex->mCommonMetadata.keyPath());
   22840             :       MOZ_ASSERT(thisIndex->mCommonMetadata.unique() ==
   22841             :                    otherIndex->mCommonMetadata.unique());
   22842             :       MOZ_ASSERT(thisIndex->mCommonMetadata.multiEntry() ==

   23363             :

   23365           0 :       !OperationMayProceed()) {

   23375             :     QuotaManager::Get() :
   23376           0 :     nullptr;

   23384           0 :     return NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_UNKNOWN_ERR;
   23385             :   }
   23386             : 
   23387             :   // The database file counts towards quota.
   23388             :   nsAutoString filename =
   23389           0 :     mDeleteDatabaseOp->mDatabaseFilenameBase + NS_LITERAL_STRING(".sqlite");

   23683             : void
   23684           0 : TransactionDatabaseOperationBase::RunOnConnectionThread()
   23685             : {
   23686             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!IsOnBackgroundThread());
   23687             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mInternalState == InternalState::DatabaseWork);
   23688             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mTransaction);
   23689             :   MOZ_ASSERT(NS_SUCCEEDED(mResultCode));
   23690             : 
   23691           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
   23692             :                  "TransactionDatabaseOperationBase::RunOnConnectionThread",
   23693             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
   23694             : 
   23695             :   // There are several cases where we don't actually have to to any work here.
   23696             : 
   23697           0 :   if (mTransactionIsAborted || mTransaction->IsInvalidatedOnAnyThread()) {
   23698             :     // This transaction is already set to be aborted or invalidated.
   23699           0 :     mResultCode = NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_ABORT_ERR;
   23700           0 :   } else if (!OperationMayProceed()) {
   23701             :     // The operation was canceled in some way, likely because the child process
   23702             :     // has crashed.
   23703           0 :     IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();
   23704           0 :     mResultCode = NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_UNKNOWN_ERR;
   23705             :   } else {
   23706           0 :     Database* database = mTransaction->GetDatabase();
   23707             :     MOZ_ASSERT(database);
   23708             : 
   23709             :     // Here we're actually going to perform the database operation.
   23710           0 :     nsresult rv = database->EnsureConnection();
   23711           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   23712           0 :       mResultCode = rv;
   23713             :     } else {

   23716             :       MOZ_ASSERT(connection->GetStorageConnection());

   23720           0 :         rv = autoProgress.Register(connection->GetStorageConnection(), this);

   23722           0 :           mResultCode = rv;
   23723             :         }

   23736           0 :         rv = DoDatabaseWork(connection);

   23820             : 
   23821             : void
   23822           0 : TransactionDatabaseOperationBase::SendPreprocessInfoOrResults(
   23823             :                                                        bool aSendPreprocessInfo)
   23824             : {
   23825           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();
   23826             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mInternalState == InternalState::SendingPreprocess ||
   23827             :              mInternalState == InternalState::SendingResults);
   23828             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mTransaction);
   23829             : 
   23830             :   // Only needed if we're being called from within NoteContinueReceived() since
   23831             :   // this TransactionDatabaseOperationBase is only held alive by the IPDL.
   23832             :   // SendSuccessResult/SendFailureResult releases that last reference.
   23833             :   RefPtr<TransactionDatabaseOperationBase> kungFuDeathGrip;
   23834             : 
   23835           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(IsActorDestroyed())) {
   23836             :     // Don't send any notifications if the actor was destroyed already.
   23837           0 :     if (NS_SUCCEEDED(mResultCode)) {
   23838           0 :       IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();
   23839           0 :       mResultCode = NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_UNKNOWN_ERR;
   23840             :     }
   23841             :   } else {
   23842           0 :     if (!aSendPreprocessInfo) {
   23843             :       kungFuDeathGrip = this;
   23844             :     }
   23845             : 
   23846           0 :     if (mTransaction->IsInvalidated() || mTransaction->IsAborted()) {
   23847             :       // Aborted transactions always see their requests fail with ABORT_ERR,
   23848             :       // even if the request succeeded or failed with another error.
   23849           0 :       mResultCode = NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_ABORT_ERR;
   23850           0 :     } else if (NS_SUCCEEDED(mResultCode)) {
   23851           0 :       if (aSendPreprocessInfo) {
   23852             :         // This should not release the IPDL reference.
   23853           0 :         mResultCode = SendPreprocessInfo();
   23854             :       } else {
   23855             :         // This may release the IPDL reference.
   23856           0 :         mResultCode = SendSuccessResult();
   23857             :       }
   23858             :     }
   23859             : 
   23860           0 :     if (NS_FAILED(mResultCode)) {
   23861             :       // This should definitely release the IPDL reference.
   23862           0 :       if (!SendFailureResult(mResultCode)) {
   23863             :         // Abort the transaction.
   23864           0 :         mTransaction->Abort(mResultCode, /* aForce */ false);
   23865             :       }
   23866             :     }
   23867             :   }
   23868             : 
   23869           0 :   if (aSendPreprocessInfo && NS_SUCCEEDED(mResultCode)) {
   23870           0 :     mInternalState = InternalState::WaitingForContinue;
   23871             :   } else {
   23872           0 :     if (mLoggingSerialNumber) {
   23873           0 :       mTransaction->NoteFinishedRequest();
   23874             :     }
   23875             : 
   23876           0 :     Cleanup();
   23877             : 
   23878           0 :     mInternalState = InternalState::Completed;
   23879           0 :   }
   23880           0 : }
   23881             :

   23883           0 : TransactionDatabaseOperationBase::Init(TransactionBase* aTransaction)

   23887             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aTransaction);
   23888             : 
   23889           0 :   return true;

   23891             : 
   23892             : void
   23893           0 : TransactionDatabaseOperationBase::Cleanup()
   23894             : {
   23895           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();
   23896             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mInternalState == InternalState::SendingResults);
   23897             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mTransaction);
   23898             : 
   23899           0 :   mTransaction = nullptr;
   23900           0 : }
   23901             : 
   23902             : NS_IMETHODIMP
   23903           0 : TransactionDatabaseOperationBase::Run()
   23904             : {
   23905           0 :   switch (mInternalState) {
   23906             :     case InternalState::Initial:
   23907           0 :       SendToConnectionPool();
   23908           0 :       return NS_OK;
   23909             : 
   23910             :     case InternalState::DatabaseWork:
   23911           0 :       RunOnConnectionThread();
   23912           0 :       return NS_OK;
   23913             : 
   23914             :     case InternalState::SendingPreprocess:
   23915           0 :       SendPreprocess();
   23916           0 :       return NS_OK;
   23917             : 
   23918             :     case InternalState::SendingResults:
   23919           0 :       SendResults();
   23920           0 :       return NS_OK;
   23921             : 
   23922             :     default:
   23923           0 :       MOZ_CRASH("Bad state!");
   23924             :   }
   23925             : }
   23926             : 
   23927           0 : TransactionBase::
   23928             : CommitOp::CommitOp(TransactionBase* aTransaction, nsresult aResultCode)
   23929           0 :   : DatabaseOperationBase(aTransaction->GetLoggingInfo()->Id(),
   23930             :                           aTransaction->GetLoggingInfo()->NextRequestSN())
   23931             :   , mTransaction(aTransaction)
   23932           0 :   , mResultCode(aResultCode)
   23933             : {
   23934             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aTransaction);
   23935             :   MOZ_ASSERT(LoggingSerialNumber());

   24266             : 
   24267             :     case State::DatabaseWork:
   24268           0 :       rv = DoDatabaseWork();
   24269           0 :       break;
   24270             : 
   24271             :     case State::SendingResults:
   24272           0 :       SendResults();
   24273           0 :       return NS_OK;
   24274             : 
   24275             :     default:
   24276           0 :       MOZ_CRASH("Bad state!");
   24277             :   }

   24281           0 :       mResultCode = rv;
   24282             :     }

   24285             :     // thread.
