   24417             : void
   24418           0 : CreateFileOp::SendResults()
   24419             : {
   24420           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();
   24421             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mState == State::SendingResults);
   24422             : 
   24423           0 :   if (!IsActorDestroyed() && !mDatabase->IsInvalidated()) {
   24424             :     DatabaseRequestResponse response;
   24425             : 
   24426           0 :     if (NS_SUCCEEDED(mResultCode)) {
   24427             :       RefPtr<MutableFile> mutableFile;
   24428           0 :       nsresult rv = CreateMutableFile(getter_AddRefs(mutableFile));
   24429           0 :       if (NS_SUCCEEDED(rv)) {
   24430             :         // We successfully created a mutable file so use its actor as the
   24431             :         // success result for this request.
   24432           0 :         CreateFileRequestResponse createResponse;
   24433           0 :         createResponse.mutableFileParent() = mutableFile;
   24434           0 :         response = createResponse;
   24435             :       } else {
   24436           0 :         response = ClampResultCode(rv);
   24437             : #ifdef DEBUG
   24438             :         mResultCode = response.get_nsresult();
   24439             : #endif
   24440           0 :       }
   24441             :     } else {
   24442           0 :       response = ClampResultCode(mResultCode);
   24443             :     }
   24444             : 
   24445             :     Unused <<
   24446           0 :       PBackgroundIDBDatabaseRequestParent::Send__delete__(this, response);
   24447             :   }
   24448             : 
   24449           0 :   mState = State::Completed;
   24450           0 : }
   24451             : 
   24452             : nsresult
   24453           0 : VersionChangeTransactionOp::SendSuccessResult()
   24454             : {
   24455           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();
   24456             : 
   24457             :   // Nothing to send here, the API assumes that this request always succeeds.
   24458           0 :   return NS_OK;
   24459             : }
   24460             : 
   24461             : bool
   24462           0 : VersionChangeTransactionOp::SendFailureResult(nsresult aResultCode)
   24463             : {
   24464           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();
   24465             : 
   24466             :   // The only option here is to cause the transaction to abort.
   24467           0 :   return false;

   25491             : nsresult
   25492           0 : DeleteIndexOp::RemoveReferencesToIndex(DatabaseConnection* aConnection,
   25493             :                                        const Key& aObjectStoreKey,
   25494             :                                        nsTArray<IndexDataValue>& aIndexValues)
   25495             : {
   25496             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!NS_IsMainThread());
   25497             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!IsOnBackgroundThread());
   25498             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aConnection);
   25499             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!aObjectStoreKey.IsUnset());
   25500             :   MOZ_ASSERT_IF(!mIsLastIndex, !aIndexValues.IsEmpty());
   25501             : 
   25502             :   struct MOZ_STACK_CLASS IndexIdComparator final
   25503             :   {
   25504             :     bool
   25505             :     Equals(const IndexDataValue& aA, const IndexDataValue& aB) const
   25506             :     {
   25507             :       // Ignore everything but the index id.
   25508             :       return aA.mIndexId == aB.mIndexId;
   25509             :     };
   25510             : 
   25511             :     bool
   25512             :     LessThan(const IndexDataValue& aA, const IndexDataValue& aB) const
   25513             :     {
   25514             :       return aA.mIndexId < aB.mIndexId;
   25515             :     };
   25516             :   };
   25517             : 
   25518           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
   25519             :                  "DeleteIndexOp::RemoveReferencesToIndex",
   25520             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
   25521             : 
   25522           0 :   if (mIsLastIndex) {
   25523             :     // There is no need to parse the previous entry in the index_data_values
   25524             :     // column if this is the last index. Simply set it to NULL.
   25525             :     DatabaseConnection::CachedStatement stmt;
   25526             :     nsresult rv = aConnection->GetCachedStatement(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
   25527             :       "UPDATE object_data "
   25528             :         "SET index_data_values = NULL "
   25529             :         "WHERE object_store_id = :object_store_id "
   25530             :         "AND key = :key;"),
   25531           0 :       &stmt);

   25549           0 :       return rv;

   25552           0 :     return NS_OK;
   25553             :   }
   25554             : 
   25555           0 :   IndexDataValue search;
   25556           0 :   search.mIndexId = mIndexId;
   25557             : 
   25558             :   // This returns the first element that matches our index id found during a
   25559             :   // binary search. However, there could still be other elements before that.
   25560             :   size_t firstElementIndex =
   25561           0 :     aIndexValues.BinaryIndexOf(search, IndexIdComparator());

   25563           0 :       NS_WARN_IF(aIndexValues[firstElementIndex].mIndexId != mIndexId)) {
   25564           0 :     IDB_REPORT_INTERNAL_ERR();
   25565           0 :     return NS_ERROR_FILE_CORRUPTED;
   25566             :   }
   25567             : 
   25568             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aIndexValues[firstElementIndex].mIndexId == mIndexId);
   25569             : 
   25570             :   // Walk backwards to find the real first index.
   25571           0 :   while (firstElementIndex) {
   25572           0 :     if (aIndexValues[firstElementIndex - 1].mIndexId == mIndexId) {
   25573             :       firstElementIndex--;
   25574             :     } else {
   25575             :       break;
   25576             :     }
   25577             :   }
   25578             : 
   25579             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aIndexValues[firstElementIndex].mIndexId == mIndexId);
   25580             : 
   25581           0 :   const size_t indexValuesLength = aIndexValues.Length();
   25582             : 
   25583             :   // Find the last element with the same index id.
   25584           0 :   size_t lastElementIndex = firstElementIndex;
   25585             : 
   25586           0 :   while (lastElementIndex < indexValuesLength) {
   25587           0 :     if (aIndexValues[lastElementIndex].mIndexId == mIndexId) {
   25588           0 :       lastElementIndex++;
   25589             :     } else {
   25590             :       break;
   25591             :     }
   25592             :   }
   25593             : 
   25594             :   MOZ_ASSERT(lastElementIndex > firstElementIndex);

   25596             :                 aIndexValues[lastElementIndex].mIndexId != mIndexId);

   25598             :

   25600           0 :                                 lastElementIndex - firstElementIndex);

   26003             : nsresult
   26004           0 : NormalTransactionOp::ObjectStoreHasIndexes(NormalTransactionOp* aOp,

   26010             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aOp);

   26014             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aHasIndexes);
   26015             : 
   26016             :   bool hasIndexes;
   26017           0 :   if (aOp->Transaction()->GetMode() == IDBTransaction::VERSION_CHANGE &&
   26018             :       aMayHaveIndexes) {
   26019             :     // If this is a version change transaction then mObjectStoreMayHaveIndexes

   26022             :     // directly.

   26028             :       return rv;

   26032             :       DatabaseOperationBase::ObjectStoreHasIndexes(aConnection,
   26033             :                                                    aObjectStoreId,

   26036             :

   26039             :

   26400             : nsresult
   26401           0 : ObjectStoreAddOrPutRequestOp::DoDatabaseWork(DatabaseConnection* aConnection)
   26402             : {
   26403             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aConnection);
   26404           0 :   aConnection->AssertIsOnConnectionThread();
   26405             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aConnection->GetStorageConnection());
   26406             : 
   26407           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
   26408             :                  "ObjectStoreAddOrPutRequestOp::DoDatabaseWork",
   26409             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
   26410             : 
   26411           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(IndexedDatabaseManager::InLowDiskSpaceMode())) {
   26412             :     return NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_QUOTA_ERR;
   26413             :   }
   26414             : 
   26415           0 :   DatabaseConnection::AutoSavepoint autoSave;
   26416           0 :   nsresult rv = autoSave.Start(Transaction());
   26417           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   26418             :     return rv;
   26419             :   }
   26420             : 
   26421             :   bool objectStoreHasIndexes;
   26422             :   rv = ObjectStoreHasIndexes(this,
   26423             :                              aConnection,
   26424           0 :                              mParams.objectStoreId(),
   26425             :                              mObjectStoreMayHaveIndexes,
   26426           0 :                              &objectStoreHasIndexes);
   26427           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   26428             :     return rv;
   26429             :   }
   26430             : 
   26431             :   // This will be the final key we use.
   26432           0 :   Key& key = mResponse;
   26433           0 :   key = mParams.key();
   26434             : 
   26435           0 :   const bool keyUnset = key.IsUnset();
   26436           0 :   const int64_t osid = mParams.objectStoreId();
   26437             : 
   26438             :   // First delete old index_data_values if we're overwriting something and we
   26439             :   // have indexes.
   26440           0 :   if (mOverwrite && !keyUnset && objectStoreHasIndexes) {
   26441           0 :     rv = RemoveOldIndexDataValues(aConnection);
   26442           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   26443             :       return rv;
   26444             :     }
   26445             :   }
   26446             : 
   26447             :   // The "|| keyUnset" here is mostly a debugging tool. If a key isn't
   26448             :   // specified we should never have a collision and so it shouldn't matter
   26449             :   // if we allow overwrite or not. By not allowing overwrite we raise
   26450             :   // detectable errors rather than corrupting data.
   26451           0 :   DatabaseConnection::CachedStatement stmt;
   26452           0 :   if (!mOverwrite || keyUnset) {
   26453             :     rv = aConnection->GetCachedStatement(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
   26454             :       "INSERT INTO object_data "
   26455             :         "(object_store_id, key, file_ids, data) "
   26456             :         "VALUES (:osid, :key, :file_ids, :data);"),
   26457           0 :       &stmt);
   26458             :   } else {
   26459             :     rv = aConnection->GetCachedStatement(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING(
   26460             :       "INSERT OR REPLACE INTO object_data "
   26461             :         "(object_store_id, key, file_ids, data) "
   26462             :         "VALUES (:osid, :key, :file_ids, :data);"),
   26463           0 :     &stmt);
   26464             :   }
   26465           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   26466             :     return rv;
   26467             :   }
   26468             : 
   26469           0 :   rv = stmt->BindInt64ByName(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING("osid"), osid);
   26470           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   26471             :     return rv;
   26472             :   }
   26473             : 
   26474           0 :   const SerializedStructuredCloneWriteInfo& cloneInfo = mParams.cloneInfo();
   26475           0 :   const JSStructuredCloneData& cloneData = cloneInfo.data().data;
   26476           0 :   size_t cloneDataSize = cloneData.Size();
   26477             : 
   26478             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!keyUnset || mMetadata->mCommonMetadata.autoIncrement(),
   26479             :              "Should have key unless autoIncrement");
   26480             : 
   26481           0 :   int64_t autoIncrementNum = 0;
   26482             : 
   26483           0 :   if (mMetadata->mCommonMetadata.autoIncrement()) {
   26484           0 :     if (keyUnset) {
   26485           0 :       autoIncrementNum = mMetadata->mNextAutoIncrementId;
   26486             : 
   26487             :       MOZ_ASSERT(autoIncrementNum > 0);
   26488             : 
   26489           0 :       if (autoIncrementNum > (1LL << 53)) {
   26490             :         return NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_CONSTRAINT_ERR;
   26491             :       }
   26492             : 
   26493           0 :       key.SetFromInteger(autoIncrementNum);
   26494           0 :     } else if (key.IsFloat()) {
   26495           0 :       double numericKey = key.ToFloat();
   26496           0 :       numericKey = std::min(numericKey, double(1LL << 53));
   26497           0 :       numericKey = floor(numericKey);
   26498           0 :       if (numericKey >= mMetadata->mNextAutoIncrementId) {
   26499           0 :         autoIncrementNum = numericKey;
   26500             :       }
   26501             :     }
   26502             : 
   26503           0 :     if (keyUnset && mMetadata->mCommonMetadata.keyPath().IsValid()) {
   26504           0 :       const SerializedStructuredCloneWriteInfo& cloneInfo = mParams.cloneInfo();
   26505             :       MOZ_ASSERT(cloneInfo.offsetToKeyProp());
   26506             :       MOZ_ASSERT(cloneDataSize > sizeof(uint64_t));
   26507             :       MOZ_ASSERT(cloneInfo.offsetToKeyProp() <=
   26508             :                  (cloneDataSize - sizeof(uint64_t)));
   26509             : 
   26510             :       // Special case where someone put an object into an autoIncrement'ing
   26511             :       // objectStore with no key in its keyPath set. We needed to figure out
   26512             :       // which row id we would get above before we could set that properly.
   26513             :       uint64_t keyPropValue =
   26514           0 :         ReinterpretDoubleAsUInt64(static_cast<double>(autoIncrementNum));
   26515             : 
   26516             :       static const size_t keyPropSize = sizeof(uint64_t);
   26517             : 
   26518             :       char keyPropBuffer[keyPropSize];
   26519             :       LittleEndian::writeUint64(keyPropBuffer, keyPropValue);
   26520             : 
   26521           0 :       auto iter = cloneData.Iter();
   26522             :       DebugOnly<bool> result =
   26523           0 :        iter.AdvanceAcrossSegments(cloneData, cloneInfo.offsetToKeyProp());
   26524             :       MOZ_ASSERT(result);
   26525             : 
   26526           0 :       for (char index : keyPropBuffer) {
   26527           0 :         char* keyPropPointer = iter.Data();
   26528           0 :         *keyPropPointer = index;
   26529             : 
   26530           0 :         result = iter.AdvanceAcrossSegments(cloneData, 1);
   26531             :         MOZ_ASSERT(result);
   26532             :       }
   26533             :     }
   26534             :   }
   26535             : 
   26536           0 :   key.BindToStatement(stmt, NS_LITERAL_CSTRING("key"));
   26537             : 
   26538           0 :   if (mDataOverThreshold) {
   26539             :     // The data we store in the SQLite database is a (signed) 64-bit integer.
   26540             :     // The flags are left-shifted 32 bits so the max value is 0xFFFFFFFF.
   26541             :     // The file_ids index occupies the lower 32 bits and its max is 0xFFFFFFFF.
   26542             :     static const uint32_t kCompressedFlag = (1<<0);
   26543             : 
   26544           0 :     uint32_t flags = 0;
   26545           0 :     flags |= kCompressedFlag;
   26546             : 
   26547           0 :     uint32_t index = mStoredFileInfos.Length() - 1;
   26548             : 
   26549           0 :     int64_t data = (uint64_t(flags) << 32) | index;
   26550             : 
   26551           0 :     rv = stmt->BindInt64ByName(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING("data"), data);
   26552           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   26553             :       return rv;
   26554             :     }
   26555             :   } else {
   26556             :     nsCString flatCloneData;
   26557           0 :     flatCloneData.SetLength(cloneDataSize);
   26558           0 :     auto iter = cloneData.Iter();
   26559           0 :     cloneData.ReadBytes(iter, flatCloneData.BeginWriting(), cloneDataSize);
   26560             : 
   26561             :     // Compress the bytes before adding into the database.
   26562           0 :     const char* uncompressed = flatCloneData.BeginReading();
   26563           0 :     size_t uncompressedLength = cloneDataSize;
   26564             : 
   26565           0 :     size_t compressedLength = snappy::MaxCompressedLength(uncompressedLength);
   26566             : 
   26567             :     UniqueFreePtr<char> compressed(
   26568           0 :       static_cast<char*>(malloc(compressedLength)));
   26569           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(!compressed)) {

   26595           0 :       StoredFileInfo& storedFileInfo = mStoredFileInfos[index];

   26597             : 
   26598             :       // If there is a StoredFileInfo, then one of the following is true:
   26599             :       // - This was an overflow structured clone and storedFileInfo.mInputStream
   26600             :       //   MUST be non-null.
   26601             :       // - This is a reference to a Blob that may or may not have already been
   26602             :       //   written to disk.  storedFileInfo.mFileActor MUST be non-null, but
   26603             :       //   its GetBlockingInputStream may return null (so don't assert on them).
   26604             :       // - It's a mutable file.  No writing will be performed.
   26605             :       MOZ_ASSERT(storedFileInfo.mInputStream || storedFileInfo.mFileActor ||
   26606             :                  storedFileInfo.mType == StructuredCloneFile::eMutableFile);

   28115             :     const SerializedKeyRange& range =
   28116           0 :       mOptionalKeyRange.get_SerializedKeyRange();
   28117           0 :     if (range.isOnly()) {
   28118           0 :       *aKey = range.lower();
   28119           0 :       *aOpen = false;
   28120             : #ifdef ENABLE_INTL_API
   28121           0 :       if (mCursor->IsLocaleAware()) {
   28122           0 :         range.lower().ToLocaleBasedKey(*aKey, mCursor->mLocale);
   28123             :       }
   28124             : #endif
   28125             :     } else {
   28126           0 :       *aKey = aLowerBound ? range.lower() : range.upper();
   28127           0 :       *aOpen = aLowerBound ? range.lowerOpen() : range.upperOpen();
   28128             : #ifdef ENABLE_INTL_API
   28129           0 :       if (mCursor->IsLocaleAware()) {
   28130           0 :         if (aLowerBound) {
   28131           0 :           range.lower().ToLocaleBasedKey(*aKey, mCursor->mLocale);
   28132             :         } else {
   28133           0 :           range.upper().ToLocaleBasedKey(*aKey, mCursor->mLocale);
   28134             :         }
   28135             :       }
   28136             : #endif
   28137             :     }
   28138             :   } else {
   28139           0 :     *aOpen = false;
   28140             :   }
   28141           0 : }

   28674             :         openLimit;
   28675             :       break;

   28679           0 :       Key lower;
   28680             :       bool open;
   28681           0 :       GetRangeKeyInfo(true, &lower, &open);
   28682           0 :       if (usingKeyRange && !lower.IsUnset()) {
   28683           0 :         AppendConditionClause(sortColumn, rangeKey, false, !open, queryStart);
   28684           0 :         mCursor->mRangeKey = lower;
   28685             :       }

   29018             : nsresult
   29019           0 : Cursor::
   29020             : ContinueOp::DoDatabaseWork(DatabaseConnection* aConnection)
   29021             : {
   29022             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aConnection);
   29023           0 :   aConnection->AssertIsOnConnectionThread();
   29024             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mCursor);
   29025             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mCursor->mObjectStoreId);
   29026             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!mCursor->mContinueQuery.IsEmpty());
   29027             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!mCursor->mContinueToQuery.IsEmpty());
   29028             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!mCursor->mKey.IsUnset());
   29029             : 
   29030             :   const bool isIndex =
   29031           0 :     mCursor->mType == OpenCursorParams::TIndexOpenCursorParams ||
   29032           0 :     mCursor->mType == OpenCursorParams::TIndexOpenKeyCursorParams;
   29033             : 
   29034             :   MOZ_ASSERT_IF(isIndex &&
   29035             :                 (mCursor->mDirection == IDBCursor::NEXT ||
   29036             :                  mCursor->mDirection == IDBCursor::PREV),
   29037             :                 !mCursor->mContinuePrimaryKeyQuery.IsEmpty());
   29038             :   MOZ_ASSERT_IF(isIndex, mCursor->mIndexId);
   29039             :   MOZ_ASSERT_IF(isIndex, !mCursor->mObjectKey.IsUnset());
   29040             : 
   29041           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
   29042             :                  "Cursor::ContinueOp::DoDatabaseWork",
   29043             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
   29044             : 
   29045             :   // We need to pick a query based on whether or not a key was passed to the
   29046             :   // continue function. If not we'll grab the the next item in the database that
   29047             :   // is greater than (or less than, if we're running a PREV cursor) the current
   29048             :   // key. If a key was passed we'll grab the next item in the database that is
   29049             :   // greater than (or less than, if we're running a PREV cursor) or equal to the
   29050             :   // key that was specified.
   29051             : 
   29052             :   // Note: Changing the number or order of SELECT columns in the query will
   29053             :   // require changes to CursorOpBase::PopulateResponseFromStatement.
   29054           0 :   bool hasContinueKey = false;
   29055           0 :   bool hasContinuePrimaryKey = false;
   29056           0 :   uint32_t advanceCount = 1;
   29057           0 :   Key& currentKey = mCursor->IsLocaleAware() ? mCursor->mSortKey : mCursor->mKey;
   29058             : 
   29059           0 :   switch (mParams.type()) {
   29060             :     case CursorRequestParams::TContinueParams:
   29061           0 :       if (!mParams.get_ContinueParams().key().IsUnset()) {
   29062           0 :         hasContinueKey = true;
   29063           0 :         currentKey = mParams.get_ContinueParams().key();
   29064             :       }
   29065             :       break;
   29066             :     case CursorRequestParams::TContinuePrimaryKeyParams:
   29067             :       MOZ_ASSERT(!mParams.get_ContinuePrimaryKeyParams().key().IsUnset());
   29068             :       MOZ_ASSERT(!mParams.get_ContinuePrimaryKeyParams().primaryKey().IsUnset());
   29069             :       MOZ_ASSERT(mCursor->mDirection == IDBCursor::NEXT ||
   29070             :                  mCursor->mDirection == IDBCursor::PREV);
   29071           0 :       hasContinueKey = true;
   29072           0 :       hasContinuePrimaryKey = true;
   29073           0 :       currentKey = mParams.get_ContinuePrimaryKeyParams().key();
   29074             :       break;
   29075             :     case CursorRequestParams::TAdvanceParams:
   29076           0 :       advanceCount = mParams.get_AdvanceParams().count();
   29077           0 :       break;
   29078             :     default:
   29079           0 :       MOZ_CRASH("Should never get here!");
   29080             :   }
   29081             : 
   29082             :   const nsCString& continueQuery =
   29083           0 :     hasContinuePrimaryKey ? mCursor->mContinuePrimaryKeyQuery :
   29084           0 :     hasContinueKey ? mCursor->mContinueToQuery : mCursor->mContinueQuery;
   29085             : 
   29086             :   MOZ_ASSERT(advanceCount > 0);
   29087           0 :   nsAutoCString countString;
   29088           0 :   countString.AppendInt(advanceCount);
   29089             : 
   29090           0 :   nsCString query = continueQuery + countString;
   29091             : 
   29092             :   NS_NAMED_LITERAL_CSTRING(currentKeyName, "current_key");
   29093             :   NS_NAMED_LITERAL_CSTRING(rangeKeyName, "range_key");
   29094             :   NS_NAMED_LITERAL_CSTRING(objectKeyName, "object_key");
   29095             : 
   29096           0 :   const bool usingRangeKey = !mCursor->mRangeKey.IsUnset();
   29097             : 
   29098           0 :   DatabaseConnection::CachedStatement stmt;
   29099           0 :   nsresult rv = aConnection->GetCachedStatement(query, &stmt);
   29100           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29101             :     return rv;
   29102             :   }
   29103             : 
   29104           0 :   int64_t id = isIndex ? mCursor->mIndexId : mCursor->mObjectStoreId;
   29105             : 
   29106           0 :   rv = stmt->BindInt64ByName(NS_LITERAL_CSTRING("id"), id);
   29107           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29108             :     return rv;
   29109             :   }
   29110             : 
   29111             :   // Bind current key.
   29112           0 :   rv = currentKey.BindToStatement(stmt, currentKeyName);
   29113           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29114             :     return rv;
   29115             :   }
   29116             : 
   29117             :   // Bind range key if it is specified.
   29118           0 :   if (usingRangeKey) {
   29119           0 :     rv = mCursor->mRangeKey.BindToStatement(stmt, rangeKeyName);
   29120           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29121             :       return rv;
   29122             :     }
   29123             :   }
   29124             : 
   29125             :   // Bind object key if duplicates are allowed and we're not continuing to a
   29126             :   // specific key.
   29127           0 :   if (isIndex &&
   29128           0 :       !hasContinueKey &&
   29129           0 :       (mCursor->mDirection == IDBCursor::NEXT ||
   29130           0 :        mCursor->mDirection == IDBCursor::PREV)) {
   29131           0 :     rv = mCursor->mObjectKey.BindToStatement(stmt, objectKeyName);
   29132           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29133             :       return rv;
   29134             :     }
   29135             :   }
   29136             : 
   29137             :   // Bind object key if primaryKey is specified.
   29138           0 :   if (hasContinuePrimaryKey) {
   29139           0 :     rv = mParams.get_ContinuePrimaryKeyParams().primaryKey()
   29140           0 :       .BindToStatement(stmt, objectKeyName);
   29141           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29142             :       return rv;
   29143             :     }
   29144             :   }
   29145             : 
   29146             : 
   29147             :   bool hasResult;
   29148           0 :   for (uint32_t index = 0; index < advanceCount; index++) {
   29149           0 :     rv = stmt->ExecuteStep(&hasResult);
   29150           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29151           0 :       return rv;
   29152             :     }
   29153             : 
   29154           0 :     if (!hasResult) {
   29155           0 :       mCursor->mKey.Unset();
   29156           0 :       mCursor->mSortKey.Unset();
   29157           0 :       mCursor->mRangeKey.Unset();
   29158           0 :       mCursor->mObjectKey.Unset();
   29159           0 :       mResponse = void_t();
   29160           0 :       return NS_OK;
   29161             :     }
   29162             :   }
   29163             : 
   29164           0 :   rv = PopulateResponseFromStatement(stmt, true);
   29165           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29166           0 :     return rv;
   29167             :   }
   29168             : 
   29169           0 :   return NS_OK;
   29170             : }
   29171             : 
   29172             : nsresult
   29173           0 : Cursor::
   29174             : ContinueOp::SendSuccessResult()
   29175             : {
   29176           0 :   AssertIsOnOwningThread();
   29177             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mCursor);
   29178             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mCursor->mCurrentlyRunningOp == this);
   29179             :   MOZ_ASSERT_IF(mResponse.type() == CursorResponse::Tvoid_t,
   29180             :                 mCursor->mKey.IsUnset());
   29181             :   MOZ_ASSERT_IF(mResponse.type() == CursorResponse::Tvoid_t,

   29334           0 : GetFileReferencesHelper::Run()
   29335             : {
   29336           0 :   AssertIsOnIOThread();

   29342           0 :     mgr->GetFileManager(mPersistenceType, mOrigin, mDatabaseName);

   29344           0 :   if (fileManager) {
   29345           0 :     RefPtr<FileInfo> fileInfo = fileManager->GetFileInfo(mFileId);

   29348           0 :       fileInfo->GetReferences(&mMemRefCnt, &mDBRefCnt, &mSliceRefCnt);

   29350           0 :       if (mMemRefCnt != -1) {
   29351             :         // We added an extra temp ref, so account for that accordingly.
   29352           0 :         mMemRefCnt--;
   29353             :       }
   29354             : 
   29355           0 :       mResult = true;
   29356           0 :     }

   29514             : nsresult
   29515           0 : FileHelper::CreateFileFromStream(nsIFile* aFile,
   29516             :                                  nsIFile* aJournalFile,
   29517             :                                  nsIInputStream* aInputStream,
   29518             :                                  bool aCompress)
   29519             : {
   29520             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!IsOnBackgroundThread());
   29521             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aFile);
   29522             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aJournalFile);
   29523             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aInputStream);
   29524             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mFileManager);
   29525             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mFileDirectory);
   29526             :   MOZ_ASSERT(mJournalDirectory);
   29527             : 
   29528             :   bool exists;
   29529           0 :   nsresult rv = aFile->Exists(&exists);
   29530           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29531             :     return rv;
   29532             :   }
   29533             : 
   29534             :   // DOM blobs that are being stored in IDB are cached by calling
   29535             :   // IDBDatabase::GetOrCreateFileActorForBlob. So if the same DOM blob is stored
   29536             :   // again under a different key or in a different object store, we just add
   29537             :   // a new reference instead of creating a new copy (all such stored blobs share
   29538             :   // the same id).
   29539             :   // However, it can happen that CreateFileFromStream failed due to quota
   29540             :   // exceeded error and for some reason the orphaned file couldn't be deleted
   29541             :   // immediately. Now, if the operation is being repeated, the DOM blob is
   29542             :   // already cached, so it has the same file id which clashes with the orphaned
   29543             :   // file. We could do some tricks to restore previous copy loop, but it's safer
   29544             :   // to just delete the orphaned file and start from scratch.
   29545             :   // This corner case is partially simulated in test_file_copy_failure.js
   29546           0 :   if (exists) {
   29547             :     bool isFile;
   29548           0 :     rv = aFile->IsFile(&isFile);
   29549           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29550           0 :       return rv;
   29551             :     }
   29552             : 
   29553           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(!isFile)) {
   29554             :       return NS_ERROR_FAILURE;
   29555             :     }
   29556             : 
   29557           0 :     rv = aJournalFile->Exists(&exists);
   29558           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29559             :       return rv;
   29560             :     }
   29561             : 
   29562           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(!exists)) {
   29563             :       return NS_ERROR_FAILURE;
   29564             :     }
   29565             : 
   29566           0 :     rv = aJournalFile->IsFile(&isFile);
   29567           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29568             :       return rv;
   29569             :     }
   29570             : 
   29571           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(!isFile)) {
   29572             :       return NS_ERROR_FAILURE;
   29573             :     }
   29574             : 
   29575           0 :     IDB_WARNING("Deleting orphaned file!");
   29576             : 
   29577           0 :     rv = RemoveFile(aFile, aJournalFile);
   29578           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29579             :       return rv;
   29580             :     }
   29581             :   }
   29582             : 
   29583             :   // Create a journal file first.
   29584           0 :   rv = aJournalFile->Create(nsIFile::NORMAL_FILE_TYPE, 0644);
   29585           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29586             :     return rv;
   29587             :   }
   29588             : 
   29589             :   // Now try to copy the stream.
   29590             :   RefPtr<FileOutputStream> fileOutputStream =
   29591             :     FileOutputStream::Create(mFileManager->Type(),
   29592           0 :                              mFileManager->Group(),
   29593           0 :                              mFileManager->Origin(),
   29594           0 :                              aFile);
   29595           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(!fileOutputStream)) {
   29596             :     return NS_ERROR_FAILURE;
   29597             :   }
   29598             : 
   29599           0 :   if (aCompress) {
   29600             :     RefPtr<SnappyCompressOutputStream> snappyOutputStream =
   29601           0 :       new SnappyCompressOutputStream(fileOutputStream);
   29602             : 
   29603           0 :     UniquePtr<char[]> buffer(new char[snappyOutputStream->BlockSize()]);
   29604             : 
   29605             :     rv = SyncCopy(aInputStream,
   29606             :                   snappyOutputStream,
   29607             :                   buffer.get(),
   29608           0 :                   snappyOutputStream->BlockSize());
   29609             :   } else {
   29610             :     char buffer[kFileCopyBufferSize];
   29611             : 
   29612             :     rv = SyncCopy(aInputStream,
   29613             :                   fileOutputStream,
   29614             :                   buffer,
   29615           0 :                   kFileCopyBufferSize);
   29616             :   }
   29617           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29618           0 :     return rv;
   29619             :   }
   29620             : 
   29621           0 :   return NS_OK;
   29622             : }
   29623             : 
   29624             : nsresult
   29625           0 : FileHelper::ReplaceFile(nsIFile* aFile,
   29626             :                         nsIFile* aNewFile,

   29684             :

   29686           0 :     rv = aFile->GetFileSize(&fileSize);

   29688             :       return rv;

   29694             :     return rv;

   29723             : nsresult
   29724           0 : FileHelper::SyncCopy(nsIInputStream* aInputStream,
   29725             :                      nsIOutputStream* aOutputStream,
   29726             :                      char* aBuffer,
   29727             :                      uint32_t aBufferSize)
   29728             : {
   29729             :   MOZ_ASSERT(!IsOnBackgroundThread());
   29730             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aInputStream);
   29731             :   MOZ_ASSERT(aOutputStream);
   29732             : 
   29733           0 :   PROFILER_LABEL("IndexedDB",
   29734             :                  "FileHelper::SyncCopy",
   29735             :                  js::ProfileEntry::Category::STORAGE);
   29736             : 
   29737             :   nsresult rv;
   29738             : 
   29739             :   do {
   29740             :     uint32_t numRead;
   29741           0 :     rv = aInputStream->Read(aBuffer, aBufferSize, &numRead);
   29742           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29743             :       break;
   29744             :     }
   29745             : 
   29746           0 :     if (!numRead) {
   29747             :       break;
   29748             :     }
   29749             : 
   29750             :     uint32_t numWrite;
   29751           0 :     rv = aOutputStream->Write(aBuffer, numRead, &numWrite);
   29752           0 :     if (rv == NS_ERROR_FILE_NO_DEVICE_SPACE) {
   29753           0 :       rv = NS_ERROR_DOM_INDEXEDDB_QUOTA_ERR;
   29754             :     }
   29755           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29756             :       break;
   29757             :     }
   29758             : 
   29759           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(numWrite != numRead)) {
   29760             :       rv = NS_ERROR_FAILURE;
   29761             :       break;
   29762             :     }
   29763             :   } while (true);
   29764             : 
   29765           0 :   if (NS_SUCCEEDED(rv)) {
   29766           0 :     rv = aOutputStream->Flush();
   29767           0 :     if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv))) {
   29768             :       return rv;
   29769             :     }
   29770             :   }
   29771             : 
   29772           0 :   nsresult rv2 = aOutputStream->Close();
   29773           0 :   if (NS_WARN_IF(NS_FAILED(rv2))) {
   29774           0 :     return NS_SUCCEEDED(rv) ? rv2 : rv;
   29775             :   }
   29776             : 
   29777           0 :   return rv;
   29778             : }
   29779             : 
   29780             : } // namespace indexedDB
   29781             : } // namespace dom
   29782             : } // namespace mozilla
   29783             : 
   29784             : #undef IDB_MOBILE
   29785             : #undef IDB_DEBUG_LOG
